On 1 June 2006 , the Dalai Lama bestowed the International Campaign for Tibet 's Light of Truth Award upon the Hergé Foundation , along with South African Archbishop Desmond Tutu .
Ernesto Teodoro Moneta ( September 20 , 1833 in Milan , Lombardy -- February 10 , 1918 ) was an Italian journalist , nationalist , revolutionary soldier and later a pacifist and Nobel Peace Prize Laureate .
Moshe Schnitzer was awarded the Israel Prize in 2004 , the highest civilian award given by Israel .
Hans Roeger ( 13 July 1920 -- 12 April 2009 ) was a highly decorated Oberfeldwebel in the Wehrmacht during World War II , and a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
10 April 1945 - Member of the Order of the British Empire - Captain ( temporary Major ) William Frederick James Harvey , D.F.C. ( 73684 ) , Royal Artillery , Territorial Army .
Karel Satsuit Tubun ( 14 October 1928 -- 1 October 1965 ) was an Indonesian police officer who is now regarded as a National Hero of Indonesia .
Franz Scheidies ( 22 December 1890 -- 7 April 1942 ) was a German general during the Second World War and a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves ( German : Ritterkreuz des Eisernen Kreuzes mit Eichenlaub ) , serving in the infantry .
Nadira Babbar ( Urdu : نادرہ ببّر‎ , Hindi : नादिरा बब्बर ; born 20 January 1948 ) is an Indian theatre actress , director and an actress in Hindi cinema , who is the recipient of Sangeet Natak Akademi Award in 2001 .
Erich Göstl ( 17 April 1925 -- 28 October 1990 ) was a member of the Waffen SS who was awarded the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross , which was awarded to recognise extreme battlefield bravery or successful military leadership .
The Yiddish Policemen 's Union won a number of science fiction awards : the Nebula Award for Best Novel , the Locus Award for Best SF Novel , the Hugo Award for Best Novel , and the Sidewise Award for Alternate History for Best Novel .
2006 Guggenheim Fellowship 2014 National Book Critics Circle Award ( Criticism ) finalist for What Would Lynne Tillman Do ?
Naushad was conferred the Dadasaheb Phalke Award and the Padma Bhushan in 1982 and 1992 , respectively , for his contribution to the Bollywood film industry .
Robert Clarkson Tredgold was appointed Companion of the Order of St Michael and St George in the 1943 New Year Honours .
On 3 March , VanVelzen received the prestigious Dutch music award , the Golden Harp , for his contribution to Dutch popmusic , becoming one of only 42 artists to ever have done so .
Paul Guhl ( 1 June 1916 -- 16 April 1997 ) was a Sturmbannführer ( Major ) , in the Waffen - SS who as awarded the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross on 4 June 1944 .
James Farquharson ( 1781 - -1843 ) was a Scottish minister , scientific writer , and Fellow of the Royal Society .
Louis - Albert Bourgault - Ducoudray ( 2 February 1840 -- 4 July 1910 ) was a French Breton composer , pianist , and professor of music history / theory at the Conservatoire de Paris as well as a Prix de Rome laureate .
In 2001 , Silma Ihram was a recipient of the Centenary Medal , and in 2005 was named Muslim Woman of the Decade .
Voldemārs Ozols ( October 17 , 1884 , Vidreja , Vitebsk Governorate -- July 12 , 1949 ) was a Latvian military commander , lieutenant colonel , honored with the Order of Lāčplēsis , one of the Latvian Riflemen , a military theorist , and a right wing politician .
Stewart Haslinger ( born 25 November 1981 in Ainsdale , Merseyside ) is an English chess Grandmaster and former British Junior champion .
On 5 July 2011 Russia 's President Dmitry Medvedev posthumously awarded Maksud Sadikov with Order of Courage in a meeting with North Caucasus Muftis and religious leaders in Vladikavkaz .
Alexander Fersman was awarded the Lenin Prize ( 1929 ) , USSR State Prize ( 1942 ) , Wollaston Medal of the Geological Society of London ( 1943 ) , and Order of the Red Banner of Labour .
Charles H. Tracy ( October 3 , 1833 - September 13 , 1911 ) was an infantry soldier who received the Medal of Honor while serving in the Union Army during the American Civil War for two acts of bravery .
Ljubomir Ljubojević ( Serbian Cyrillic : Љубомир Љубојевић ) is a Serbian Grandmaster of chess .
William J. Johnston , Sr . , ( August 15 , 1918 -- May 29 , 1990 ) was a United States Army soldier and a recipient of the United States military 's highest decoration -- the Medal of Honor -- for his actions in World War II .
Moana - Nui - a - Kiwa Ngarimu VC ( 7 April 1918 -- 27 March 1943 ) was a New Zealand soldier and posthumous recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces .
Tim Weiner ( born June 20 , 1956 ) is a former New York Times reporter , author of four books and co - author of a fifth , and winner of the Pulitzer Prize and National Book Award .
Ratna Fabri was a noted museologist of India who was awarded Padma Shri in 1971 for her achievements .
Alexis Carrel ( French : ( alɛksi kaʁɛl ) ; 28 June 1873 -- 5 November 1944 ) was a French surgeon and biologist who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1912 for pioneering vascular suturing techniques .
Sir Peter Mansfield FRS , ( born 9 October 1933 ) , is an English physicist who was awarded the 2003 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine , shared with Paul Lauterbur , for discoveries concerning Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( MRI ) .
In 2006 , Pankaj Udhas was awarded the coveted Padma Shri , India 's fourth highest civilian award .
Raden Panji Soeroso ( alt , Suroso ) ( born in Porong , Sidoarjo , East Java , Dutch East Indies , 3 November 1893 - died in Indonesia , 16 May 1981 at the age of 87 years ) was a politician , Sarekat Islam activist , and a National Hero of Indonesia .
Dr. Hermann Kremer ( 28 September 1914 -- 24 December 1988 ) was a highly decorated Major of the Reserves in the Wehrmacht during World War II . He was also a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
Peter Scoones ( 27 October 1937 -- 20 April 2014 ) was an Emmy Award winning underwater cameraman known for his evocative work on the oceans .
Paul Freiherr von Hauser ( 24 April 1911 -- 1 April 1999 ) was a highly decorated Oberst in the Wehrmacht during World War II . He was also a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves .

Josef - Hubert Adrian ( 25 September 1911 -- Missing in action March 1945 ) was a highly decorated Oberfeldwebel in the Wehrmacht during World War II . He was also a recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross .
Henry F. Frizzell ( December 1839 -- May 1904 ) was a Union Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient .
Elmar Magerramov ( Azerbaijani : Elmar Məhərrəmov ; Russian : Эльмар Магеррамов ; born April 10 , 1958 in Baku , Azerbaijan ) is an international chess Grandmaster .
Michael Allmand VC ( 22 August 1923 -- 24 June 1944 ) was an English Second World War recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces .
In August 2012 , Mexican Ambassador to Spain Francisco Javier Ramírez Acuña accepted the Menéndez Pelayo International Prize on Ernesto de la Peña 's behalf , as the writer was too ill to travel to Menéndez Pelayo International University in Santander , Spain , to accept it in person .
Heinrich Boigk ( 30 October 1912 -- 28 March 2003 ) was a Leutnant of the Reserves in the Wehrmacht during World War II , and one of only 882 recipients of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves .
Philippe Balthazar de Gand ( 4 October 1616 - 27 February 1680 ) , Count of Isenghien , was a French nobleman and Knight of the Order of the Golden Fleece .
Alicia Borinsky has won several awards for her work , including the Latino Literature Prize in 1996 and a Guggenheim Fellowship in 2001 .
Konrad Heubeck ( 22 April 1918 -- 1 September 1987 ) was a Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross holder and a member of the Waffen SS he held the rank of Untersturmfuhrer .
In 1987 , a bronze sculpture of Birger Ruud , by the Norwegian sculptor Per Ung , was set up in Ruud 's native town of Kongsberg , and in 1991 he was awarded the Egebergs Ærespris for his achievements in ski jumping and alpine skiing .
Daniel Cambridge VC ( 27 March 1820 -- 4 June 1882 ) born in Carrickfergus , County Antrim , Ireland , was an Irish recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces .
Carmel Budiardjo ( born 18 June 1925 ) is a British human rights activist , founder of the organisation Tapol and a recipient of the Right Livelihood Award .
Ross Lindsey Iams ( April 5 , 1879 - -March 25 , 1952 ) was a United States Marine who received the Medal of Honor for actions in Haiti on November 17 , 1915 .
Willem Jan Otten ( born 4 October 1951 ) is a Dutch prose writer , playwright and poet , who in 2014 won the P. C. Hooft Award for lifetime literary achievement .
Russell Brower is an American music composer and three - time Emmy Award - winning sound designer who has created sounds for Tiny Toon Adventures , Animaniacs and Batman :
Kurt Plenzat ( 17 January 1914 -- 17 November 1998 ) was a German Hauptmann and recipient of the Knight 's Cross of the Iron Cross with Oak Leaves during the Second World War .
George Pereira was commissioned into the Grenadier Guards and served in China ( 1900 ) with the 1st Chinese Regiment , where he received the Distinguished Service Order ( DSO ) for his services during the Boxer Rebellion .
Ian Grant ( born 15 December 1930 ) is a British physicist and a Fellow of the Royal Society .
Jean - Pierre Renouard is commandeur de la Légion d'honneur , Médaille de la Résistance , Croix de Guerre 39 - 45 .
Robert F. Stryker ( November 9 , 1944 -- November 7 , 1967 ) was a United States Army soldier who posthumously received the Medal of Honor for his actions during the Vietnam War .
Frederick Corbett VC ( 17 September 1853 -- 25 September 1912 ) was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces .
In 1997 , The Naked Spur was added to the United States National Film Registry , being deemed `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant . ''
Maria Kotarba was recognised as Righteous Among the Nations by Yad Vashem on September 18 , 2005 for risking her life to save the lives of Jewish prisoners in two Nazi concentration camps .
In November 2011 , Ela Bhatt was selected for the Indira Gandhi Prize for Peace , Disarmament and Development 2011 for her lifetime achievements in empowering women through grassroots entrepreneurship .
George Fraser Kerr VC , MC & Bar , MM , ( 8 June 1895 -- 8 December 1929 ) was a Canadian recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest military award given to British and Commonwealth forces for gallantry in the face of the enemy .
Dibyendu Barua ( দিব্যেন্দু বড়ুয়া ) ( born October 27 , 1966 ) is a chess Grandmaster from the city of Kolkata ( Calcutta ) in the Indian state of West Bengal .
On April 21 , 1985 , Yad Vashem recognized Suzanne Spaak as Righteous Among the Nations .
Olle Hagnell was awarded the Rema Lapouse Award in 1978 for his scientific work with the Lundby Study and his contributions in the area of psychiatric epidemiology .
Kariamu Welsh is a contemporary dance choreographer and scholar whose awards include a National Endowment for the Arts and a Guggenheim Fellowship .
Brittany Andrews ( born Michelle Barry on August 13 , 1973 in Milwaukee , Wisconsin ) is an American exotic dancer , pornographic actress , film producer , and club DJ . In 2008 , Andrews was inducted into the AVN Hall of Fame .
Aleksandr Stolper was awarded Stalin Prize in 1949 and 1951 and received honorary title People 's Artist of the USSR in 1977 .
Essam El - Gindy ( also known as Essam El - Gendy and Esam Mohamed Ahmed Nagib ; born 14 July 1966 in Cairo ) is an Egyptian chess Grandmaster and FIDE Trainer .
Catherine - Dominique de Pérignon , 1st Marquis de Grenade ( May 31 , 1754 -- December 25 , 1818 ) was Marshal of France .
Jean de La Baume ( dead after 25 January 1435 ) was a Marshal of France from 1422
In 1958 , the Government of India honoured Devika Rani with a Padma Shri , the country 's fourth highest civilian honour .
Aracy de Carvalho Guimarães Rosa ( née Aracy Moebius de Carvalho ) ( December 5 , 1908 -- February 28 , 2011 ) was a Brazilian diplomatic clerk who has been recognized with the title of Righteous Among the Nations .
John Chipman Kerr VC ( January 11 , 1887 -- February 19 , 1963 ) , was a Canadian recipient of the Victoria Cross , the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces .
Charles Barthold is a news photographer for WHO - TV of Des Moines , Iowa , who won the 1976 Peabody Award for his film and photography of the Jordan Tornado in Jordan , Iowa .
Deepak B. Phatak , ( born 2 April 1948 ) is an Indian computer scientist and academic , and a recipient of the Padma Shri Award for his contribution in science and technology in 2013 .
Vladislav Volkov was decorated twice as the Hero of the Soviet Union ( first on October 22 , 1969 and posthumously on June 30 , 1971 ) .

Kya Love Story Hai ( English : What a Love Story ) is a 2007 Bollywood film starring Ayesha Takia and Tusshar Kapoor in the lead roles .

My Own United States is a 1918 American silent drama film directed by John W. Noble and starring Arnold Daly , Charles Graham , and Duncan McRae .

The Adventures of Aggie is a black - and - white sitcom starring Joan Shawlee that was made by ME Films and broadcast on ITV .
Now , Voyager is a 1942 American drama film starring Bette Davis , Paul Henreid , and Claude Rains , and directed by Irving Rapper .

False Servant ( French : La Fausse Suivante ) is a 2000 French comedy - drama film directed by Benoît Jacquot and starring Isabelle Huppert .

Leatherheads is a 2008 American sports comedy film from Universal Pictures directed by and starring George Clooney .

The Schorrsiegel Affair ( German : Die Sache mit Schorrsiegel ) is a 1928 German silent film directed by Jaap Speyer that featured Bernhard Goetzke , Walter Rilla and Anita Dorris .

Her Bitter Cup ( alternate title A Heart 's Crucible ) is a 1916 American silent film directed by Cleo Madison .

Adhe Neram Adhe Idam ( English : Same Time , Same Place ) is a 2009 Indian Tamil - language romantic drama film written and directed by M. Prabhu , which stars Jai and Vijayalakshmi in lead roles .
An Unreasonable Man is a 2006 documentary film that traces the life and career of political activist Ralph Nader , the founder of modern consumer protection in America and perennial presidential candidate .

Christmas Cupid is a television film starring Christina Milian , Ashley Benson and Chad Michael Murray and directed by Gil Junger .
Zweiohrküken ( lit . Two - eared chick , English title : Rabbit Without Ears 2 ) is a 2009 German romantic comedy film , written , produced and directed by Til Schweiger .
The Prisoner of Shark Island is a 1936 film loosely based on the life of Samuel Mudd , produced by Darryl F. Zanuck , directed by John Ford , and starring Warner Baxter and Gloria Stuart .
Close to My Heart is a 1951 Warner Bros. drama directed by William Keighley , written by James R. Webb ( based on his novel A Baby for Midge ) , and starring Ray Milland and Gene Tierney .
Good Sam is a 1948 American romantic comedy - drama film starring Gary Cooper as a Good Samaritan who is helpful to others at the expense of his own family .
One Rainy Afternoon is a 1936 American romantic comedy film directed by Rowland V. Lee , starring Francis Lederer and Ida Lupino , and featuring Hugh Herbert , Roland Young and Erik Rhodes .
Child of Rage is a CBS Television movie made in 1992 starring Ashley Peldon and Mel Harris .
Kannupada Poguthaiya ( Tamil : கண்ணுபடப்போகுதைய்யா ; English : People Will Get Jealous , Sir ) is a 1999 Tamil film starring Vijayakanth , Simran , Karan and directed by Barathi Ganesh .
The Delicate Delinquent is a 1957 American comedy film starring Jerry Lewis .
See No Evil 2 is a 2014 slasher film directed by the Soska sisters , written by Nathan Brookes and Bobby Lee Darby , produced by Michael Luisi , and starring Danielle Harris , Katharine Isabelle and professional wrestler Kane .
Satluj De Kandhe ( Punjabi : ਸਤਲੁਜ ਦੇ ਕੰਢੇ ) , also spelled as Satluj De Kande , is a 1964 National Award winning Punjabi romantic film directed by M. M. Billoo Mehra and produced by Padam Prakash Maheshwary , starring Balraj Sahni and Nishi in lead roles .
Please Murder Me is a 1956 American film noir film directed by Peter Godfrey , and starring Angela Lansbury and Raymond Burr .
Destiny 's Toy is a surviving 1916 American silent film written and directed by John B. O'Brien and starring Louise Huff .
The Eyes of Julia Deep is a 1918 American silent comedy - drama film starring Mary Miles Minter , directed by Lloyd Ingraham .
The Next Karate Kid ( aka The Karate Kid Part IV ) is a 1994 American martial arts drama film starring Pat Morita and Hilary Swank .
Soho Incident , released in the United States as Spin a Dark Web , is a 1956 British film noir directed by Vernon Sewell starring Faith Domergue and Lee Patterson .
Money Train is a 1995 American action film starring Wesley Snipes , Woody Harrelson and Jennifer Lopez as New York City transit cops and Robert Blake as their iron - fisted boss .
The Case of the Frightened Lady is a 1940 British , black - and - white , crime , drama , mystery thriller , directed by George King and starring Ronald Shiner as Detective Sergeant Totty , Felix Aylmer , Helen Haye and Marius Goring .
Hvis lille pige er du ? is a 1963 Danish comedy film directed by Erik Balling and starring Ghita Nørby .
A Small Southern Enterprise ( Italian : Una piccola impresa meridionale ) is a 2013 Italian comedy film written , directed and starred by Rocco Papaleo .
Invisible Ghost ( 1941 ) is an American horror film starring Bela Lugosi , shot in black and white , and directed by Joseph H. Lewis .
Dancin ' thru the Dark is a 1990 British film directed by Mike Ockrent and written by Willy Russell , based on the play Stags and Hens by the same author and starring Con O'Neill , Claire Hackett , Simon O'Brien , Julia Deakin , Marji Campi , Colin Welland and Mark Womack .
My Boss is a 2012 Malayalam romantic comedy film directed by Jeethu Joseph , starring Dileep and Mamta Mohandas in the lead roles and Mukesh in a cameo appearance .
I Think I Do is a 1997 American gay - themed romantic comedy film written and directed by Brian Sloan and starring Alexis Arquette .
Summer Love Love ( Chinese : 夏日恋神马 or Chinese : 戀夏戀夏戀戀下 ) is a Chinese / Hong Kong romantic comedy film directed by Wilson Kwok - wai Chin and starring Alex Fong , Owodog , Terence Siufay , Elanne Kong , Viann Zhang , Izumi Liu , and Carol Yeung .
Eagle Eye is a 2008 American science fiction - action film directed by D. J. Caruso and starring Shia LaBeouf , Michelle Monaghan and Billy Bob Thornton .
Sentinels of Bronze ( Italian : Sentinelle di bronzo ) is a 1937 Italian war film directed by Romolo Marcellini and starring Fosco Giachetti , Giovanni Grasso and Doris Duranti .
Die Another Day , produced by Michael G. Wilson and Barbara Broccoli , and directed by Lee Tamahori , marked the James Bond franchise 's 40th anniversary .
The Water Diviner is a 2014 American - Australian historical fictional war drama film directed by and starring Russell Crowe in his directorial debut .
Totò nella luna ( internationally released as Toto in the Moon ) is a 1958 Italian comedy film written and directed by Steno .
Sesham is a 2002 Malayalam language drama film written and directed by T. K. Rajeev Kumar with Jayaram , Geethu Mohandas , Biju Menon and P. Balachandran in the star cast .
Storm Catcher ( aka Mission Storm Catcher ) is a 1999 American action film starring Dolph Lundgren and directed by Tony Hickox , who also co - stars in the film .
Lying Lips is a 1939 , melodrama , race film by Oscar Micheaux , starring Edna Mae Harris , and Robert Earl Jones ( the father of James Earl Jones ) .
Rhythm , Salt and Pepper ( Spanish : Ritmo , sal y pimienta ) is a 1951 Argentine musical comedy film directed by Carlos Torres Ríos and starring Lolita Torres , Ricardo Passano and María Esther Gamas .

Prayer of the Rollerboys is a 1990 independent science fiction film directed by Rick King and starring Corey Haim and Patricia Arquette .
The Hitman is a 1991 action / crime film starring Chuck Norris .
Vivre ensemble is a 1973 French drama film written , directed by and starring Anna Karina .
Sadie McKee is a 1934 American Pre - Code romantic drama film directed by Clarence Brown , starring Joan Crawford , and featuring Gene Raymond , Franchot Tone , Edward Arnold , and Esther Ralston .
Fatal Bond is a 1992 Australian ' B ' grade and thriller film , directed by Vince Monton , starring Linda Blair and Jerome Ehlers .
Dead Men Tell is a 1941 mystery film starring Sidney Toler , who played Charlie Chan in 22 feature films , beginning with Charlie Chan in Honolulu ( 1938 ) , and ending with The Trap ( 1946 ) .
The Borrower is a 1991 American science fiction horror film directed by John McNaughton and starring Rae Dawn Chong , Tom Towles and Antonio Fargas .
The Source Family is a 2012 feature documentary film directed by Jodi Wille and Maria Demopoulos that recounts the story of Father Yod , Ya Ho Wa 13 and the Source Family .
Kulapathy is a 1993 Indian Malayalam film , directed by Nahas and starring Vijayakumar and Anusha in lead roles .

Soul Survivors is a 2001 psychological thriller film starring Melissa Sagemiller as college student Cassie , whose boyfriend Sean ( Casey Affleck ) dies in a car accident that results from her driving after a night of partying .
Suicide Battalion is a 1958 World War II film starring Mike Connors and John Ashley who made the film while on leave from the US Army .

South Sea Woman is a 1953 action - comedy - drama film directed by Arthur Lubin and starring Burt Lancaster , Virginia Mayo and Chuck Connors .

Somehow Good is a 1927 British silent drama film directed by Jack Raymond and starring Fay Compton , Stewart Rome and Dorothy Boyd .

Wings of Fame is a 1990 Dutch English - language comedy fantasy film ( released in the UK on 26 April 1991 ) directed by Otakar Votocek and starring Peter O'Toole , Colin Firth , Marie Trintignant , Andréa Ferréol and Robert Stephens .
Broken Journey ( also known as Rescue ) is a 1948 British drama film directed by Ken Annakin and featuring Phyllis Calvert , James Donald , Margot Grahame , Raymond Huntley and Guy Rolfe .
The Wild and the Innocent is a 1959 Western film starring Audie Murphy and Sandra Dee as two inexperienced young people who get into trouble when they visit a town for the very first time .
Tarzan 's Savage Fury is a 1952 film starring Lex Barker as Tarzan , Dorothy Hart as Jane , and Patric Knowles .

KELT-2Ab is an extrasolar planet that orbits the star KELT-2A approximately 419 light - years away in the constellation of Auriga .
7 Comae Berenices ( 7 Com ) is a star in the constellation Coma Berenices .
IC 5152 is an irregular galaxy 5.8 million light - years from Earth in the constellation Indus .
Nu Persei ( ν Per , ν Persei ) is a Class F5 , fourth - magnitude star in the constellation Perseus .
NGC 4027 ( also known as Arp 22 ) is a barred spiral galaxy approximately 83 million light - years away in the constellation Corvus .
WASP-4b is an extrasolar planet approximately 1,000 light - years away in the constellation of Phoenix .
Rho Telescopii ( ρ Tel , ρ Telescopii ) is the Bayer designation for a star in the southern constellation of Telescopium .
R Doradus ( HD 29712 or P Doradus ) is the name of a red giant Mira variable star in the far - southern constellation Dorado , although visually it appears more closely associated with the constellation Reticulum .
NGC 54 is an edge - on spiral galaxy in the constellation of Cetus .
NGC 7790 is a young open cluster of stars located some 10,800 light years away from Earth in the northern constellation of Cassiopeia .
HD 214810 is a visual binary star in the equatorial constellation of Aquarius .
Iota Cephei ( ι Cep , ι Cep ) is a Class K0 , third - magnitude star in the constellation Cepheus .
NGC 2536 is a barred spiral galaxy in the constellation Cancer that is interacting with NGC 2535 .
HD 215497 b is an extrasolar planet which orbits the K - type main sequence star HD 215497 , located approximately 142 light years away in the constellation Tucana .
NGC 50 is an elliptical galaxy in the constellation Cetus with a diameter of 170,000 light - year 's .
WASP-43b is a transiting planet in orbit around the young , active , and low - mass star WASP-43 in the constellation Sextans .
NGC 637 is an open cluster of stars in the constellation Cassiopeia .
HD 153201 is a Bp star in the southern constellation of Ara .
HD 171238 is a 9th magnitude G - type main sequence star located approximately 164 light years away in the constellation Sagittarius .
49 Arietis ( abbreviated 49 Ari ) is a star in the northern constellation of Aries .
18 Delphini b ( abbreviated 18 Del b ) , also named Arion , is an extrasolar planet approximately 238 light - years away in the constellation of Delphinus .
NGC 406 is a spiral galaxy quite similar to the well known Whirlpool galaxy , located some 65 million light - years away , in the southern constellation of Tucana ( the Toucan ) .
HD 43587 is a stellar system approximately 63 light - years away in the constellation of Orion , visible to the naked eye .
R Reticuli ( R Ret ) is a Mira variable star in the constellation Reticulum .
Theta Boötis ( θ Boo , θ Boötis ) is a star in the constellation Boötes .
Kepler-6 is a yellow giant situated in the constellation Cygnus .
IC 4970 is an unbarred lenticular galaxy of type SA0 ^ - pec : in the constellation Pavo .
GSC 03089 - 00929 is a magnitude 12 star located approximately 1300 light - years away in the constellation of Hercules .
33 Piscium ( 33 Psc ) is a star in the constellation Pisces .
HD 73526 is a yellow dwarf star ( G6V ) about 323 light - years away in the constellation Vela .
OGLE - TR-132 is a distant magnitude 15.72 star in the star fields of the constellation Carina .
NGC 467 is an elliptical galaxy in the Pisces constellation .
HAT - P-12 is a magnitude 13 star approximately 465 light years away in the constellation Canes Venatici .
HD 45364 is a star approximately 107 light years away from Earth in the constellation of Canis Major .
NGC 339 is a globular cluster in the constellation Tucana the Toucan .
Xi Aquarii ( ξ Aqr , ξ Aquarii ) is the Bayer designation for a binary star system in the equatorial constellation of Aquarius .

Peter Zoller ( born 16 September 1952 ) is a theoretical physicist from Austria .

Aníbal Bello is a paralympic athlete from Venezuela competing mainly in category F11 throws events .

Dave Quested ( born 16 April 1946 ) is a former New Zealand cricket umpire .
Davide Cassani ( born 1 January 1961 ) is a former road cyclist and cycling commentator on Italian television from Italy .

Gonzalo Piña Ludueña was born in Gibraltar in 1545 which was then part of Spain .

Julieta Lanteri ( March 22 , 1873 -- February 25 , 1932 ) was an Italian Argentine physician , leading freethinker , and activist for women 's rights in Argentina as well as for social reform generally .

In 1517 , King Manuel I of Portugal handed Lopo Homem a charter entitling him the privilege of certifying and amending all compass needles in vessels .
Jajang Mulyana ( born 23 October 1988 in Jatinangor ) is an Indonesia football player .
Albert de Gondi ( 4 November 1522 , Florence -- 1602 ) seigneur du Perron , comte , then marquis de Belle - Isle ( 1573 ) , duc de Retz ( from 1581 ) , was a marshal of France and a member of the Gondi family .
Seamus Tansey , also spelled Séamus Tansey , is an Irish flute player born in Sligo , Ireland in 1943 .
Sarah Major ( born August 22 , 1988 ) is a voice and television actress from New Zealand who is best known for her role as Patsy in the Cloud 9 Screen Entertainment Group series The Tribe .
Živko Budimir ( Croatian pronunciation : ( ʒîːʋko bûdimiːr ) ; 20 November 1962 ) is a Bosnian politician serving as President of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina , one of the two autonomous entities that compose Bosnia and Herzegovina .
Francesco Postiglione ( born 29 April 1972 in Naples ) is a former swimmer and water polo player from Italy , who represented his native country at four Summer Olympics : 1992 , 1996 , 2000 and 2004 .
Brett Studman ( born 19 April 1985 in Kempsey , New South Wales , Australia ) is an Australian footballer who plays for Penang FA in the Malaysia Super League .
Naceur Ktari ( born 1943 ) is a filmmaker from Tunisia .
Born in Brasília , Brazilian Federal District , Alípio left Brazil at the age of 14 .
Rajiv Rai ( born 1955 in Mumbai , India ) is an Indian film writer , editor and director .
Aleksandar Maksimović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Александар Максимовић , born February 26 , 1988 in Belgrade , SR Serbia , Yugoslavia ) is a Serbian sport wrestler .
Peter Fahrenholtz ( born Hamburg , Germany ) is a German diplomat , posted since September 2012 as the German ambassador in Rwanda .
Els Vanheusden graduated as a Medical Doctor at the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven ( Leuven , Belgium ) and in addition obtained 2 Master Degrees in Hospital Management and Aeronautical and Space Medicine .
William Henry Broome ( 30 September 1873 - -8 June 1943 ) was a New Zealand clothier and tailor .
Costas Andreou ( Greek : Κώστας Ανδρέου ) is a musician from Athens , Greece .
Marcelo Carracedo ( born April 16 , 1970 in Buenos Aires , Argentina ) is a former Argentine footballer who played during his career in Argentina , Japan , Chile , Mexico , Spain , Germany and Austria .
Orr Barouch ( Hebrew : אור ברוך‎ ; born 29 November 1991 in Haifa , Israel ) is an Israeli footballer who plays for Biel - Bienne .
Víctor González Torres ( born July 1 , 1947 in Mexico City ) , is a Mexican businessman who ran as a write - in candidate in the 2006 Mexican presidential election .
Yi Shu or Isabel Nee Yeh - su ( born 1946 ) is a popular Hong Kong writer .
Inés Medina - Fernández ( born February 8 , 1974 in Madrid , Spain ) is a pianist and composer of contemporary classical music .
Konrad Gałka ( born February 3 , 1974 in Kraków ) is a former butterfly swimmer from Poland , who competed in two consecutive Summer Olympics for his native country , starting in 1992 .
William Barak ( or Beruk ) ( c. 1824 -- 15 August 1903 ) , was the last traditional ngurungaeta ( elder ) of the Wurundjeri - willam clan , first inhabitants of present - day Melbourne , Australia .
Peggy Waleska ( born 1980 in Pirna , Saxony ) of Germany is a world champion rower who won a Gold medal in the Women 's Quadruple Sculls in Lucerne , Switzerland , in 2001 and successfully defended the title in Seville , Spain , in 2002 .
Peter Moko was a New Zealand rugby league player who played for New Zealand Māori and Glebe .
Dilip Ray ( b. 9 January 1954 Rourkela ) is an Ex- Member of the Parliament of India representing Orissa in the Rajya Sabha , the upper house of the Indian Parliament .
Ernst Hinterseer ( born 27 February 1932 in Kitzbühel ) is a former alpine skier from Austria .
Rick Bryant ( born 1948 as Donald Richard Bryant ) is a New Zealand blues and rock singer / songwriter .
Hendrik van Limborch ( 9 March 1681 -- 3 February 1759 ) was a painter and engraver from the Northern Netherlands .
Riccardo Beretta is an Italian artist born in 1982 in Mariano Comense , Como , Italy .
Iain Roberts ( born 16 May 1979 in Lichfield ) is a British - born , New Zealand skeleton racer , who has competed since 2004 .
Luis Alberto Solari ( n. Fray Bentos , on October 17 , 1918 - October 13 , 1993 ) was a painter and engraver from Uruguay .
Alain Lanty ( born 28 November 1961 in Auray , France ) is a French singer , composer and pianist .
Bernard - Pierre Donnadieu grew up with his sister , Agnes Donnadieu , a Chicago photographer , in Canada after their parents divorced while living in France .
David Limond Murdoch ( 2 November 1825 -- 5 June 1911 ) was a notable New Zealand banker and company director .
Evangelos Kofos ( Greek : Ευάγγελος Κωφός ) , was born in Edessa , Macedonia , Greece in 1934 and graduated from Anatolia College of Thessaloniki in 1952 .

Sacha McNeil is a New Zealand journalist and news presenter , She presented TV3 program Nightline from 2011 to 2013 .
Antoinette de Maignelais ( 1434 - -1474 ) was the chief mistress of Charles VII of France from 1450 until his death .
George Wallace Bollinger ( 10 April 1890 - -8 June 1917 ) was a New Zealand soldier and diarist .
Bekhan Tungaev ( Chechen : Бекхан Тунгаев ) is a Chechen wrestler who was born in Kazakhstan .
Aureliano Bolognesi ( born 15 November 1930 in Sestri Ponente , Italy ) was a famous Italian boxer .
TY Bello emerged onto Nigeria 's musical landscape as a member of the defunct group Kush , an acronym for Kinetically Ushering Salvation into Hearts and Homes .
Mehmet Akif Pasha ( 1822 -- 1893 ) , also known as Arnavut Mehmet Akif Pasha and Kalkandereli Mehmed Akif Pasha , was an Albanian statesman and governor of the Ottoman Empire .

Giray Bulak , born on March 9 , 1958 in Trabzon , Turkey , is a Turkish football coach .

Peter Cozens was the Director of the Centre for Strategic Studies New Zealand from 2002 until 2009 when he retired .

Joseph Doucé ( April 13 , 1945 --c . July 1990 ) was born to a rural family in Sint - Truiden , Belgium .
Neil Rautenbach ( born 17 May 1991 in Cape Town , South Africa ) is a South African - born rugby union player , currently playing with the Free State Cheetahs .
George Norman Hillmer ( born 1942 in Niagara Falls , Ontario ) is a leading Canadian historian and teacher and is among the leading scholars on Canada - US relations .
Ali Kordan ( 23 October 1958 -- 22 November 2009 ) was an Iranian conservative politician who served in the Revolutionary Guards , the judiciary and as deputy oil minister , before becoming interior minister of Iran in 2008 for just 90 days .
Michel Roche ( 8 September 1939 -- 11 June 2004 ) was an equestrian from France and Olympic champion .
Hasan Erbey ( born 21 September 1991 , in İzmir , Turkey ) is a Turkish footballer .
Georgios Pitharoulis ( * 4 June 1990 in Levanger , Norway ) is a Greek footballer .
Ingeborg Tryggvasdotter was the daughter of Tryggve Olafsson ( died 963 ) , the granddaughter of Harald Fairhair , and the sister of Olaf I of Norway .
Ole Wøhlers Olsen ( born 1942 ) is Denmark 's ambassador to Algeria .
Kaare Sundby ( 1 January 1905 -- 9 February 1945 ) was a Norwegian engineer who was executed during the occupation of Norway by Nazi Germany .
Prasutagus was king of a British Celtic tribe called the Iceni , who inhabited roughly what is now Norfolk , in the 1st century AD .
Gaston Kaboré ( born 1951 ) is a Burkinabé film director and an important figure in Burkina Faso 's film industry .
At the age of sixteen , Alexander Gerschenkron and his father fled Russia during the Bolshevik Revolution , and all he brought with him were two books : poetry by Alfred de Musset and a political history of 19th - century Europe .
Accamma Cherian was a freedom fighter from the erstwhile Travancore ( Kerala ) , India .
Manuel Andrada was born in 1890 on an estancia in Curumalal near Coronel Suárez , Buenos Aires Province , Argentina .
Ana Colchero Argones ( born 9 February 1968 in Veracruz . Mexico ) is a Mexican actress and economist .
Samuel Street Wilmot ( March 29 , 1773 -- December 1856 ) was a surveyor , tanner , farmer and political figure in Upper Canada .
Fatai Ayinla - Adekunle ( born May 6 , 1939 in Ibadan , Oyo ) is a retired amateur boxer from Nigeria , who is best known for winning the gold medal in the men 's heavyweight division ( + 81 kg ) at the 1973 All - Africa Games in Lagos , Nigeria .
Tanya Tagaq ( born Tanya Tagaq Gillis and sometimes credited as Tagaq ; born May 5 , 1975 ) is a Canadian ( Inuk ) throat singer from Cambridge Bay ( Iqaluktuutiaq ) , Nunavut , Canada , on the south coast of Victoria Island .
Scott Lanaway is a music artist from Toronto , Canada .
Ekkehart Schlicht ( born in 1945 , Kiel , Germany ) is a German economist .

Ernő Hetényi was the founder of the Buddhist society of Hungary in 1951 .
In 1989 Kiev Connolly and The Missing Passengers represented Ireland at the Eurovision Song Contest in Lausanne , Switzerland with Kiev 's song The Real Me .
Noé Jitrik was born in Argentina in 1928 and is one of Latin America 's foremost literary critics .
Donato Oliverio ( Cosenza , 5 March 1956 ) is the Bishop of the Eparchy of Lungro , a diocese of the Italo - Albanian Catholic Church in Calabria , Italy .
Count Victor Voss was born on the family estate at Schorssow in today Northeastern Germany to the Hungarian countess Elise Szapáry .
Emma Moynihan ( born c.1985 ) is a New Zealand netball player , a member of the Southern Steel team in the ANZ Championship .
André Kudelski obtained a degree in physical engineering from the École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne ( Switzerland ) in 1984 .
Dan Hilton ( born February 2 , 1968 ) is a political strategist and former Executive Director of the Conservative Party of Canada .

David Utrilla is the 31st member of the Utah Corps of Consuls and Honorary Consul to Peru in Utah .

Haswandi was a career judge in public courts under the Supreme Court of the Republic of Indonesia , where he decided and resolved criminal cases and civil cases .

Alice Davis was born in Dublin , Ireland , and was known professionally as Hope Temple .

Rose Zwi ( born 8 May 1928 ) is a Mexican - born South African - Australian writer best known for her work about the immigrants in South Africa .

Kamaruzaman Mohamad ( 1961 -- April 28 , 2014 ) was a Malaysian journalist and editor for Utusan Malaysia .
Christine Brückner was born in Schmillinghausen near Arolsen in Hesse , Germany , the daughter of the pastor Carl Emde and his wife Clotilde .
Kirsten Madsdatter ( died 1613 ) was King Christian IV of Denmark 's lover , and the mother of one of his three acknowledged , illegitimate sons , Christian Ulrik Gyldenløve .

Dimitar Andonovski ( Macedonian : Димитар Андоновски , born September 6 , 1985 in Bitola , SR Macedonia , SFR Yugoslavia ) is a Macedonian singer .

Denyss McKnight was born in Vancouver , Canada in January 1982 and spent much of his early years being classically trained on piano and music theory .

Bernard Thériault ( born November 12 , 1955 ) is a political figure in the province of New Brunswick , Canada .

Mike Watterson ( born 26 August 1942 in Chesterfield , England ) is an English former professional snooker player , businessman , entrepreneur and television commentator .
Emīlija Sonka ( born 4 November 1939 in Kuldīga , Latvia ) is a former track and road cyclist from Latvia .

Monique Martin , alias Gabrielle Vincent , was a writer and illustrator of children 's books from Belgium .

Cédric Marszewski , also known as Pilooski , is a French DJ . Manuel Ignacio de Vivanco Iturralde ( June 15 , 1806 -- September 16 , 1873 ) was a Peruvian politician and military leader who held the presidency of Peru from 1843 to 1844 .

Carl Bertil Agnestig , originally Andersson , born 7 March 1924 in Järvsö Parish , Sweden , is a Swedish music teacher and composer .

Sulochana Gadgil is an Indian meteorologist at the Centre for Atmospheric and Oceanic Sciences ( CAOS ) in Bangalore , India .

Bernd Stumpf ( * 16 . June 1940 in Jena ) is a football referee from Jena who served as a match official in the first division DDR - Oberliga of the former East Germany .

Nicolas Steno was born in Copenhagen on New Year 's Day 1638 ( Julian calendar ) , the son of a Lutheran goldsmith who worked regularly for King Christian IV of Denmark .

Paul Yule was born in Johannesburg , South Africa and his family emigrated to England when he was 8 years old .
Ali Akbar Saremi ( born in 1943 ) is an architect from Iran .
Necmettin Erbakan ( 29 October 1926 -- 27 February 2011 ) was a Turkish politician , engineer , and academic who was the Prime Minister of Turkey from 1996 to 1997 .
Faruk Myrtaj ( March 4 , 1955 ) born Selenicë , Vlora in Albania is an Albanian novelist , poet , translator and engineer .

Münci Kalayoğlu is a doctor from Turkey .

Thomas Wing ( 1810 - -1888 ) was a notable New Zealand master mariner , cartographer , harbourmaster and pilot .

Vital Alsar Ramírez was born on August 7 , 1933 , in `` Calle Alta '' in Santander , Cantabria , Spain .
Josef Thorak ( 7 February 1889 in Salzburg , Austria -- 26 February 1952 in Hartmannsberg , Bavaria ) was an Austrian - German sculptor .
Marilyn Ramos ( born 16 February 1991 ) is a South African designer , model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss South Africa 2012 , becoming the official representative of her country to Miss Universe 2013 and Miss World 2013 .
Theresa Andersson ( born 11 September 1971 , Gotland , Sweden ) is a singer - songwriter and multi - instrumentalist .

Mac DeMarco was born in Duncan , British Columbia , Canada , and raised in Edmonton , Alberta .
Patrick Ouart ( born May 25 , 1959 in Sallenelle , municipality of Pendé , France ) is a former French magistrate , and former personal advisor for justice to Prime Minister Edouard Balladur .
William Benjamin Robinson ( December 22 , 1797 -- July 18 , 1873 ) was a fur trader and political figure in Upper Canada .
Captain Robert Pearson ( May 18 , 1879 -- July 3 , 1956 ) was a soldier and politician from Alberta , Canada .
Mate Šestan ( born 1971 ) is a former football player , born in Croatia .
Saint Deiniol ( died 584 ) was traditionally the first Bishop of Bangor in the Kingdom of Gwynedd , Wales .
Sassa Jimenez ( born December 17 , 1987 ) is a fashion designer from the Philippines .
Rustam Khudzhamov made his debut for the Ukraine national football team in a friendly on 11 February 2009 against Serbia which Ukraine won 1 - -0 .
Masakazu Tashiro ( Japanese : 田代 真一 , born June 26 , 1988 in Meguro , Tokyo , Japan ) is a Japanese football player who currently plays for the Montedio Yamagata in the J. League Division 2 .
Desmond Patrick Costello ( 31 January 1912 -- 23 February 1964 ) was a New Zealand linguist , soldier , diplomat , university professor who was accused of being an agent for the Soviet GRU and of having sparked the first in a series of spy scandals in the 1960s which brought down the Macmillan government in the UK .
Warut Mekmusik ( Thai : วรุฒ เมฆมุสิก , born Junuary 2 , 1985 ) , or simply known as Rut ( Thai : รุฒ ) , is a professional footballer from Thailand He currently plays for Bangkok United in the Thai Premier League as a Goalkeeper .
Evangelos Katsioulis ( born 19 January 1976 , Ioannina , Greece ) is a Greek medical doctor and psychiatrist .

Hone Riiwi Toia ( 1858 - -1933 ) was a notable New Zealand tribal leader , prophet , religious leader and protester .
Hernando Urriago Benítez is a poet and essay writer who was born in Cali , Colombia in 1974 .

Saleem Raza ( born 5 July 1964 , Lahore , Punjab , Pakistan ) is a former cricketer .

Ila Pant is an Indian politician and former member of Lok Sabha from Uttarakhand state in India .
Thomas Vernon Griffiths ( 22 June 1894 - -23 November 1985 ) was a New Zealand music teacher and lecturer , composer .
Zenon Jankowski ( born November 22 , 1937 in Poznań , Poland ) is a retired Polish pilot , colonel of the Polish Army and cosmonaut .
Dr. Habiba Sarobi ( Persian : حبیبه سرابی‎‎ ) ( born 1956 ) is a hematologist , politician , and reformer of the post - Taliban reconstruction of Afghanistan .

Alfonso López Caballero ( born 17 August 1944 ) is a Colombian economist and diplomat , the son and grandson of former Presidents of Colombia , Alfonso López Michelsen and Alfonso López Pumarejo respectively , and former congressman , government minister , ambassador to France , Canada , the United Kingdom , and presidential candidate .
Laxman Dutta Joshi ( Nepali : लक्ष्मण दत्त जोशी ) is a Nepalese politician , belonging to the Communist Party of Nepal ( Maoist ) .
Xolile Yawa ( born 29 September 1962 in Lady Frere , Eastern Cape ) is a retired athlete from South Africa - ZA .
Ali Hassan Kuban ( 1929 , Gotha , Egypt -- 2001 ) was a Nubian singer and bandleader .
Nathan Straus was born to a Jewish family in Otterberg , Germany , the third child of Lazarus Straus ( 1809 - -1898 ) and his wife Sara ( 1823 - -1876 ) .
Sunny Suwanmethanon ( Thai : ซันนี่ สุวรรณเมธานนท์ , born 18 May 1981 in Thailand ) is a Thailand actor with Thai , Singapore and French descent .
Li Huirong ( Chinese : 李惠荣 ; pinyin : Lǐ Huìróng , born April 14 , 1965 ) is a retired triple jumper from People 's Republic of China , who set the first IAAF - recognized women 's triple jump world record of 14.54 metres on August 25 , 1990 at a meet in Sapporo , Japan .

Mieszko II Lambert ( Polish ; c. 990 -- 10/11 May 1034 ) was King of Poland from 1025 - -1031 , and Duke from 1032 until his death .

Richard Larter ( 19 May 1929 -- 25 July 2014 ) was an Australian painter , often identified as one of Australia 's few highly recognisable pop artists .

Arvid Hansen ( 1 March 1916 -- 13 February 1945 ) was a Norwegian resistance member who was executed during the occupation of Norway by Nazi Germany .
Ivan Čičmanec ( born 21 . August 1942 , Bratislava , Slovakia ) is a Slovak writer , poet , essayist and translator .
Maurizio Marchetto ( born February 13 , 1956 ) is a former ice speed skater from Italy , who represented his native country in three consecutive Winter Olympics , starting in 1976 in Innsbruck , Austria .

Fredrik K.B. is a Norwegian sculptor ( born 1978 in Oslo , Norway ) living and working nearby Amsterdam , Netherlands .
Peter Martin Orla Lehmann ( 15 May 1810 -- 13 September 1870 ) was a Danish statesman , a key figure in the development of Denmark 's parliamentary government .
Rıfat Ilgaz ( 7 May 1911 -- 7 July 1993 ) was a poet who was born in Cide , in the Kastamonu Vilayet of the Ottoman Empire ( present - day Turkey ) .
George Skeffington Connor , QC ( 1810 -- April 29 , 1863 ) was a lawyer , judge and political figure in Canada West .
Bal Kudtarkar is a radio personality from All India Radio , Mumbai .
Alessandra Mirka Gatti ( born Alessandra Gatti , 19 November 1969 , in Mantua , Italy ) is an Italian Eurobeat singer who is popularly known by her stage name of Domino .
Ifa Muaza claimed to have left his home in Nigeria because members of the proscribed Islamist group Boko Haram threatened to kill him if he did not join them .

Sir James Blindell ( 1884 -- 10 May 1937 ) was a Liberal Party politician in the United Kingdom , who served as the Member of Parliament ( MP ) for Holland with Boston from 1929 until his death .

Gabriel Tschumi ( 1883 - -27 April 1957 ) was a native of Switzerland who served as Master Chef to three British monarchs - Queen Victoria , King Edward VII and King George V.

Ahmad Toukan ( Ahmad Tuqan ) ( 15 August 1903 - -1981 ) was a Jordanian political leader of Palestinian descent who was the Prime Minister of Jordan from 26 September 1970 to 28 October 1970 .
