Sébastien Rémy ( born 16 April 1974 ) is a former Luxembourgian footballer , playing on the left side of midfield .
Jay Pond - Jones ( born 1 July 1957 in London ) is a British TV producer and writer .
Paul Verhaeghen ( born 1965 ) is a Belgian novelist , writing in his native Dutch .
Frank Sytner ( born 29 June 1944 in Liverpool ) is a British racing driver , a Life Member of the BRDC , and was the 1988 British Touring Car Champion , driving a BMW M3 .
Sirena Huang ( born May 18 , 1994 ) is a Taiwanese American concert violinist .
Barry Smyth ( 1973 , Keady , County Armagh ) is an Irish former head chef and restaurant owner .
Coleman O. Parsons , also Coleman Parsons , 1905 - 1991 , was a scholar , author and professor of literature , last as Professor Emeritus of English at CUNY 's City College .
Calum MacPherson ( born Cambridge England 1964 ) is a British character actor and musician .
Bill Tyquin ( 1919 - -1999 ) was an Australian rugby league footballer .
Kevin Ablett ( born 26 March 1958 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn , Richmond and Geelong in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Peter Baro ( 1534 - -1599 ) was a French Huguenot minister , ordained by John Calvin , but later in England a critic of some Calvinist theological positions .
Frederick Charles Porter ( 1832 - 1869 ) was an Australian miner and explorer of the Gippsland region of Victoria .
Branko Strupar ( born 9 February 1970 ) is a former Croatian - Belgian football striker .
Julius Mendes Price ( 1857 -- 29 September 1924 ) was an artist , war correspondent , explorer , traveller , journalist and caricaturist for Vanity Fair ( signed `` Imp '' , `` Jmp '' or `` jmp '' ) .
Portia Lee James DeGeneres ( born Amanda Lee Rogers ; 31 January 1973 ) , known professionally as Portia de Rossi /ˈpɔərʃə də ˈrɒsi/ , is an Australian American actress , model and philanthropist , known for her roles as lawyer Nelle Porter on the television series Ally McBeal and Lindsay Fünke on the sitcom Arrested Development .
Janez Stanovnik ( born 4 August 1922 ) is a Slovenian economist , politician , and former partisan .
Timothy Hodge ( born October 17 , 1985 ) , better known by his stage name Tim Vocals , is an American recording artist , singer , rapper and songwriter .
Anamika Choudhari ( also spelt as Anamika Chaudhary ) , born on July 7 , 1995 in Mariani , Jorhat of Assam belongs to Bengali/ Assamese Hindu family and was the winner in Zee TV 's children 's singing competition Sa Re Ga Ma Pa L'il Champs International .
Krista Woodward ( born 22 November 1984 ) is Canadian track and field athlete specialising in the javelin throw .
Stefan Sznuk , OC ( 1896 -- May 6 , 1986 ) was a pioneering Polish aviator , as well as an Air Force Major - General and was among the first to join the new Polish Air Force in 1919 .
Hirano Tsukasa ( Japanese : 平野司 , born 28 April 1983 in Osaka ) is a Japanese triathlete .
Paolo Isnardi ( c. 1536 - May 5 , 1596 ) was a late - Renaissance choirmaster and composer .
Anvari ( 1126 - -1189 ) , full name Awhad ad - Din ' Ali ibn Mohammad Khavarani or Awhad ad - Din ' Ali ibn Mahmud ( Persian : اوحد الدین علی ابن محد انوری‎ ) was a Persian poet .
Nazaria Lagos ( 28 August 1851 - 27 January 1945 ) was a caring and self - sacrificing patriot of the Revolution and the Philippine - American War .
Susan McMaster ( born 1950 ) is a Canadian poet , literary editor , spoken word / performance poet , and 2011 - 12 President of the League of Canadian Poets .
Corin Hewitt ( born 1971 ) is an American sculptor and photographer .
Ger Lynch ( born 10 December 1958 ) is an Irish former Gaelic footballer who played as a wing back for the Kerry senior team .
Fábio André da Silva Ferraz ( born 14 July 1985 ) , commonly known as Tiquinho , is an Angolan international footballer who plays as a right winger .
Nick Brandt ( born 1966 ) is an English photographer who photographs exclusively in the African continent , one of his goals being to record a last testament to the wild animals and places there before they are destroyed by the hands of man .
Gunn Wærsted ( born 16 March 1955 ) is a Norwegian businessperson , with prominent positions in finance and banking .
Harold Coward ( born 1936 ) is a Canadian scholar of bioethics and religious studies .
Jakob Sporrenberg ( 16 September 1902 -- 6 December 1952 ) was a SS - Gruppenführer und Generalleutnant der Polizei in Minsk , Belarus and Lublin , Poland .
Colin Seeley ( born Colin Jordan Seeley , 2 January 1936 in Crayford , Kent , England ) is an English former motorcycle retailer who later became a successful motorcycle sidecar racer , motorcycle designer , constructor and retailer of accessories .
Yvonne Antrobus ( born 1 November 1940 ) is a British novelist , abridger , radio dramatist , and actress .
Chhunly Pagenburg ( born 10 November 1986 ) is a German footballer of Cambodian descent , who played as a striker .
Aviva Cantor ( born 1940 ) is an American journalist , lecturer and author .
Nourdine Bourhane ( born 1958 ) is a politician from the Comoros and one of the Vice Presidents of the Comoros since May 2011 .
Mirjam Kristensen ( born 17 May 1978 ) is a Norwegian novelist and non - fiction writer .
Owen Medlock ( born 8 March 1938 ) is a former English footballer who played for Oxford United , Chelsea and Swindon Town .
Ioannis Chalkeus ( Aromanian : Joan Chalkeus , Greek : Ιωάννης Χαλκεύς , 1667-between 1730 and 1740 ) or Chalkias , was an Aromanian scholar , philosopher and figure of the modern Greek Enlightenment .
Patricia van der Vliet ( born 14 July 1989 ) is a Dutch fashion model , who placed fourth in the fourth cycle of the reality television show Holland 's Next Top Model .
Shykh Seraj ( born 28 June 1956 ) is a Bangladeshi journalist , media personality and agriculture development activist .
Denise Johns ( born 9 December 1978 ) is a professional beach volleyball player .
Georgios Panagiotopoulos ( Greek : Γεώργιος Παναγιωτόπουλος ; born 12 August 1969 ) is a retired Greek sprinter who specialized in the 200 metres .
Teodosie Bârcă ( born Tătărăuca Nouă , Soroca District , 1894 - year of death unknown ) was a Bessarabian politician .
Varban Stamatov ( Bulgarian : Върбан Стаматов ) ( 27 May 1924 -- 23 November 1998 ) was a Bulgarian writer , marine novelist , publicist and editor .
David D'Antoni ( born 28 January 1979 ) is an Italian footballer who played over 150 games at Italian Serie B.
Douwe Eisenga ( born in 1961 , Apeldoorn ) is a Dutch composer .
Petros Fyssoun ( Greek : Πέτρος Φυσσούν ; born 5 October 1933 ) is a Greek actor in film and television .
Tô Linh Hương , ( born 1988 in Hanoi ) is a Vietnamese businesswoman , serving as Chairman and CEO of state - running real estate company Vinaconex - PVC ( PVV ) , a construction investment joint stock company .
Aldo Franchi ( 21 March 1882 Milan -- Unknown ) was an Italian racecar driver .
Richard Ringer ( born 27 February 1989 in Überlingen ) is a German athlete specialising in the long - distance and cross - country running .
Yiannis Dimitras ( Greek : Γιάννης Δημητράς ; born 1954 ) is a Greek singer .
Trefor Owen ( 20 February 1933 - -July 2001 ) was a Welsh amateur football centre half who played in the Football League for Leyton Orient .
Seán Dillon ( born 30 July 1983 ) is an Irish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Dundee United in the Scottish Premiership .
Mary Goelet , Duchess of Roxburghe ( a.k.a . May Goelet ) ( 1878 - 1937 ) was an American heiress and later Duchess .
Hans Groop , born 1932 in Vaasa is a Finnish yacht designer based in Helsinki .
Matthieu Tota ( born 26 September 1985 ) , commonly known as M. Pokora or Matt Pokora , is a French singer and songwriter .
Dara Horn ( born 1977 ) is an American novelist and professor of literature .
Nancy Folbre ( 19 July 1952 ) is an American feminist economist who focuses on economics and the family ( or family economics ) , non - market work and the economics of care .
Cemal Azmi ( 1868 -- April 17 , 1922 ) , also spelled Jemal Azmi , was an Ottoman politician and governor of the Trabzon Vilayet during World War I and the final years of the Ottoman Empire .
Adriana Faranda ( born 7 August 1950 ) is an Italian former terrorist , who was a member of the Red Brigades during the kidnapping of Aldo Moro .
Mark Bradly ( born 24 January 1977 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Melbourne Football Club in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) and for North Ballarat in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Else - Marie Lindgren ( born 1949 ) is a Swedish Christian democratic politician .
Rosemary Beresford ( born 1898 , date of death unknown ) was an American figure skater .
Ricardo Forster ( born 26 September 1957 ) is an Argentine philosopher , historian of ideas and political critic He is professor and researcher at Universidad de Buenos Aires and University of Maryland .
Mohammed Ali Abdallah Addarrat ( born 13 September 1975 Tripoli , Libya ) is a Libyan political activist .
Jack Woodford ( 1894 - -1971 ) was an American novelist and non - fiction writer , author of successful pulp novels and non - fiction of the 1930s and 1940s .
Abdelkarim Jouaiti ( Arabic : عبد الكريم جويطي ) ( born 1962 ) is a Moroccan novelist .
Stan Rodgerson ( 20 June 1894 -- 22 December 1955 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Paulina Guba ( born 14 May 1991 ) is a Polish athlete specialising in the shot put .
Peter Inman ( writing as P. Inman ) is an American poet who was born in 1947 and raised on Long Island .
Fergus Johnston ( born 21 May 1959 in Dublin ) is an Irish composer and member of Aosdána .
Josh Fraser ( born 5 January 1982 ) is a coach and former player of Australian rules football .
Terje Tvedt ( born 24 August 1951 ) is a Norwegian academic , author and film maker .
Abas Daud ( born 10 August 1969 ) is a FIFA registered referee since 2006 .
Czech artist Stanislav Lolek ( 1873 - 1936 ) is best known for his illustrations in the serialized novella ( daily comic ) Liška Bystrouška .
Frank A. Ready ( 1884 -- 1961 ) was a hotel man , working mostly in New York City from 1903 until his death in 1961 .
Keith W. Olson ( born 4 August 1931 ) is an award winning American author , historian and lecturer specializing twentieth - century history in the United States .
Orly Azoulay ( HE : אורלי_אזולאי ) ( Born : 1953 ) is an Israeli - American Journalist and Political Writer who works for Yedioth Ahronoth .
Martin Bulloch ( born 14 August 1974 ) is a Scottish musician , best known for being a member of Mogwai .
Steven M. LaValle ( born 1968 in St. Louis , USA ) is an American computer scientist , and Professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Illinois at Urbana - Champaign .
Matthew Baylis ( b. Nottingham , 1971 ) also known as Matt Baylis and M.H. Baylis is a British novelist , screenwriter and journalist .
Ola Jonsmoen ( born 9 July 1932 ) is a Norwegian educator , poet , novelist and children 's writer .
Irini Mouchou ( Greek : Ειρήνη Μούχου ; also transliterated as Mouhou by the International Triathlon Union ) ( born 7 January 1987 in Mytilene , Lesbos ) is a Greek professional triathlete and Greek National Champion of the year 2009 .
Miranda Tapsell ( born 1988 ) is an Indigenous Australian actress of both stage and screen , best known for her role as Cynthia in the Wayne Blair film , The Sapphires and her award winning 2015 performance as Martha Tennant in the Channel 9 drama series , Love Child .
Humphrey McQueen ( born 26 June 1942 ) is an Australian author , historian , and cultural commentator .
John Philip Elers ( 7 September 1664 -- 1738 ) was a Dutch potter , working in England .
Marie Ehrling is a Swedish Executive , ( Born 5 May 1955 ) .
John Rocca ( born 23 September 1960 , London , England ) became known first as a dance music performer , remixer and record producer .
Jan Mortel ( baptized 16 October 1652 -- 15 October 1719 ) was a Dutch Golden Age flower painter .
Ham Kee - yong ( born November 14 , 1930 ) is a former South Korean athlete , best known as the winner of the 1950 Boston Marathon .
Justin Crawford ( born 20 March 1977 in Finley ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Sydney and Hawthorn in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) during the 1990s .
Jonathan Phillippe ( born 24 January 1988 in Navarro ) is an Argentine Striker who currently plays for America de Cali .
Stonebwoy is the stage name of Livingstone Etse Satekla ( born 1988 ) , a Ghanaian afropop , dancehall and reggae artiste and is the CEO of Burniton Music Group .
Máire Nic an Bhaird ( Irish pronunciation : ( ˈmˠaːɾʲənʲəcəˈwaːɾʲdʲ ) ; English : Moira Ward ; born 1982 ) is a secondary school teacher and Irish language activist from Dunmurry , County Antrim in Northern Ireland .
Beno Axionov(Belarusian : Бэна Максавіч Аксёнаў ; Russian : Бэно Максович Аксёнов , Beno Maksovich Aksyonov , Romanian : Băno Axionov ; born 2 April 1946 ) is a Russian - Moldovan actor , director , drama teacher , screenwriter .
Don Coppersmith ( born c. 1950 ) is a cryptographer and mathematician .
Josh Tenge ( born December 1978 ) is a professional sandboarder who has won four world championships and five national titles .
Adrian Georg Iselin ( 1818 - 1905 ) was a New York financier who invested in and developed real estate , railroads , and mining operations .
Franklin B. Ware ( 1873 - -May 3 , 1945 ) was an American architect , best known for serving as the state architect of New York from 1907 to 1912 .
Charlie Dore ( born 1956 , Pinner , Middlesex ) is an English singer - songwriter and actress .
Titus Flavius Justus ( Greek : Τίτος Θλάβιος Ίούστος , born 76 ) was an aristocratic , wealthy Roman Jew .
Mohammad Talha ( born 15 October 1988 ) is a Pakistani right - arm fast - medium bowler .
Graciela Chichilnisky ( born 1944 ) is an Argentine American mathematical economist and an authority on climate change .
John Holladay ( March 10 , 1798 -- December 31 , 1861 ) was a founder and namesake of the settlement of Holladay 's Burg , Utah Territory , which became Holladay , Utah .
Barent van Kalraet , or Barent Pietersz Calraat ( 16 August 1649 - 9 February 1737 ) was a Dutch Golden Age painter and the younger brother of Abraham Calraet .
Costas Papacostas ( Greek : Κώστας Παπακώστας ; 12 November 1939 -- 21 September 2015 ) was the Cypriot Minister of Defence from 2008 to 2011 .
Declan Bennett ( born 20 March 1981 ) is an English singer - songwriter and actor .
Lapidar Lladrovci(born 15 December 1990 in Gllogovc ) is an Kosovon professional footballer who plays for Kukësi in Albanian Superliga .
Russ Kick ( born 1969 ) is an American writer , editor , publisher and conspiracy theorist .
Zhou Zhengyi ( Chinese : 周正毅 ; pinyin : Zhōu Zhèngyì ; born 23 April 1961 , in Yangpu District , Shanghai ; Known in Hong Kong as Chau Ching Ngai ) is a prominent businessman and property developer from Shanghai , China .
Gabriel Hallevy ( born 1973 ) is full professor of criminal law , criminal justice , evidence law , conflict of laws , corporation law and hi - tech law at the Faculty of Law , Ono Academic College , the largest faculty of law in Israel .
Prasad Priyankara Wickramasinghe ( born 12 May 1977 , Colombo ) was a Sri Lankan cricketer who played for the Bloomfield Cricket and Athletic Club , Sri Lankan A team and the Sri Lankan Board XI .
Igor Duljaj ( Serbian Cyrillic : Игор Дуљај ; born 29 October 1979 ) is a retired Serbian professional footballer .
Richard Rothwell ( 20 November 1800 -- 13 September 1868 ) was a nineteenth - century Irish portrait and genre painter .
Samuel Emmanuel Suka ( born 10 September 1983 ) is a retired Beninese football player who last plays for Liberty Professionals .
Xavier de Le Rue ( born 1 July 1979 ) is a French big mountain snowboarder , who started his pro career competing on the Boardercross pro tour ( organized at the time by the International Snowboard Federation ) .
Knut Aalefjær ( born 21 December 1974 in Bærum ) is a Norwegian jazz musician ( drums and percussion ) , and composer , educated at the Norwegian Academy of Music .
Margaret Starbird ( born 18 June 1942 ) is the author of seven books arguing for the existence of a secret Christian tradition that held Jesus was married to Mary Magdalene , calling it the `` Grail heresy '' , after having set out to discredit the bloodline hypothesis contained in The Holy Blood and the Holy Grail .
Jenni Williams ( born 1962 ) is a Zimbabwean human rights activist and founder of Women of Zimbabwe Arise ( Woza ) .
Jaromír Tarabus ( born 21 March 1977 ) is one of the Czech top rally drivers ( 3rd overall in Czech rally Championship in 2010 , 2012 and 2013 . Title in group N 2006 . Titles in class N2 in 2001 , 2003 , 2005 . Title in class N1 in 2000 ) .
Duncan Chisholm ( born 31 October 1968 ) is a Scottish fiddle player and composer .
George A. Brown ( 1885 - 1940 ) was a Scottish businessman , and manager of the Rangoon Times from 1915 up until his death in 1940 .
Roger Dilkes ( born 16 August 1948 ) is an English former football referee who officiated in the Football League and Premier League .
Her Excellency Dr. Inonge Mbikusita - Lewanika ( born 10 July 1943 , Senanga ) is a Zambian politician who has served as Ambassador of the Republic of Zambia to the United States of America .
Vittorio Jano ( Hungarian : János Viktor ; 22 April 1891 -- 13 March 1965 ) was an Italian automobile designer of Hungarian descent from the 1920s through 1960s .
Tim Heaphy ( born 1964 ) is a white - collar criminal defense attorney , law professor and a former United States Attorney for the Western District of Virginia .
Herb Schmalenberger ( 1925 - June 27 , 2006 ) was a college football coach at UC Davis .
Đorđe Lašić or Đorđije Lašić ( 1906 - -1944 ) was a military officer of the Royal Yugoslav Army .
Grainger McKoy ( born in 1947 ) is an artist who draws inspiration from the dynamics of bird behavior .
Jacques Diouf ( born 1 August 1938 ) is a Senegalese diplomat who was Director - General of the United Nations ' Food and Agriculture Organization ( FAO ) from January 1994 to 31 December 2011 .
Goran Navojec ( born 10 October 1970 ) is Croatian actor , known for many roles on television series and in feature films .
Jordan Allan ( born 20 October 1998 ) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Wolverhampton Wanderers , as a striker .
Anne Alvik ( born 7 May 1937 ) is a Norwegian physician and civil servant .
Daniel M'Naghten ( pronounced , and sometimes spelled , McNaughtan or McNaughton ) ( 1813 - -1865 ) was a Scottish woodturner who assassinated English civil servant Edward Drummond while suffering from paranoid delusions .
Jerome Davis Greene ( 1874 - 1959 ) was an America banker and a trustee to several major organizations and trusts including the Brookings Institution and the Rockefeller Foundation .
Mikhail Zubkov ( Russian : Михаил Зубков ; born 24 August 1968 ) is a retired Russian swimmer .
Susan Rogers Cooper ( born 1947 ) is an American mystery novelist from Austin , Texas .
Maria Fearing was born in slavery near Gainesville , Alabama in 1838 .
John Derhak ( b. 1957 ) is a Canadian - born , American novelist , writer , and historian .
Andrea Barzagli , Ufficiale OMRI ( Italian pronunciation : ( anˈdrɛa barˈdzaʎʎi ) ; born 8 May 1981 ) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a centre back for Italian club Juventus .
William Seton III ( b. in New York , 28 January 1835 ; d. there , 15 March 1905 ) was an American author , a novelist and popular science writer .
Dudley Cassidy ( 15 October 1912 -- 2 July 2003 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played with North Melbourne in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Charlotte Hodes ( born 1959 London ) is a Fine Artist living and working in London .
Sabine Bethmann ( born 25 October 1931 ) is a former German movie actress .
Chibuike Rotimi Amaechi ( born 27 May 1965 ) is a Nigerian politician who served as the 5th Governor of Rivers State from 2007 to 2015 .
Leo Oracion ( born 1974 ) reached the summit of Mount Everest on May 17 , 2006 , at the age of 32 .
Christopher Lewis ( born 1944 , Los Angeles ) is a writer and film producer , primarily for television .
Janusz Wojcieszak ( 1953 - -2012 ) was a Polish philologist and philosopher , specialist in the history , literature and culture of Latin America .
Ufot Ekaette ( born 1939 ) was appointed the first Nigerian Minister of Niger Delta on 17 December 2008 by President Umaru Yar'Adua .
Weng Shilie ( Chinese : 翁史烈 ; pinyin : Wēng Shǐliè ; born 1932 ) is a Chinese scientist and an expert in thermo - engine .
Thierry Noritop ( Terry Noritop ) , born in Paris on 5 April 1955 , is a French musician ( guitar , keyboards , programming and arranger ) , songwriter & producer .
Walter Scheidel ( born 9 July 1966 ) is an American historian who teaches ancient history at Stanford University , California .
Tim Kliphuis ( born 30 September 1974 in Utrecht ) is a Dutch violinist renowned for mixing gypsy jazz with classical and folk music .
Tiago Sousa ( born 29 October 1984 ) is a Portuguese athlete who competes in the modern pentathlon .
Elise Valmorbida ( born 1971 ) is an Italian Australian writer and creative writing tutor who currently lives in London .
Charles Honoris ( born in Jakarta , 23 July 1984 ) is a member of the Indonesian House of Representatives from the Indonesian Democratic Party - Struggle ( PDI - P ) .
Russell Noftsker was born February 1942 and went through his education to high school in Carlsbad , New Mexico .
Maama Molitika ( 26 August 1974 ) is a Tongan former rugby union footballer .
Linda S. Wilson ( born 1936 ) is an American academic administrator .
Gülzura Cumakunova was born 30 July 1954 in the Naryn Region of Kyrgyzstan .
Kyriakos Savvidis ( Greek : Κυριάκος Σαββίδης , born 20 June 1995 in Katerini ) is a Greek professional footballer who plays for PAOK FC as a midfielder .
Guy Melfort Baldwin was born 22 March 1865 at Penang , to Colonel A T and Margaret Baldwin .
Vijaya Raghunatha Raya Tondaiman I ( 25 August 1713 -- 28 December 1769 ) was the second independent ruler of the Pudukkottai kingdom .
Gregory Blake Smith ( born 1951 ) , is an American novelist and short story writer .
M.S. Krishna Iyer ( born 1934 or 1935 , Thrissur , Kerala , India ) , also known as Ambi Swamy , was an Indian chef and a restaurateur .
Courtenay Becker - Dey ( born 1965 ) is an American competitive sailor and Olympic medalist .
Saeed Malekpour ( Persian : سعید ملک‌پور‎ ; born May 1975 ) is an Iranian web designer .
Mary Bird Lake ( 1728 - -1796 ) was an English - born American nurse .
Jennifer Hornsby ( born 1951 ) is a British philosopher with interests in the philosophies of mind , action , language , as well as feminist philosophy .
Klaus M. Leisinger ( born 6 February 1947 in Lörrach ) is a social scientist and economist .
Eberhard Schorsch ( 30 December 1935 -- 14 November 1991 ) was a German physician , psychotherapist , psychiatrist , author and sexologist .
Gayle Mayes ( born 30 December 1956 ) is an Australian sprint canoer who competed in the early 1990s .
Johannes Heil ( born 3 Feb. 1978 ) is a German electronic music producer from Ober - Mörlen near Frankfurt .
Dalia Tórrez Zamora ( born 29 March 1990 in Managua ) is a Nicaraguan swimmer who competes in the Women 's 100 metre butterfly .
Harold Roy Killin ( born 18 July 1929 ) , known as Roy Killin , is a former professional footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Manchester United and Lincoln City .
Boyan Slat ( born 27 July 1994 ) is a Dutch inventor , entrepreneur and aerospace engineering student who works on methods of cleaning plastic waste from the oceans .
Georgina Papavasiliou ( born 13 January 1981 in Glasgow , Scotland , Great Britain ) is a Scottish figure skater who competed internationally for Great Britain and Greece .
Wilhelm August Wenz ( 21 October 1886 -- 12 September 1945 ) was a German malacologist , born in Frankfurt am Main .
Beatrice Halsaa ( born 7 December 1947 ) is a Norwegian political scientist , gender studies expert and feminist .
Margaret Saunders or Mrs Saunders ( born 1686 - c. 1748 ) was a British actress .
Li Chengliang ( Chinese : 李成梁 ; pinyin : Lǐ Chéngliáng ; Korean : 이성량 ; 1526 - 1618 ) was a Chinese general of Korean descent in the reign of the Wanli Emperor during the Ming Dynasty who was in charge of maintaining peace and relations with the Jurchen tribes .
Fahhad Mohammed Al - Subaie ( born 4 February 1994 ) is a Saudi athlete who specialises in the 200 metres .
Malcolm Craven ( born 1915 ) was a British motorcycle speedway rider who rode before and after World War II . Craven was born in Ilford , Essex in 1915 .
Arno Villringer ( born 1958 , Schopfheim , Germany ) is a director at the Max Planck Institute for Human Cognitive and Brain Sciences in Leipzig , Germany ; director of the Department of Cognitive Neurology at University Hospital Leipzig ; and Academic Director of the Berlin School of Mind and Brain and the Mind&Brain Institute , Berlin .
Elio Zamuto ( born 1 May 1941 ) is an Italian actor and voice actor .
Rabbi Yisrael Meir Uri Maklev ( Hebrew : ישראל מאיר אורי מקלב‎ , born 10 January 1957 ) is an Israeli politician and member of the Knesset for the Haredi party Degel HaTorah , which together with Agudat Yisrael forms the United Torah Judaism list .
Armine Nutting Gosling ( 1861 -- December 15 , 1942 ) was a suffragette , best known in Newfoundland for her involvement in the nascent Newfoundland women 's rights movement .
William Wellington Greener ( 1834 - -1921 ) was an innovative English gunsmith , the founder of the W. W. Greener company .
Şevket Sabancı ( born 1936 ) , a member of the Sabancı family in second generation , is a billionaire Turkish businessman and philanthropist .
Noel B. Salazar ( born 1973 ) is a sociocultural anthropologist known for his transdisciplinary work on mobility and travel , the local - to - global nexus , discourses and imaginaries of ' Otherness ' , heritage , cultural brokering and cosmopolitanism .
Walker O. Cain NA ( 1915 - June 1 , 1993 ) was a prize - winning American architect .
Juan Ignacio Londero ( born 15 August 1993 ) is an Argentine professional tennis player competing mainly on the ATP Challenger Tour both in singles and doubles .
Even Hovland ( born 14 February 1989 ) is a Norwegian footballer , who plays as a centre back for 1 .
John L. Parker , Jr. ( born 1947 ) is an American writer and the author of the cult classic novel Once A Runner and the more recently published Again to Carthage and Racing the Rain .
Alphonse Beni ( born 1946 ) is a Cameroonian actor and movie director .
Peter Erzberger ( born 3 September 1941 ) is a Brazilian former Olympic sailor in the Star class .
Kalpana Shah ( born 30 November 1948 ) is an Indian sari draper and stylist , author and entrepreneur .
Rod Davies CBE FRS ( 8 January 1930 -- 8 November 2015 ) was a Professor of Radio Astronomy at the University of Manchester .
Thomas FitzGerald , 10th Earl of Kildare ( 1513 - -1537 ) , also known as Silken Thomas , was a leading figure in 16th century Irish history .
Stefanos Dogos ( Greek : Στέφανος Ντόγος ; born 5 May 1994 in Veria ) , is a Greek footballer who plays for Aris , as a Winger .
Eduard Kanhäuser , also known as Edi ( born 18 September 1901 ) was an Austrian international footballer .
Linnar Viik ( born 26 February 1965 in Tallinn ) is an Estonian information technology scientst .
Janet Billig Rich ( born 1967 as Janet Sue Billig ) is an artist manager , music supervisor , producer , and Tony Award nominated Broadway theater producer .
Zvonko `` Toni '' Kurbos , better known as Tony Kurbos ( born 20 October 1960 ) is a retired Slovenian - German football player who was a prolific striker , scoring almost 100 goals in his relatively short career .
Damon Young ( born 1975 in Melbourne , Victoria ) is an Australian philosopher , writer and commentator , and author of the books Distraction , Philosophy in the Garden and How to Think About Exercise .
Shahed Ahmed ( born 13 September 1985 ) is an English footballer who plays for Sporting Bengal United , as a striker .
Brigitte Pelletier ( born 1964 ) is a Quebec lawyer and associate deputy minister of the Quebec Ministry of Justice .
Dermot Keely ( born 8 March 1954 ) is an Irish former manager and player .
Andreas Avgerinos ( Greek : Ανδρέας Αυγερινός ) ( 1820 - -1895 ) was a Greek politician from Elis .
Steven Bednarski ( born 1973 ) is a Canadian historian and actor .
Michael J. Cleary ( born 1 September 1925 ) is the Roman Catholic Bishop Emeritus of the Diocese of Banjul , Gambia .
Alaka Sahani ( born 1974 ) is an Indian film critic and Senior Assistant Editor with the Indian Express , Mumbai , and heads its Features section .
Thomas Arthur Darvill ( born 17 June 1982 ) , known professionally as Arthur Darvill , is an English actor and musician .
Edward Romanowski ( 30 July 1944 -- 11 November 2007 ) is a retired Polish sprinter who specialized in the 200 metres .
Hemlata Kala ( born 15 August 1975 in Agra , Uttar Pradesh ) is an Indian cricketer who has played seven women 's test matches and 74 women 's one - day internationals .
Luke Sullivan ( born 30 March 1961 , in Singapore ) is an Australian visual artist most notable for his internationally controversial work , The Fourth Secret of Fatima .
Tomo Križnar ( born 26 August 1954 ) is a peace activist , notable for delivering video cameras in Southern Kordofan to the local ethnic Nuba civilians in order to help them collect the evidence of North Sudan military 's war crimes against them .
Philip Lynch ( born 1946 ) is a prominent Irish businessman who has held the position of chief executive at two Irish public limited companies and multiple senior directorships including chairman of the board of An Post .
Huang Yijun ( simplified Chinese : 黄贻钧 ; traditional Chinese : 黄貽鈞 ; 4 May 1915 -- 11 October 1995 ) was a Chinese conductor and composer .
Héctor Abad Faciolince ( born 1958 ) is a Colombian novelist , essayist , journalist , and editor .
Georges Skandalis ( Greek : Γεώργιος Σκανδάλης ; born 5 November 1955 , Athens ) is a Greek and French mathematician , known for his work on noncommutative geometry and operator algebras .
Tripy Makonda ( born 24 January 1990 ) is a French football player who currently plays for the Portuguese club Académica de Coimbra in Primeira Liga .
Habbie Simpson ( 1550 - -1620 ) was the town piper in the Scottish village of Kilbarchan in Renfrewshire .
Simona Molinari ( born 23 February 1983 ) is an Italian pop music singer .
John Gregorek ( born 15 April 1960 ) is an American former middle - distance runner who competed in the Summer Olympics in 1980 ( boycotted ) and 1984 .
Matt Brann ( born on 14 November 1980 and hailing from Ajax , Ontario ) was Avril Lavigne 's drummer and previously held a position as the drummer of high school band Second Opinion and Norman .
Christina Sawaya ( Arabic : كريستينا صوايا‎ ) , born 16 August 1980 , is a Lebanese beauty queen .
Paolo Marsi or Paolo Marso , in Latin Paulus Marsus or Paulus Marsus Piscinas ( 1440 - -1484 ) was an Italian humanist and poet known primarily for his commentary on the Fasti of Ovid .
Hosea Nico Kaiyamo ( born 12 November 1961 ) is a Namibian politician and Businessman who was the first Regional Councillor for the Tsumeb Constituency and a Member of Parliament in the National Council .
Daniel Arnamnart ( born 14 September 1989 ) is an Australian competitive swimmer who specialises in backstroke events .
Jérôme Bicamumpaka ( born 1957 ) is a former Minister of Foreign Affairs for Rwanda 's Interim Government .
Rudie Kemna ( born 5 October 1967 ) is a former Dutch racing cyclist , currently a directeur sportif of Team Giant - Alpecin .
John Lafia ( born 1957 ) is an American film and television writer , director , producer and musician .
Paul Strudel or Paul Strudl ( circa 1648 -- 20 November 1708 ) was an Austrian sculptor , architect , engineer , and painter , ennobled as Baron von Strudel and Vochburg .
Theodor Kallifatides ( Greek : Θοδωρής Καλλιφατίδης , born 1938 ) is a Greek writer .
Barry Windsor - Smith ( born on 25 May 1949 ) is a British comic book illustrator and painter whose best known work has been produced in the United States .
David Goodfriend ( born 1968 ) is an American attorney and advocate in Washington , D.C. He is a former Clinton Administration aide , where he served as Deputy Staff Secretary to President William J. Clinton .
Trevor Thurling ( born 26 April 1984 ) is an Australian professional rugby league footballer for the Canberra Raiders of the National Rugby League competition ( NRL ) .
Jan Ksawery Kaniewski , also known in Italian as Francesco Saverio Kaniewski ( 1805 -- 13 April 1867 ) was a Polish painter trained in St. Petersburg who spent several years in Rome .
Jason Polan ( born 1982 in Franklin , Michigan ) is an American artist who currently lives and works in New York , NY .
Ivan Radeljić ( born 14 September 1980 ) is a Croatian - born Bosnian retired football player who played in defense .
Hadi Abbas ( 1915 -- 1990s ) was a football player and coach .
Tasia Sherel ( 23 July 1978 ) is an American actress and model , best known for starring as Francis in Showtime TV series Dexter and as Pam in Everybody Hates Chris .
Mary Lythgoe Bradford ( born 1930 ) is an editor and poet significant to Mormon literature .
Tim Etchells ( born 1962 ) is a British artist and writer based in Sheffield and London .
Paolo Angioni ( born 22 January 1938 ) is an Italian former equestrian and Olympic champion .
Patricia Anne Conlon , née Carden ( 2 November 1939 -- 13 December 1979 ) was an Australian feminist , public servant and labour activist .
Gordon Stuart ( 1924 -- 22 July 2015 ) was a Canadian - born Welsh portrait artist , known for his portrayals of Dylan Thomas .
Anna Journey ( born November 1980 in Arlington , Virginia ) is an American poet who was recently awarded a 2011 National Endowment for the Arts Fellowship for Poetry .
Renzo Finelli ( born 24 August 1945 ) is an Italian former middle distance runner .
Mabel Potter Daggett ( c. 1870 -- November 13 , 1927 ) was an American writer , journalist , editor and suffragist .

Phineas Pett ( 1 November 1570 -- August 1647 ) was a shipwright and a member of the Pett dynasty .

Ayhan Akman ( Turkish pronunciation : ( ajhan akman ) , born 23 February 1977 ) is a retired Turkish footballer who last played for Galatasaray .
Óscar Bruzón Barreras ( born 29 May 1977 ) is a former Spanish footballer and is the current assistant coach of Mumbai City FC in the Indian Super League .
Carl Friedrich von Siemens ( 5 September 1872 in Berlin -- 9 September 1941 in Heinendorf near Potsdam ) was a German Entrepreneur and politician .

Abubakar Siddique ( born 19 August 1936 ) is a Bangladeshi poet , novelist , short story writer and critic .
Harry Lippiatt ( 24 December 1917 -- 13 December 1997 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Essendon in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Robert Lightbody ( 1802 -- 5 July 1874 ) was an independent gentleman , amateur geologist and member of Ludlow Natural History Society .
Cosimo Perrotta ( born 1942 ) is an Italian professor of economic history at the University of Lecce and author of the book Consumption as an Investment .
Lucas Boada ( born 1893 in Matanzas - death date unknown ) was a Cuban baseball pitcher in the Negro leagues .
Richard Burthogge was the son of a Captain of Foot at the garrison of Plymouth , and was baptised in Plympton St Maurice on 30 January 1637 ( OS ; 1638 by the Gregorian calendar ) .
Alcide Laurin ( 1881 -- February 24 , 1905 ) was a Canadian ice hockey player who played for an Ontario based team in Alexandria , and is the first recorded player to die as a result of an on - ice incident in ice hockey .
Gordon Pickard ( born 1942 ) is a real estate developer and philanthropist and considered one of the richest businesspeople from the state of South Australia .
Patric Cabral Lalau ( born 25 March 1989 ) , commonly known as just Patric , is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a right back for Atlético Mineiro .
Sheila Forbes , CBE ( born 31 December 1946 ) , is a British educator , consultant and manager .
Hugh Speke ( 1656 -- c. 1724 ) was an English writer and agitator .
Anna Haslam ( 1829 - 1922 ) was a suffragist and a major figure in the 19th and early 20th century women 's movement in Ireland .
Ritva Koistinen ( born 1956 ) is a kantele artist and the founder of soloist kantele education at Sibelius Academy ( currently Classical music department ) .
Sheila Connolly ( born 1950 ) is a mystery writer and author of three mystery series published by Berkley Prime Crime .
Jason Briggs ( born 21 November 1971 in Sutton - in - Ashfield ) was a British pair skater .
Abolhassan Ziyā - Zarifi ( Persian : ابوالحسن ضیاظریفی‎‎ ; 20 August 1926 -- 4 October 2010 ) was an Iranian scientist , academic , author , and political figure .
Stephan Schulmeister ( * 26 August 1947 ) is an Austrian economist .
Andreas Wisniewski ( born 3 July 1959 ) is a German actor and former dancer .
Gary Goldschneider ( born 22 May 1939 ) is a writer , pianist and composer .
Vince Kelley ( born c. 1962 ) is an American - Australian former professional basketball player who played the majority of his career in Australia , which included three seasons in the National Basketball League ( NBL ) and 13 seasons in the State Basketball League ( SBL ) .
Francesco Pisani ( 1494 - -1570 ) was an Italian Cardinal , from 1517 .
Seamus Ross was born 12 November 1957 , the son of James Francis Ross , a philosopher , and Kathleen Fallon Ross , a nurse .
John Dalli ( born 5 October 1948 ) is a Maltese politician who served as Cabinet Minister in various Maltese governments between 1987 and 2010 .
Wendy Millar ( born 1944 ) also known as `` Bucket '' and `` Queen of the UDA '' is a Northern Irish loyalist and a founding member of the Ulster Defence Association ( UDA ) .
Derval O'Rourke ( born 28 May 1981 ) is an Irish former sprint hurdles athlete .
John Perceval , 2nd Earl of Egmont PC , FRS ( 25 February 1711 -- 4 December 1770 ) was a British politician , political pamphleteer , and genealogist who served as First Lord of the Admiralty .
Michael Lobo ( born 12 September 1953 ) is an Indian scientist , writer , and genealogist .
Dov Elbaum ( born on 21 December 1970 ) is an Israeli writer , editor , journalist , television host and Jewish philosophy lecturer .
Sir William Stanley Baker ( 28 February 1928 -- 28 June 1976 ) was a Welsh actor and film producer .
Callum Hart ( born 21 December 1985 ) is a Welsh semi - professional footballer who plays for Salisbury .
Kirsha Kaechele ( born 1976 ) is an American contemporary art curator , artist , and practitioner of sustainable architecture .
Bappi Lahiri ( Born Alokesh Lahiri on 27 November 1952 ) is a music composer in the Indian film industry .
Charles Walter Clark ( 1885 - -1972 ) was an architect that worked for the Metropolitan Railway from 1911 to 1933 and was responsible for designing 25 stations , five of which are listed buildings today .
Luca Scapuzzi ( born 15 April 1991 ) is an Italian professional footballer who plays as a striker of Calcio Como .
Dragan Aleksić ( 1901 - -1958 ) was a Yugoslavian Dadaist painter , founder of the Yugoslavian branch of Dadaism ( an art movement of the European avant - garde in the early 20th century ) , termed `` Yugo - Dada . ''
Gloria Jean Siebrecht ( born 1940 ) is an American amateur paleontologist and volunteer for the Museum of the Rockies , notable as the discoverer of Avisaurus Gloriae , which was named for her , and Piksi barbarulna .
Maurice Hepworth ( born 6 September 1953 ) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a full back for Sunderland and Darlington .
Parvatibai ( Marathi : पार्वतीबाई)(6 April 1734 -- 23 September 1763 ) was second wife of Sadashivrao Bhau .
John Scott Whiteley ( born 1950 ) is an English organist and composer .
Charles Louis de Fourcroy ( 1766 -- 1824 ) was a French mathematician , scholar and director of director of fortifications , known from his 1782 treatise , entitled `` Essai d’une table poléométrique ''
William Osgoode ( March 1754 -- January 17 , 1824 ) was the first Chief Justice of Upper Canada ( now known as Ontario , Canada ) .
Sir John Monson , 2nd Baronet ( 1599 -- December 1683 ) was an English landowner and politician who sat in the House of Commons in 1625 and 1626 .
Saili Rane ( born 25 June 1993 ) is an Indian badminton player who currently plays Singles .
Luka Nervo ( Born 2 January 1991 ) is a Croatian professional motorcycle racer who currently competes in the FIM 600 STK class as of the end of 2009 .
William James Henderson ( December 4 , 1855 -- June 5 , 1937 ) was an American musical critic and scholar , born at Newark , New Jersey .
Nathaniel Stern ( born 1977 ) is an interdisciplinary artist who works in a variety of media , including photography , interactive art , public art interventions , installation , video art , net.art and printmaking .
Anita Krohn Traaseth ( born 16 December 1971 in Sandefjord ) is a Norwegian business executive and author .
Walter Seymour Allward ( 18 November 1876 -- 24 April 1955 ) was a Canadian monumental sculptor widely praised for his `` ... original sense of spacial composition , his mastery of the classical form and his brilliant craftsmanship . ''
Khari Stephenson ( /ˈkæri/ ; born 18 January 1981 ) is a Jamaican footballer .
Oki Dwi Putra Sanjaya ( born 23 October 1983 ) is an Indonesian professional football referee .
François Pérol ( born on the 6 November 1963 ) is a French banker and high - ranking official and is the current chairman of Natixis .
Stefanie van der Gragt ( Dutch pronunciation : ( ˈsteːfaːni vɑn dɛr ɣrɑxt ) ; born 6 August 1992 ) is a Dutch footballer .
Jens Henrik Tönjum ( born 17 May 1995 ) is a Swedish - born Norwegian professional ice hockey winger .
Sir John Micklethwaite M.D. ( 1612 - -1682 ) was an English physician , who attended Charles II . He was President of the Royal College of Physicians .
Karl Owe Sandström , ( born 1944 ) is a Swedish clothing designer and teacher , he is perhaps best known for designing all of the music group ABBAs stage outfits except their Waterloo costumes at the Eurovision Song Contest 1974 .
Cem Kargın ( born 20 March 1978 ) is a Turkish professional retired footballer played as a left back .
Sonja Christ was born on 1 October 1984 in Oberfell and comes from a Moselle country vintner and innkeeping family .
Sir Richard Steele ( bap . 12 March 1672 -- 1 September 1729 ) was an Irish writer and politician , remembered as co - founder , with his friend Joseph Addison , of the magazine The Spectator .
Eli Kirk Price II ( 1860 - -January 24 , 1933 ) was a prominent Philadelphia lawyer , called `` the foremost civic and cultural leader in early twentieth - century Philadelphia '' .
Barkley L. Hendricks ( born 1945 , Philadelphia , Pennsylvania ) is a contemporary American painter who has made pioneering contributions to black portraiture and conceptualism .
Stephen Wallem ( born 14 June 1968 ) is an American stage and television actor .
Dale Connelly ( born 4 October 1955 ) was co - host ( with Tom Keith , aka Jim Ed Poole ) of The Morning Show on Minnesota Public Radio .
Milán Václavík ( 28 March 1928 -- 2007 ) was a Slovak - origin Czechoslovak military officer with the rank of colonel general .
Chris Hollow ( born 21 November 1971 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with St Kilda in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) .
George Caffentzis ( born 1945 ) is an American political philosopher and an autonomist Marxist .
Pierre Celis ( 21 March 1925 -- 9 April 2011 ) was a Belgian brewer who opened his first brewery in 1966 to revive the wit beer style in his hometown of Hoegaarden .
Araceli de León ( 1951 -- October 2 , 1999 ) was a Latin American voice actress best known for voicing Sailor Jupiter in the Mexican / Latin American dub of Sailor Moon .
Andrea Collarini ( born 31 January 1992 in New York City ) is an Argentinian--
Wilfrid Denis Walker ( born 29 December 1933 ) , is a former Rhodesian cabinet minister resident in the United Kingdom .
Marcel Detienne ( born 1935 ) is a Belgian historian and specialist in the study of ancient Greece .
George Agathocleous ( born 23 January 1982 ) is a Cypriot rugby player who plays for the Cyprus national rugby union team and the Paphos Tigers .
Nicholas Carthy ( born 1957 ) was a Principal Conductor of the Orchestra della Svizzera Italiana ( 1993 - 96 ) , is Professor of Music and Opera Music Director at the University of Colorado and is visiting tutor at the Royal Northern College of Music .
Chandos Leigh , 1st Baron Leigh ( 27 June 1791 -- 27 September 1850 ) was a British landowner and minor poet .
Břetislav Hůla ( 1888 - -1937 ) was a leading cadre of Comintern in 1923 - -24 .
Jimmy Cornell ( real name : Dragoș Corneliu Cișmașu ) was born in Romania in 1940 , growing up in Brașov .
Tony Martyn ( born 9 March 1957 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for Melbourne in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) , Port Adelaide in the South Australian National Football League ( SANFL ) and with TANFL club Sandy Bay .
Abdul Milazi ( born 1966 ) is a life coach , motivational speaker , multi - award winning poet , author , musician and entrepreneur .
Tian Zhong ( Chinese : 田中 ; born 1956 ) is a vice - admiral ( zhong jiang ) of the People 's Liberation Army Navy ( PLAN ) of China .
Allan Gauden ( born 20 November 1944 ) was an English former professional footballer .
Richard Leslie Hill ( 18 February 1901 -- 21 March 1996 ) was an English civil servant and historian of Sudan , `` one of the great pioneers in the study of the modern history of the Sudan '' .
Teklit Teweldebrhan ( born 1 October 1993 ) is an Eritrean runner who has specialized in various middle - distance and long - distance disciplines .
Per Bronken ( 13 March 1935 -- 4 October 2002 ) was a Norwegian poet , novelist , actor and stage producer .
Blagoja Gesoski ( Macedonian : Благоја Гесоски , born 28 April 1981 ) is a Macedonian football striker and attacking midfielder who has played for clubs in Macedonia , Greece and Albania .
Emma Must ( born 1966 ) is an English environmental activist , teacher , and poetwho previously worked as a librarian .
Johannes De Decker ( born 1626 in Dordrecht , Holland ) was one of the six signers of the articles of capitulation of New Amsterdam to the British September 6 , 1664 .
Eustace Ingram ( 6 August 1839 - 10 December 1924 ) was a British organ builder based in London .
Michael Josephs ( born 1959 ) is an award - winning American film and television score composer .
Byron Adams ( born 1955 ) is an American composer , conductor , and musicologist .
Cayetano Pignatelli , 3rd Marquis of Rubí , 9th Baron of Llinars , ( 12 October 1730 - ? ) , was a Spanish nobleman and military figure who played an important role in determining Spanish policy towards Texas and Mexico .
Mohamed Mansi Qandil ( born 1946 ) is an Egyptian novelist and author .
Nur Hawa binti Zainal Abidin ( born 12 March 1991 ) now known as Wawa Zainal , is a Malaysian actress and model .
Parvin Dabas ( also known as `` Parvin Dabbas '' ) ( born 12 July 1974 ) is an Indian actor , model and director .
Ian Champion ( born 1968 in Portsmouth ) is an English film , theatre , television and voice actor who has appeared in television movies and soap operas such as Coronation Street , Emmerdale and Brookside .
Vestie Davis ( 1903 -- November 14 , 1978 ) was a self - taught American artist whose works are in many important collections , including those of the American Folk Art Museum , the Smithsonian American Art Museum , and the Milwaukee Art Museum .
Manuel Cardona Castro ( 7 September 1934 -- 2 July 2014 ) was a physicist .
Frederick Chase Capreol ( 10 June 1803 -- 12 October 1886 ) was an English - born Canadian businessman and railway promoter .
Mahmoud Yacine ( محمود ياسين ) ( born 19 February 1941 ) is an Egyptian actor .
Sewnarine Chattergoon ( born 3 April 1981 ) is a Guyanese cricketer of Indian descent who made his début for the West Indies against Zimbabwe on their 2006 tour .
Gladys Bernarda Casco Cruz ( b. 20 August 1954 ) is a Honduran politician .
Omid Bonakdar ( born 23 June 1969 ) is an Iranian director and screenplay writer .
Blessed Costanza Starace ( 5 September 1845 -- 13 September 1921 ) was an Italian Roman Catholic nun .
Michael Van Wijk ( born 30 September 1952 ) is an English bodybuilder , professional sportsman , actor and TV presenter .
Victoria Redel ( born 1959 ) is an American poet and fiction writer who lives in New York City .
Laura Ross - Paul ( born 1950 ) is a contemporary painter of oil and wax in the Pacific Northwest of the United States .
Katharina Lehnert ( born 18 February 1994 ) is a Filipino - German tennis player .
Denis Hugh Vercingetorix Brogan ( born 20 March 1936 ) , known as Hugh Brogan , is a British historian and biographer .
Ron O'Dwyer ( born 5 February 1938 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Carlton and Collingwood in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Ghulam Hussain Saba Dashtyari ( 1954 -- 1 June 2011 ) ( Balochi : صبا دشتیاری بلوچ ) commonly known as `` Saba Dashtyari '' , was a professor of Islamic Studies at the University of Balochistan in Quetta , Balochistan .
Jack Chernos ( born 1961 ) is a San Francisco - based activist singer / songwriter .
Stian Bjørge ( born 31 July 1976 ) is a Norwegian speed skater , born in Skien .
Verena von Strenge ( born 27 July 1975 ) is a German singer and dancer best known for her stint as the lead singer for the German happy hardcore dance group Dune from 1995 - 1997 and 1999 - 2000 .
Stewart Till , CBE ( born 1951 ) is the chairman and chief executive of United International Pictures , the biggest film distributor in the world .
Spruha Joshi ( born 13 October 1989 ) is an Indian television , film , and theatre actress , who works in the Marathi film and television industry .
Wickrama Arachchige Udaya Wickramasinghe ( 12 August 1939 -- 12 April 2010 ) was a Sri Lankan cricket umpire .
Jim Carvin ( 1929 -- January 16 , 2009 ) was a New Orleans political consultant with a sustained record of supporting winners in New Orleans mayoral elections .
Gabriela Perianu ( born 20 June 1994 ) is a Romanian handballer who plays for the Romanian national team .
Xu Feihong ( Chinese : 徐飞洪 ) ( born June 1964 ) is a Chinese diplomat .
Katë Dulaj ( Serbian : Ката Дулај , Kata Dulaj ) ( 9 November 1923 - -29 April 1969 ) , known by her artistic name Katarina Josipi - Kati , was a Yugoslav actress of Albanian ethnicity .
Francisco Javier Peral Periane ( born 4 November 1983 ) , known as Javito , is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Greek club Panthrakikos F.C. as a right winger .
General Elly Tumwine ( born 12 April 1954 ) is a Ugandan military officer , professional artist , and educator .
John Russon ( born 1960 ) is a Canadian philosopher , working primarily in the tradition of Continental Philosophy .
Agnes of Kuenring ( born about 1236 ) , was an Austrian noblewoman , courtierwoman of Queen Margaret of Austria and mistress of her husband , King Ottokar II of Bohemia .
Mandy Giblin ( born 27 June 1974 ) is a former Australian middle - distance runner and cross country athlete who competed in late 1990s .
Keegan McHargue ( born 1982 in Portland , Oregon ) is an American artist known for his dream - like drawings and paintings .
Nagabhairava Jaya Prakash Narayana ( born 14 January 1956 ) , also known as J.P. , is an Indian politician .
Naón Isidro ( Hebrew : נאון איזידורו‎ ; born 12 November 1987 ) is an Argentine - Israeli association football who has been a free agent since he was released from Hapoel Ashkelon in June 2011 .
Stephen Maybery ( born September 1949 ) is an author specialising in political satire .
Kang Min , also known as Nal_rA ( born 15 March 1982 ) is a former professional South Korean StarCraft player ( Protoss , KTF MagicNs ) .
John Zdechlik ( `` Zuh - DEK - lik '' ) ( born 2 May 1937 ) is an American composer , music teacher , and conductor .
Boris Kocheishvili ( Russian : Бори́с Петро́вич Кочейшви́ли ; born April 1 , 1940 ) is an artist and poet who lives and works in Moscow , Russia .
Andřej Studenič ( born 18 June 1977 in Bratislava ) is a racing driver .
Susan Crile ( born 1942 ) is an American painter and printmaker .
Wilma B. Liebman ( born 1950 ) is an American lawyer and civil servant who is best known for serving as a Member of the National Labor Relations Board ( NLRB ) .
Richard Shepard ( born 1965 ) is an American film , television director and screenwriter .
Finghin Collins ( born 31 March 1977 ) is an Irish pianist .
Merete Pedersen ( born 30 June 1973 ) is a Danish former football striker who played for Vejle BK and Odense BK in the Elitedivisionen , TSV Siegen in the German Bundesliga and Torres CF in Italy 's Serie A , taking part in the UEFA Women 's Cup with Odense and Torres .
Otto Beyeler ( born 7 July 1926 ) was a Swiss cross country skier who competed in the 1950s .
Jostein Stordahl ( born 20 May 1966 ) is a Norwegian disabled sportsperson .
Elena Langer ( born Moscow , 8 December 1974 ) is a Russian - born British composer of operas and other contemporary classical music .
Dr. Heinz Schimmelbusch ( born 1944 ) is the Chief Executive Officer of AMG Advanced Metallurgical Group N.V. ( `` AMG , EURONEXT AMSTERDAM : ' ' AMG `` ) .
Perry Criscitelli ( born 1950 ) is a New York restaurant owner who is an alleged member of the Bonanno crime family .
Felix Neureuther ( German pronunciation : ( ˈfeːlɪks ˈnɔʏʁɔʏtɐ ) ; born 26 March 1984 ) is a German World Cup alpine ski racer .
Vicente Juan Segura ( born 22 May 1955 ) is the bishop of Ibiza since his episcopal ordination on 14 May 2005 .
Edward Holt ( born 1879 ) was an English footballer .
Antoine Kombouaré ( French pronunciation : ​(ɑ̃.twan kɔ̃.bwa.ʁe ) ; born 16 November 1963 ) is a former French footballer and the current manager of RC Lens .
François Bourdoncle ( born 1964 ) is founder and Chief Strategist of the search engine company Exalead .
Zavis of Falkenstein ( Czech : Záviš z Falkenštejna ; c. 1250 -- 24 August 1290 ) , a member of the Vítkovci dynasty , was a Bohemian noble and opponent of King Ottokar II .
