Johannes Brotherus ( born 1997 in Helsinki ) is a Finnish actor and musician who is best known for starring in a 2013 Pirjo Honkasalo film Concrete Night .
Stojan Srdić ( Cyrillic Стојан Срдић ; Glamoč 20 September 1950 ) is a Serbian playwright and novelist who lives in Belgrade .
Glenn Tilton ( born April 1948 , in Washington , D.C. ) was Midwest Chairman and a member of the Executive Committee , at JP Morgan Chase ( NYSE : JPM ) , a position he has held from June 6 , 2011 to 2014 .
Alois Lunzer ( 1840 - - ? ? ) , was an Austrian - born watercolour painter , who emigrated to Philadelphia and specialised in doing botanical illustrations .
Huping Ling ( Chinese : 令狐萍 ; pinyin : Lìnghú Píng ) ( born 1956 ) is a Professor of History , the founder of the Asian Studies Program , and the past department chair at Truman State University .
Richard Cavendish , 2nd Baron Waterpark FSA ( 13 July 1765 -- 1 June 1830 ) , was an Anglo - Irish politician and peer .
Tong Shiping ( Chinese : 童世平 ; pinyin : Tóng Shìpíng ; born July 1947 ) is a retired admiral of the People 's Liberation Army Navy ( PLAN ) of China .
Cui Shaopeng ( Chinese : 崔少鹏 ; born October 1961 ) is a Chinese politician and a discipline official of the Communist Party of China .
Liana Fiol Matta ( born 1946 ) is a Puerto Rican jurist and the current and 16th Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Puerto Rico .
Borisav Jović ( Serbian Cyrillic : Борисав Јовић , pronounced ( jǒːʋit͡ɕ ) ; born 19 October 1928 ) is a former Serbian communist politician , who served as the Serbian member of the collective presidency of Yugoslavia during the late 1980s and early 1990s .
Lindsay Doran ( c. 1949 ) is an American film producer and studio executive who has worked on such films as This Is Spinal Tap , Ferris Bueller 's Day Off , Sense and Sensibility , Stranger Than Fiction , and Nanny McPhee .
Matthew Smailes ( born 25 March 1899 in Lancaster , Lancashire ) was an English footballer who played for West Ham United and Coventry City as a half - back .
Marc Woolnough ( born 20 May 1980 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played six games for Geelong in 1998 and 2002 .
Frank Deayton ( 2 June 1921 -- 17 October 2004 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Melbourne in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) .
Alexandr Zaboev ( Russian : Александр Забоев , born 1 September 1989 ) is a Russian pair skater .
Maggie Batson ( born August 7 , 2003 in Shawnee Mission , Kansas ) is an actress , business owner , and philanthropist .
Tommy Cheung Yu - yan , GBS , JP ( Chinese : 張宇人 , born 30 September 1949 in Hong Kong ) is a member of the Legislative Council of Hong Kong ( LegCo ) , representing the catering industry in functional constituencies seats .
Robert Dessaix ( born 17 February 1944 ) is an Australian novelist , essayist and journalist .
Reem Al Numery ( born 1996 ) is a children 's rights activist in Yemen .
Francesca Marsaglia ( born 27 January 1990 ) is an Italian alpine skier .
Derek Heasley ( born 15 January 1972 , Lisburn , Northern Ireland ) is an Irish cricket player .
John Parris ( born 1952 ) , of Forest Hill , London , England , is one of the most renowned manufacturers of handmade snooker cues in the world .
Philippe Capdenat ( born 17 July 1934 ) is a French composer and academic teacher .
Liam Dick ( born 19 August 1995 ) is a Scottish professional footballer currently playing for Stranraer , on loan from Falkirk .
Hans Deuss ( born Amsterdam , 1948 ) is a Dutch realist painter .
Robert Danhi ( born July 19 , 1970 ) is an American research chef and food writer specializing in Southeast Asian Cuisine .
Samuel Frederick Biery Jr. ( born 1947 ) is a United States district judge of the United States District Court for the Western District of Texas Born in McAllen , Texas , Biery received a B.A. from Texas Lutheran College in 1970 and a J.D. from Southern Methodist University School of Law in 1973 .
Fili Seru ( born 11 March 1970 ) is a Fijian rugby footballer player who represented Fiji in the 1991 Rugby Union World Cup and the 1995 Rugby League World Cup .
Isabel Marshal ( 9 October 1200 -- 17 January 1240 ) was a medieval English countess .
Zhang Jianya ( Chinese : 张建亚 ) ( born 1951 ) is a Chinese film director .
Barry Maitland ( born 1941 in Scotland ) is an Australian author of crime fiction .
Joel Elkes ( pronounced el '' kez ) ( 12 November 1913 , Königsberg -- 30 October 2015 , Sarasota ) was a leading medical researcher specialising in the chemistry of the brain .
John Joseph Brennan ( 1913 - -1976 ) , usually known as John Brennan , was a Northern Irish politician .
Bart Smits ( born 17 March 1972 in Oss ) is a Dutch heavy metal singer .
Friedhelm Gehrmann ( born 12 June 1939 in Dortmund ) is a German scientist in economics and social sciences .
Khenpo Gangshar Wangpo ( b. 1925- ? ) was a highly respected lama in Eastern Tibet and one of the primary teachers of Chögyam Trungpa Rinpoche ( the 11th Trungpa tulku ) and the 9th Thrangu Rinpoche .
Aleksei Lotman ( also known as Alex Lotman and Aleks Lotman ; born 6 May 1960 in Leningrad ) is an Estonian biologist , environmentalist and politician .
Slobodan Šiljak ( 1881 in Pljevlja -- December 5 , 1943 in Pljevlja ) was a Montenegrin priest in the Serbian Orthodox Church who was sainted by the church in 2005 .
Ignas Gelžinis ( born 28 February 1991 ) is a Lithuanian racing driver , currently racing in Porsche Carrera Cup Great Britain championship .
Jagath Balasuriya ( born 21 November 1940 ) is the Minister of National Heritage in the Sri Lankan government .
Nigel Pierre ( born 6 February 1979 in Saint Joseph ) is a football striker from Trinidad and Tobago , who manages Westside Superstarz .
Thor Iversen ( 1873 - -1953 ) was a Norwegian advisor to the Board of Fisheries .
Tony Cowards ( born 27 May 1973 ) is a British stand - up comedian and writer , currently living in the Cotswolds .
Denis Whitburn ( born 13 September 1944 ) is an Australian film writer and producer .
Thomas Harlackenden ( 1624 - -89 ) , of Maidstone and Woodchurch , Kent , was an English politician .
Alexander Vieweg ( born 26 June 1986 ) is a German track and field athlete competing in the javelin throw .
Didaco Philetari ( fl . 1645 ) was an Italian composer , presumably active in Germany , whose works are preserved in the Düben collection in Uppsala University Library .
Dr. Eric Widmer ( born 1940 in Beirut ) is an American scholar and educator .
Domenico Luca Morelli ( born 31 December 1987 ) is an Italian motorcycle racer who has competed in the 250cc World Championship , the Superbike World Championship and the Superstock 1000 FIM Cup .
Sally Tayler ( born 1961 ) is an Australian actress known for several ongoing roles in Australian soap operas .
Lifen Zhang ( born in 1962 ) is a British Chinese journalist , author and broadcaster .
María Lucila Beltrán Ruiz ( 7 March 1932 -- 24 March 1996 ) , more commonly known as Lola Beltrán , was a Mexican recording artist , actress , and television presenter .
Roberto Amodio ( born 20 October 1961 ) is a Director of football and a former Italian footballer .
Arthur Bancroft ( born 1907 ) was an English professional footballer who played as a centre half .
Veselin Vlahović also known as `` Batko '' or the `` Monster of Grbavica '' ( born in 1969 ) is a Montenegrin Serb war criminal whose crimes include genocide , rape , illegal detention and torture committed against Bosniaks and Croats in the Grbavica neighbourhood of Sarajevo during the Bosnian War .
Johann Mechtel was a chronicler ; b. 1562 in Pfalzel near Trier ( Germany ) ; d. after 1631 , perhaps as late as 1653 in Trier .
Giorgio Rassaval ( born circa 1928 ) is an Italian professional rugby league footballer of the 1950s playing at representative level for Italy , and at club level for Torino XIII , as a Centre , i.e. number 3 or 4 .
Michael Raelert ( born 29 August 1980 ) is a German triathlete who is the 2009 and 2010 Ironman 70.3 World Champion .
Milan Koprivarov ( Bulgarian : Милан Коприваров ; born 20 July 1983 in Ihtiman ) is a Bulgarian football player , currently playing for Austrian club ATSV Stadl - Paura .
Ulrika Bergquist , ( born 2 December 1969 ) is a Swedish journalist and television presenter who works for TV4 .
Keigan Parker ( born 8 June 1982 ) is a Scottish footballer who is currently a free agent after being released by Clyde .
Mustafa Çağrıcı ( born 1950 ) is a Turkish professor for Islamic theology and a former mufti of Istanbul .
Charles Atwood Kofoid ( 11 October 1865 -- 30 May 1947 ) was an American zoologist known for his collection and classification of many new species of marine protozoans which established marine biology on a systematic basis .
Stan Veit ( 25 December 1919 - 29 July 2010 ) was an entrepreneur and publisher who played an important role in the early days of the personal computer industry in the United States .
Moussa Ould Ebnou ( born 1956 ) is one of Mauritania 's greatest novelists .
Giovanni Domenico Zucchinetti ( 1735- after 1801 ) was an Italian organist , brother to the composer Giovanni Bernardo Zucchinetti whom he succeeded in 1765 as organist at the cathedrals of Varese and Monza .
Danielle Catanzariti ( born 16 February 1992 ) is an Australian actress and stage actress .
Mohammed Ayoob ( born 1942 ) is a Distinguished Professor of International Relations at Michigan State University 's James Madison College and the Department of Political Science .
Travis Simms ( born 1 May 1971 ) is a professional American boxer in the super welterweight ( 154 lb ) division .
Mary Ashley ( 1931 -- June 15 , 1996 ) was an important early video artist and performance artist , painter , and a founding member of the influential ONCE Group , together with her then - husband , the composer Robert Ashley .
Michel Sidibé ( born in 1952 ) is a citizen of Mali .
Joseph Lyman Silsbee ( 1848 - -1913 ) was a significant American architect during the 19th and 20th centuries .
Jeroen Dubbeldam ( born 15 April 1973 in Zwolle ) is a Dutch show jumping champion .
Ben Houge ( /hoʊɡ/ ; born 1974 ) is an internationally active American composer and audio designer .
Park Mi - hyun ( Hangul : 박미현 ; born 26 January 1986 ) is a South Korean field hockey player .
J. Clinton Shepherd ( 1888 - 1975 ) was an American magazine illustrator , sculptor and muralist .
Ruth Minsky Senderowicz ( born 3 May 1926 ) is a Holocaust survivor .
Anna Rose ( born 14 April 1983 ) is an Australian author , activist and environmentalist .
Maggie Helwig ( born 1961 ) is a Canadian poet , novelist , social justice activist and Anglican priest .
Suhani Pittie ( born 14 April 1981 ) is an Indian jewellery designer based in Hyderabad , India .
Martin Kolanda ( born 14 December 1977 in Prague ) is a Czech flatwater canoer who competed in canoe sprint and marathon on international level in years 1995 - 2007 .
Jason Kao Hwang ( born 1957 in Waukegan , Illinois ) is a Chinese American violinist and composer .
Alexandre Blaszyck ( born 8 January 1988 ) is a French épée fencer , team bronze medallist at the 2013 World Fencing Championships .
Leon Ray Livingston ( 1872 - -1944 ) was a famous hobo and author , travelling under the name `` A - No.1 '' and often referred to as `` The Rambler . ''
John Basten ( born 1947 ) is a judge of the Court of Appeal of the Supreme Court of New South Wales , the highest court in the State of New South Wales , Australia , which forms part of the Australian court hierarchy .
Jonathan Berger ( born , New York , 1954 ) is an American composer .
Philippe Ambroise Durand ( 1799 -- 11 February 1880 ) was a French abbé and chess writer .
Antonio Quatraro ( 1934 -- March 30 , 1993 ) was an Italian European Commission official , who fell to his death from an EU office building on Rue de la Loi , Brussels .
Guðjón Baldvinsson ( born 15 February 1986 ) is an Icelandic international footballer who plays professionally for Stjarnan .
Hippolytus de Marsiliis ( born 1451 Bologna ; date of death unknown ) was a lawyer and doctor utriusque iuris ( Lat . ' doctor of either law ' -- one who studied civil as well as canon law ) .
Charles - François Lebœuf , called Nanteuil ( 9 August 1792 -- 1 November 1865 ) was a French sculptor .
Etta Scollo ( born 27 May 1958 ) is an Italian singer and songwriter .
Jung Seol - bin formerly Jung Hae - in ( born 6 January 1990 ) is a South Korean football player for Incheon Red Angels and the South Korean national team .
Innocent Sagahutu ( born 1962 ? ) is a former Rwandan soldier , who is chiefly known for his alleged role in the Rwandan Genocide .
José de Jesús Rodríguez Martínez ( born 22 January 1981 ) is a Mexican professional golfer who currently plays on the Web.com Tour and the PGA Tour Canada , having previously played on the PGA Tour Latinoamérica and the Tour de las Américas .
Frederick W. Marks III ( born 1940 ) is an American historian and Catholic apologist .
Harold John Timperley ( 1898 - -1954 ) was an Australian journalist , known for his reporting in China in the 1930s and for authoring the book What War Means ( 1938 ) based on it .
Mabel Elsworth Todd ( 1880 -- 1956 ) is known as the founder of what came to be known as ' Ideokinesis ' , a form of somatic education that became popular in the 1930s amongst dancers and health professionals .
Margaret Frances Andrews ( 1894 -- November 2 , 1945 ) was a Newport , Rhode Island socialite and prize - winning show dog breeder .
Lin Junq - tzer ( Chinese : 林政則 ; pinyin : Lín Zhèngzé ) ( born 1944 ) is a Taiwanese politician .
Ann Brody ( 29 August 1884 -- 16 July 1944 ) , née Ann Goldstein , was an American film actress of the silent era .
Hans Sommer ( born c. 1914 ) is a German national who served as SS Obersturmführer ( First Lieutenant ) in the Sicherheitsdienst during World War II . After the war , he found a working relationship with Gehlen Org .
Nivaldo Batista Lima ( born 3 September 1989 ) , better known by his stage name Gusttavo Lima , is a Brazilian singer of sertaneja .
Mario Bonello ( born 28 January 1974 ) is a retired Maltese athlete who specialised in the sprinting events .
Trix Worrell ( born 1960 ) is a St Lucia - born writer , composer and director .
Are nt Magnin ( 13 January 1825 -- 19 September 1888 ) was a Dutch politician , who made a career in the administration on the Dutch Gold Coast and who later served as mayor in several Dutch municipalities .
Adela Yarbro Collins ( born 1945 ) is an American author and academic , who has served as the Buckingham Professor of New Testament Criticism and Interpretation at Yale Divinity School .
William H. Farrar ( 1826 -- November 21 , 1873 ) was an American politician who served as mayor of Portland , Oregon , in 1862 .
Bartholomew Broadbent ( born 11 January 1962 ) is an expert in wine , especially on Port and Madeira .
George the Hagiorite , George of Athos , Giorgi Mtatsmindeli or Giorgi Atoneli ( Georgian : გიორგი მთაწმინდელი , გიორგი ათონელი ) ( 1009 -- June 27 , 1065 ) was a Georgian monk , calligrapher , religious writer , and translator , who spearheaded the activities of Georgian monastic communities in the Byzantine Empire .
Chad Liddell ( born 21 January 1977 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played for Collingwood in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) during the 1990s .
Reinhard Merkel ( born 16 April 1950 ) is a professor in criminal law and philosophy of law and a retired West German swimmer .
Kelly Hunter ( born 6 September 1963 ) is a British film , television , radio , stage and musical actress , a member of the Royal Shakespeare Company and the National Theatre and in 1993 a Laurence Olivier Award nominee .
Leo Colovini is an Italian designer of German - style board games born in Venice 1964 .
Carol Grimaldi ( 1938 -- April 10 , 2014 ) was an American restaurateur and co - founder of Grimaldi 's Pizzeria .
Dave Benett ( born 1958 ) is a British society and celebrity photographer based in London .
Sydney Bourne ( c. 1857- 1930 ) was the first chairman of Crystal Palace F.C ..
Fatimah Busu ( born January 1943 ) is an award - winning Malaysian novelist , short - story writer , and academic .
Chris Whelpdale ( born 27 January 1987 ) is an English professional footballer who plays for Stevenage .
Celestine Cruz Gonzaga - Soriano ( born 20 January 1984 ) , better known as Toni Gonzaga , is a Filipino singer , television host , actress and comedienne .
James Bewick ( 21 December 1906 -- 1979 ) was an English footballer who played in defence for Newcastle United , Port Vale , Walsall , Yeovil & Petters United , and South Shields .
Aili Jõgi ( née Aili Jürgenson , born 25 May 1931 ) is an Estonian schoolgirl who on the night of 8 May 1946 , together with her school friend Ageeda Paavel , blew up a Soviet War reburial monument ( a wooden memorial topped with a star ) : the preceding monument to the Bronze Soldier in Tallinn .
Reginald Aspinwall ( born Preston , England , 3 January 1858 , died Lancaster , England , 26 February 1921 ) was an English painter .
Patrick Ross Broadfoot ( born 8 March 1985 ) is an English rugby union player from Lewisham , London , England who currently plays for National League 2 South side Old Elthamians as a Fly - half .
Nordin Jbari ( born 5 February 1975 in Saint - Josse - ten - Noode ) is a Belgian football player from Moroccan descent .
Malini Rajurkar ( born 28 January 1941 ) is a noted Hindustani classical singer of Gwalior Gharana .
Jonty Hurwitz ( born 2 September 1969 in Johannesburg ) is an artist , engineer and entrepreneur .
Hubert Creekmore ( 16 January 1907 -- 23 May 1966 ) was an American poet and author from the small Mississippi town Water Valley .
Ben Beams ( born 17 August 1978 ) is an Australian rules football player who played for the Melbourne Football Club in the Australian Football League ( AFL ) between 1999 and 2001 and the Tasmanian Devils Football club in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) from 2002 until 2006 .
William Walcot ( 10 March 1874 -- 21 May 1943 ) was a British architect graphic artist and etcher , notable as a practitioner of refined Art Nouveau ( Style Moderne ) in Moscow , Russia ( as Вильям Францевич Валькот ) .
Graeme Churchill ( born 20 July 1987 ) is a former Scottish football striker who played for Falkirk and Stirling Albion .
Lorenzo Civallero ( born 8 August 1975 ) is an Italian race walker .
János Kóka ( born 5 July 1972 ) is a Hungarian businessman , private investor , IT entrepreneur and manager of various enterprises , who served as Minister of Economy and Transport between 2004 and 2007 .
Tobias Lindemann ( born 1966 ) is a German architect , designer and media entrepreneur .
Janet Fielding ( born Janet Claire Mahoney , 9 September 1953 ) is an Australian actress , known for her role in the BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who as companion Tegan Jovanka .
Luis Rodolfo Peñaherrera Bermeo ( born 1936 ) is an Ecuadorian painter , portrait artist , and cartoon artist .
Oleksiy Tamrazov ( Ukrainian : Олексій Тамразов , born 23 January 1975 ) is a Ukrainian rally driver .
Masood Khadarpoosh ( 1916 - -1985 ) was a famous communist activist in Pakistan .
Pedro Manuel Torres ( born 18 March 1982 ) , known as Mantorras , is an Angolan retired footballer who played as a striker .
Phyllis Omido ( born Phyllis Indiatsi Omido c. 1978 ) , dubbed the `` East African Erin Brockovich '' , is a Kenyan environmental activist .
John S. Rumsfeld ( born 16 June 1964 ) is Professor of Medicine at the University of Colorado School of Medicine and National Director of Cardiology for the U.S. Veterans Health Administration .
Danny Bruder ( born 31 August 1969 in Berlin ) is a German musician / music producer , rapper / singer , author and composer .
Jason Della Rocca ( born 1974 ) is the former executive director of the International Game Developers Association ( IGDA ) :
John Claudius Beresford ( 23 October 1766 -- 20 July 1846 ) was a Tory UK Member of Parliament representing Dublin City 1801 - -1804 and County Waterford 1806 - -1811 .
James Bogle ( b 1959 ) is an Australian director and writer of films and TV .
Norman Carlyon ( born 5 May 1938 ) is an Australian former cricketer .
Timothy Toroitich ( born 10 October 1991 ) is a Ugandan middle - distance and long - distance runner .
Daisy Richards Bisz ( born Daisy Gammage in 1909 in Missouri - May 8 , 2007 in Miami , Florida ) , was a prominent Florida attorney .
Chen Min'er ( Chinese : 陈敏尔 ; born September 1960 ) is a Chinese politician , currently serving as the Communist Party Secretary of Guizhou province .
Jesse Clegg ( born 1988 ) is a South African alternative rock artist whose debut album , When I Wake Up , and his 2011 follow up Life On Mars , have made the 25-year - old a platinum - selling success in his home country .
Alexis Krasilovsky ( born 1950 ) is an American filmmaker , writer and professor .
Rubén Castro Martín ( born 27 June 1981 ) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Real Betis mainly as a striker but also as a winger .
P. S. Keerthana ( born 17 August 1992 ) is an Indian actress , best known for her lead role in the critically acclaimed film Kannathil Muthamittal ( 2002 ) .
JJ Adams or Jason John Adams ( born March 1978 ) is an English mixed media contemporary pop artist .
Francis Banks ( February 1865 -- after 1890 ) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football Alliance for Small Heath .
Paul Briggs ( born 13 August 1975 ) is an Australian boxer .
Harold Foote Gosnell ( December 24 , 1896 -- January 9 , 1997 ) was an American political scientist and author , known for his research and writings on American politics , elections , and political parties in political science .
Matthew Archibald ( 1745 -- January 18 , 1820 ) was an Irish - born farmer , tanner and political figure in Nova Scotia .
Fan Tai ( Chinese 范泰 ) ( 355 - -428 ) was the father of Fan Ye ( 范曄/范晔 ) .
Katie Grand ( born April 1971 ) is a British stylist and fashion journalist .
Bruce Dooland ( 1 November 1923 -- 8 September 1980 ) was an Australian cricketer who played in three Tests for the Australian national cricket team during the late 1940s .
Mick Weaver ( born 16 June 1944 , Bolton , Lancashire , England ) is an English session musician , best known for his playing of the Hammond B3 organ , and as an exponent of the blues and funk .
Thomas Ahrens ( born 27 May 1948 ) is a retired German coxswain who was most successful in the eights .
Brooke Singer ( born 1972 ) is a New York City -- based media artist , co - founder of the art , technology and activist group Preemptive Media , and a professor of New Media at Purchase College , State University of New York .
Kurt May ( 1896 - -1992 ) was director of the United Restitution Organization , which assisted victims of Nazism , from its inception in 1948 to his retirement at age 91 , in 1988 .
Roddy Hunter ( born 13 December 1984 ) is a Scottish football striker currently playing for Kirkintilloch Rob Roy in the Scottish Junior Football Association , West Region .
Dewi Morgan ( 1877 -- 1 April 1971 ) , also known by his bardic name `` Dewi Teifi '' , was a Welsh bard , scholar and journalist , who won the Chair at the 1925 National Eisteddfod of Wales in Pwllheli with his important awdl recounting the legend of Cantre'r Gwaelod .
Domergue Sumien ( born 1968 in Compiègne , France ) is an Occitan linguist and writer .
Albert Anae ( born 21 June 1989 ) is a rugby union footballer who plays professionally for the Brumbies in Super Rugby .
Tato Taborda ( born Curitiba , 1960 ) , is a Brazilian composer , pianist and teacher .
David Grosso ( born c. 1971 ) is an American politician who is an at - large member of the Council of the District of Columbia .
Eugene Byrne ( born 25 February 1959 ) is an English freelance journalist and fiction writer .
Hugh Hornby Birley ( 10 March 1778 -- 31 July 1845 ) was a leading Manchester Tory who is reputed to have led the fatal charge of the Manchester and Salford Yeomanry at the Peterloo Massacre on 16 August 1819 .
Matthias Willenbacher ( born 14 July 1969 ) is a German entrepreneur and pioneer in the field of renewable energy .
Mohammad Abdul - Wali , ( 1940 - -1973 ) was a Yemeni diplomat and a prominent Yemeni writer of Ethiopian descent , and one of the earliest authors in Yemen to adopt writing for artistic purposes rather than for nationalist agendas .
Raoul Heinrich Francé ( birth name : Rudolf Heinrich Franze ) was born on 20 May 1874 in Altlerchenfeld ( Vienna ) and studied as a self - taught very early in analytical chemistry and `` Mikrotechnik '' ( microscopy ) .
Sir Alexander Maitland , 1st Baronet ( 21 March 1728 - 15 February 1820 ) was a general in the British Army and the first of the Maitland baronets of Clifton .
Angelo Fusco ( born 2 September 1956 ) is a former volunteer in the Belfast Brigade of the Provisional Irish Republican Army ( IRA ) who escaped during his 1981 trial for killing a Special Air Service ( SAS ) officer in 1980 .
James Wan ( born 27 February 1977 ) is a Malaysian - born Australian film producer , screenwriter and film director .
Manmohan Waris ( born 3 August 1967 ) is an Indian Punjabi folk / pop singer .
Zhou Qunfei ( Chinese : 周群飞 ; born 1970 ) is a Chinese entrepreneur who founded the touchscreen maker Lens Technology .
Born on 11 August 1824 , William Carmichael Russell was educated at Bedford School .
Marieke Blaauw ( born 1979 , Hilversum ) is a Dutch animator .
Khurram Murad ( 1932 - -1996 ) was a Pakistani Islamic scholar and writer .
Reidar Thomassen , pseudonym Richard Macker ( born 18 June 1936 ) is a Norwegian writer .
Evans Hayward ( born in 1922 ) is an American physicist .
Oliver Madox Hueffer ( 1877 -- 22 June 1931 ) , was an author , playwright , and war correspondent .
Serita Solomon ( born 1 March 1990 ) is a British track and field athlete competing in the hurdles .
Rovshan Huseynov ( born 17 December 1975 in Yeghegnadzor , Armenia ) was an Azerbaijani amateur boxer .
Cheong Kuoc Vá ( traditional Chinese : 張國華 ; simplified Chinese : 张国华 ; pinyin : Zhāng Guóhuá ; 1956- ) was the first Secretary for Security in Macau Special Administrative Region from 1999 - 2014 .
Barbara Nessim ( born 1939 ) is an American artist , illustrator , and educator .
Milica Pejanović - Đurišić ( Cyrillic : Милица Пејановић-Ђуришић ) ( born 27 April 1959 in Nikšić ) is a Montenegrin professor and politician who is the Montenegrin Defence Minister since 13 March 2012 .
Ukpong Esther Sunday ( born 13 March 1992 ) is a Nigerian footballer , who plays for Trabzon İdmanocağı in the Turkish Women 's First Football League .
Edmund Bohun ( 1645 - -1699 ) was an English writer on history and politics , a publicist in the Tory interest .
Jack Downs ( born 10 November 1995 ) is an English professional rugby league player for Super League club Hull FC .
Alexander Cavalié Mercer ( 28 March 1783 -- 9 November 1868 ) was a British artillery officer .
Kostas Themistocleous ( Greek : Κώστας Θεμιστοκλέους born in 1949 ) is a Cypriot politician .
Gretel Scarlett ( born 9 November 1987 ) is an Australian actress and performer .
Martin Connolly ( October 1924-November 2006 ) was the Mayor of Galway from 1987 - -1988 .
Christian Fernández Salas ( born 15 October 1985 ) , known simply as Christian , is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for SD Huesca on loan from UD Las Palmas mainly as a left back .
Joshua Lodge ( born 14 September 1981 ) , is an Australian athlete who competes in the high jump .
Graham Shiel ( born 13 August 1970 ) is the skills coach of the Scotland rugby 7 's team .
Carlo Moresco ( 20 May 1905 - 3 May 1990 ) was an American conductor , composer , violinist , and stage director of Italian birth .
Kazimierz Cichowski ( Russian : Kazimir Tsikhovsky , Казимир Генрихович Циховский ) ( 7 December 1887 , Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski - 29 October 1937 ) was a Polish - Soviet communist activist and politician .
John E. Blakeley ( 1 October 1888 -- 20 February 1958 ) was a British film producer , director and screenwriter , the founder of Mancunian Films .
Harry Tietlebaum or Teitelbaum ( b. 1889 ) was an American organized crime figure in New York 's underworld during Prohibition as he was associated of the Bug and Meyer Mob .
Yvonne Hutton ( née Mullins ; born 1941 , died December 1992 ) , was a British comics artist best known for her work on football series Roy of the Rovers .
Richard Emmanuel Njoh Edimo ( born 17 January 1995 ) is a Cameroonian football player who played for Doxa Katokopias F.C ..
Michael Bani ( born 3 July 1984 in Thursday Island , Queensland ) is an Indigenous Australian professional rugby league player .
Luc Kwanten ( born 1943 ) is a Belgian sinologist , Tangutologist and literary agent .
Luis Argudín ( 1955 ) is a painter and professor of art known for his classical and academic work in an age where this is no longer common .
Wang Shaojun ( Chinese : 王少军 ; born 1955 ) is a major general of the People 's Liberation Army serving since 2015 as the director of the Central Security Bureau of the Communist Party of China .
Nick Ramsay ( born 10 June 1975 ) is a British Conservative politician who has been a Member of the Welsh Assembly since 2007 .
Alessandro Siani ( born Alessandro Esposito on 17 September 1975 ) is an Italian actor , director , screenwriter and stand - up comedian .
Paco Cepero ( born 6 March 1942 ) is a Spanish Flamenco guitarist .
Jim Connock ( 5 June 1925 - -29 June 1991 ) was an English film editor .
Geny Rebello ( born 1927 ) is a grandmaster of Brazilian Jiu - Jitsu holding a 9th degree red belt .
Jim Whitley ( born 14 April 1975 ) is a Zambian - born Northern Irish former professional footballer .
James Hargraves or Hargrave ( 1690 - -1741 ) was an English Anglican divine who became the Dean of Chichester Cathedral in 1739 .
Johannes Andreas Schmitz ( 1621 , Soest -- October 2 , 1652 , Harderwijk ) was a Dutch physician and the third rector of the University of Harderwijk .
Abdessadek Rabiaa or Rabii ( Arabic : عبد الصادق ربيع‎ -- born 5 February 1945 , Marrakech ) was a Moroccan politician and civil servant .
Liao Lisheng ( Chinese : 廖力生 ; pinyin : Liào Lìshēng ; born 29 April 1993 ) is a Chinese footballer who currently plays for Guangzhou Evergrande in the Chinese Super League .
Horace Cheung Kwok - kwan , JP ( Chinese : 張國鈞 , born 1974 ) is a Hong Kong solicitor and politician and the current vice - chairman of the Democratic Alliance for the Betterment and Progress of Hong Kong ( DAB ) , the largest pro - Beijing party in Hong Kong .
Albert Hallam ( Albert William Hallam ; 12 November 1869 in East Leake , Nottinghamshire , England -- 24 July 1940 in Loughborough , England ) was an off spin bowler who is primarily remembered , along with Thomas Wass , for giving Nottinghamshire an astonishing win in the County Championship of 1907 .
Frank Hodgetts ( born 30 September 1924 ) is an English footballer who played as a winger in the Football League .
Born on 2 October 1914 in Battersea , London , United Kingdom , Bernarr Rainbow was the son of Ephraim James Rainbow ( 1888 - 1983 ) , a cabinet - maker at Buckingham Palace , who later became the Curator of pictures at Hampton Court .
Chandra Mayor ( born in 1973 ) , is a Canadian poet and novelist whose writings , among other topics , dive into worlds of urban and alternative cultures .
Stelios Marangos ( Greek : Στέλιος Μαραγκός ; born 4 May 1989 ) is a Greek footballer who plays for Veria .
Li E ( Chinese : 厲鶚 ; 1692 - -1752 ) , courtesy name Taihong ( 太鴻 ) , hao Fanxie ( 樊榭 ) , was a Qing Dynasty Chinese poet , essayist , and scholar .
David Shilling ( born 27 June 1956 ) is an English milliner , sculpturer , fashion and interior designer synonymous with designing extravagant hats and clothing displayed on Ladies ' Day at Royal Ascot .
Christina Bassadone ( born 27 December 1981 ) is a British sailor who competed in the 2008 Summer Olympics .
Dániel Németh ( born 1975 ) is a Hungarian photographer who won in the Travel / Culture category of the National Geographic International Photography Contest 2006 .
Elisa Kreisinger ( born 1986 ) , known interchangeably as Pop Culture Pirate , is a Brooklyn - based video artist and educator .
Harini Ravi ( born 20 December 1994 ) is a Chennai based Singer and Dubbing Artiste .
Adrien Théaux ( born 18 September 1984 ) is a French World Cup alpine ski racer and non - commissioned officer .
Wolfgang Dahmen ( born 19 October 1949 ) is a German mathematician working in approximation theory , numerical analysis , and partial differential equations .
Nina Childress ( born Christine Childress ; 1961 ) is a French - American visual artist based in Paris .
Bill Hagerty ( born 23 April 1939 ) is a British former newspaper editor , now chairman of `` British Journalism Review '' .
Paul John Ellis ( 25 May 1941 -- 20 February 2005 ) was a professor of physics at University of Minnesota for over 30 years .
William Murray Stone , D.D. ( June 1 , 1779 - -February 26 , 1838 ) was an American Episcopal clergyman from Maryland .
Ron Roker ( born Ronald Ernest Alfred Roker , 23 January 1941 ) is an English songwriter and singer .
Gustavo Alatriste ( 1922 -- 2006 ) was a Mexican actor , director , and producer of films .
Princess Elizabeth of Clarence ( Elizabeth Georgiana Adelaide ; 10 December 1820 -- 4 March 1821 ) was an infant member of the British royal family .
Gloria Origgi ( born 1967 ) is an Italian philosopher at the CNRS in Paris ( Institut Jean Nicod ) who works on the theory of mind , epistemology and cognitive sciences applied to new technology .
Lukáš Csölley ( born 18 June 1990 ) is a Slovak ice dancer .
F. Herbert Fallas ( birth registered October -- December 1861 -- death unknown ) birth registered in Wakefield district , was an English rugby union footballer of the 1880s , playing at representative level for England , and Yorkshire , and at club level for Wakefield Trinity , as a Three - quarters , i.e. Wing or Centre .
Danny Fitzgerald ( 1961 - -2010 ) was an Irish sportsperson .
Prim Pujals Nolasco ( born 26 July 1943 ) is a lawyer , judge , and politician from the Dominican Republic .
Jared Maurice Arter ( January 27 , 1850 -- 1930 ) was born into slavery , in Jefferson County , West Virginia .
Arthur Hobgen ( 3 September 1849 -- 26 March 1886 ) was an English cricketer .
Peter Oskarson ( born 1951 ) is a Swedish theatre director and actor from Stockholm .
Keivan Zarineh ( Persian : کیوان زرينه‎‎ , born 26 May 1985 ) is an Italian - Iranian former footballer .
Jan Voigt ( 24 June 1928 -- 5 December 1997 ) was a Norwegian actor , dancer and museum director .
Susann McDonald ( born 26 May 1935 ) is an American - born classical harpist .
Sara Stockbridge ( born Sarah Jane Stockbridge ; 14 November 1965 ) is an English model , actress and author .
Ron Vivian ( 1914 - -1973 ) was an Australian cartoonist who is perhaps best known as having drawn Ginger Meggs after the original creator , Jimmy Bancks died in 1952 .
Pavle Vujević ( Serbian Cyrillic : Павле Вујевић , 10 August 1881 -- 17 November 1966 ) was a Serbian geographer and meteorologist , professor of climatology , meteorology , and mathematical geography at the University of Belgrade .
George Costakis ( Russian : Георгий Дионисович Костаки , Greek : Γεώργιος Κωστάκης , 5 July 1913 - 1990 ) was a collector of Russian art whose collection became the most representative body of Modern Russian avant - garde art anywhere .
Maria Tatar ( born 1945 ) is an American academic whose expertise lies in children 's literature , German literature , and folklore .
Elias Karam ( Arabic : الياس كرم‎ ) ( born 1960 ) is a Syrian singer from Assyrian / Syriac ethnic origins , born in the city of Al - Hasakah in the Northeastern governorate of Al - Hasakah .
Albert Potter Wills ( 1873 - -1937 ) was an American physicist who researched magnetic materials and was the PhD advisor of the Nobel Prize winner Isidor Isaac Rabi .
Manoj Kumar ( born Harikrishna Giri Goswami on 24 July 1937 ) is an award - winning Indian actor and director in Bollywood .
Nelson Bocaranda Sardi ( 18 April , 1945 , Boconó , Trjuillo ) , is a Venezuelan television commentator and investigative journalist .
Bilall Dreshaj ( 1910 - 1987 ) , better known as Biko , was an Albanian military leader in Kosovo and Novi Pazar .
Troy Selvey ( born 1 July 1980 , Denver , Colorado ) is an American active basketball player who played until December 2007 for Bc Mures , in the Romanian Basketball Division A. He plays center or power forward positions and his height is 2,03 m ( weight : 116 kg ) .
Zhao Na ( Chinese : 赵娜 ; pinyin : Zhao Na , born 29 April 1984 ) is a former road cyclist from China .
Brett Murray ( I ) ( born in 1961 ) is a white South African artist mostly known for his steel and mixed media wall sculptures .
January Low Wye San ( born 23 August 1985 ) is a Malaysian Indian Classical dancer of Chinese Indian descent .
Cal Pritner ( 1935 - December 1 , 2014 ) , was an educator , writer , administrator , and actor .
Aris Marangopoulos ( b. Athens , 1948 ) is a Greek author , literary critic and translator .
Edmund Hewavitarne ( 1873 - -1915 ) was a Ceylonese ( Sri Lankan ) businessman and reservist .
Eliezer Sandberg ( Hebrew : אליעזר זנדברג‎ , born 21 February 1962 ) is a former Israeli politician who served as a government minister between 2003 and 2004 .
Elisabeth von Trapp ( born 1955 ) is a folk singer .
Rafael Vardi ( Also spelled Raphael Vardi ; Hebrew : רפאל ורדי‎ ; Born 1922 ) was Israel Defense Forces Major General and former head of the Manpower Directorate .
Joost Wichman ( born 19 May 1978 , Lichtenvoorde ) is a Dutch professional mountainbiker , whose main discipline is four - cross ( 4X ) .
Lieutenant Alan Rice - Oxley ( 1898 -- 21 July 1961 ) was a British pilot during World War I. He became a flying ace in 1918 , credited with six aerial victories .
Samuel Curtis ( born in Walworth , Surrey on 29 August 1779-died at La Chaire , Rozel Bay , Jersey , on 6 January 1860 ) was an English botanist and publisher who specialised in Spermatophytes .
Hollie - Jay Bowes ( born Billie Jean Bowes , 17 January 1989 ) is an English recording artist and actress best known for her role as Michaela McQueen in Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks .
Henry Renouf ( 1820 -- March 18 , 1880 ) was an educator , judge and political figure in Newfoundland .
Ragnwi Marcelind ( born 1953 ) is a Swedish Christian Democratic politician .
Shaun Bailey ( born 1971 in North Kensington , London ) is a British Afro - Caribbean youth worker and Conservative politician .
Ferdinand Kowarz ( 23 February 1838 , Planá -- 22 September 1914 , Marianske Lazne ) , was a Bohemian - Austrian entomologist who described many new species of Diptera mainly from central Europe Kowarz was a post office official .
Susan Brownmiller ( born 15 February 1935 ) is an American feminist journalist , author , and activist best known for her 1975 book Against Our Will :
Tun Dr. Lim Keng Yaik ( Chinese : 林敬益 ; pinyin : Lín Jìng Yì ; Pe̍h - ōe - jī : Lîm Kèng - iah ; 8 April 1939 -- 22 December 2012 ) was a former Malaysian politician and former Minister of Energy , Water and Communications in the Malaysian cabinet .
Driss Maazouzi ( Arabic : ادريس معزوزي‎ ; born 15 October 1969 in Meknès ) is a French 1500 metres runner who won a bronze medal at the 2001 World Championships in Edmonton .
Kawai Wong ( born Wong Ka Wai ( 黃家惠 ) ; 4 February 1986 ) is a magazine editor , writer and fashion stylist .
Hüseyin Atıcı ( born 3 May 1986 ) is a Turkish track and field athlete competing in shot put .
Giancarlo Monsalve Leyton ( born 4 March 1982 ) is a Chilean Spinto Tenor .
Dean Hughes ( 1943 ) is an author of historical novels and children 's books .
Divakar Sharma ( 1933 - -2009 ) born in Churu , India was a scholar of Sanskrit , Hindi and Rajasthani languages .
Ian ' Walter ' Fairbairn ( born 28 August 1953 ) is an English folk musician , who was raised in the North East of England .
Catherine Stourton , Baroness Stourton ( previously Catherine Petre , Baroness Petre , née Walmesley ; 6 January 1697 -- 31 January 1785 ) , was a rich Lancastrian heiress .
Francois Russo ( born 1966 ) is the creative director and founder of Maison Takuya , a company which he founded in 2008 , and which designs luxury leather goods .
Sarah Blasko ( born Sarah Elizabeth Blaskow , 23 September 1976 ) is an Australian singer - songwriter , musician and producer .
Amer Deeb Mohammad Khalil ( born 4 February 1980 ) is a Jordanian football player , of Palestinian origin , who plays for Al - Wahdat SC .
Zhao Zhiyong ( born April 1955 ) is a former Chinese politician , banker , and regional official .
Darren Denneman ( born 23 March 1968 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Geelong and the Sydney Swans in the Victorian / Australian Football League ( VFL / AFL ) .
Bonaventure Baron , O.F.M. ( christened Bartholomew Baron ; 1610 -- 18 March 1696 ) was a distinguished Irish Franciscan friar and a noted theologian , philosopher , teacher and writer of Latin prose and verse .
Erminio Sertorelli ( 1901 - -1979 ) , was an Italian cross - country skier .
Tiffany Haas ( born c. 1983 ) is a former American softball player .
Timothy Stamps ( born 15 October 1936 ) is a Zimbabwean politician and doctor who served in the government of Zimbabwe as Minister of Health from 1986 to 2002 .
Morten Gunnar Larsen ( born 1 October 1955 ) is a Norwegian jazz pianist and composer , well known for several stride piano recordings and collaborations .
Laura Greenwood ( born 1991 ) is an English actress and a member of the YoungBlood Theatre Company in 2006 .
Grand Ayatollah Sayyid Mahmoud Hassani Sorkhi ( Arabic : السيد محمود الحسني الصرخي ) ( born 1964 ) is an Iraqi Twelver Shi'a Marja .
Meridith Valiando Rojas ( born 1984 ) is an American concert producer and media entrepreneur .
Agim Ibraimi ( Macedonian : Агим Ибраими ) ( born 29 August 1988 ) is a professional Macedonian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Maribor in the Slovenian PrvaLiga .
Charles Ching ( 沈澄 , 1935 - -2000 ) was a judge in Hong Kong .
Wael Jassar ( Arabic : وائل جسّار‎ ) is a Lebanese singer born 22 November 1976 .
Chris Gudzowsky ( born 15 August 1990 in Calgary , Alberta ) is a Canadian born bobsledder who started competing in 2006 .
Barbara Gardner Proctor ( born 1933 ) was the first black woman to own and operate an advertising agency .
Karl Zwicky ( born 16 November 1956 ) is Australian film director , producer and screenwriter .
Teresa Porzecanski ( born 1945 ) is a Uruguayan anthropologist and writer .
Antonio Mizauld ( 1510 - -1578 ) was a French astronomer and physician .
Badri Latif ( Persian : بدری لطیف‎‎ ; born 2 November 1977 ) is a German field hockey player .
Pat Kearns ( born November 10 , 1970 ) is an American record producer , recording engineer , songwriter , guitarist and vocalist .
Elhanan Tannenbaum , ( Hebrew : אלחנן טננבוים‎ , born 12 August 1946 ) was an Israeli reserve colonel in the Israel Defense Forces and a `` shady '' businessman , who was kidnapped in 2000 and held for more than three years by the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah .
Marc Mahélé Lièko Bokungu ( 1941 -- May 16 , 1997 ) was a prominent Zairian general who served as the last army chief during the long reign of Mobutu Sese Seko .
Krisdayanti ( born 24 March 1975 ) , often known by her moniker KD , is an Indonesian singer and actress .
Edward Mena ( born 15 April 1990 ) is a noted Venezuelan singer .
George Herbert Walker III ( born 1931 in St. Louis ) , commonly known as Bert Walker , is an American heir , businessman , diplomat and philanthropist .
Robert Hamilton Russell , FRCS , ( 3 September 1860 -- 30 April 1933 ) was an English - born Australian surgeon , president of the Medical Society of Victoria from 1903 .
Elizabeth Raum ( born 13 January 1945 ) is a Canadian oboist and composer .
Kamila Thompson ( born 1983 ) is a singer - songwriter based in London and New York .
Harm Bart ( born 5 August 1942 ) is a Dutch mathematician , economist , and Professor of Mathematics at the Erasmus University Rotterdam , particularly known for his work on `` factorization problems for matrix and operator functions . ''
Mario Barravecchia ( born 16 November 1976 ) , or simply Mario , is an Italo - Belgian who was the finalist of the first edition of French TV reality show Star Academy .
Nguyễn Đình Tấn ( Kiến An , Hải Phòng , 1930 - 28 January 2002 ) was a Vietnamese classical composer .
Dorota Miśkiewicz ( dɔˈrɔta miɕˈkʲɛvit͡ʂ ) ( born 12 September 1973 ) is a Polish singer , songwriter , composer , and violinist .
Antal Rogán ( born 29 January 1972 ) is a Hungarian economist and politician , who served as Mayor of Belváros - Lipótváros ( fifth district of Budapest ) from 2006 to 2014 .
Pascal Gastien ( born 2 December 1963 ) is a French former professional footballer and now manager .
Maurice Norman ( born 8 May 1934 ) is an English former footballer who played nearly 400 times in the Football League as a centre half for Norwich City and Tottenham Hotspur .
Andreas Walsperger ( born ca . 1415 in Radkersburg ; time of death unknown ) was a German cartographer of the 15th century .
Jacob A. Gross ( born 1842 New York City ) was an American lawyer and politician from New York .
Yitzhak Arieli ( Hebrew : יצחק אריאלי‎ ; born 1896 , died 5 April 1974 ) was a leading Israeli rabbi .
Margot Livesey ( born 1953 ) is a Scottish born writer .
Philippe Bach ( born 1974 ) is a Swiss conductor and current music director of Meiningen 's Hofkapelle and Theatre .
Sinéad Delahunty - Evans ( born 12 February 1971 in Kilkenny ) is a retired Irish middle - distance runner who competed primarily in the 1500 metres .
Line Arlien - Søborg ( born 25 July 1966 ) is a Danish former actress and film director .
Henry Cubitt , 2nd Baron Ashcombe CB TD ( 14 March 1867 -- 27 October 1947 ) , was a British politician and peer , the son of George Cubitt , 1st Baron Ashcombe , and his wife Laura Joyce .
Vít Jedlička ( Czech pronunciation : ( ˈviːt ˈjɛdlɪtʃka ) ; born 6 September 1983 ) is a Czech politician , publicist and activist .
Shlomo Shamir ( 15 June 1915 -- 19 May 2009 ) was the third Commander of the Israeli Navy ( 1949 - -1950 ) , and the first Israeli Navy Commander to receive the rank of Aluf .
Luisa Omielan ( born 7 September 1982 ) is a British comedian based in London .
Julia Tobin ( born 1955 in Newcastle upon Tyne ) is an English actress from Newcastle upon Tyne , and is best known for playing Brenda Hope in the comedy drama series Auf Wiedersehen , Pet and Joan of Arc in the music video for `` Maid of Orleans '' by Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark .
Benjamin Byung Kyu Chin ( born 1964 ) , known for short as Ben Chin , is Executive Director , Communications and Issues Management in the office of B.C Premier Christy Clark , and a former Canadian political advisor in Ontario , public and private sector executive and television journalist .
Simona Pop née Deac ( born 25 December 1988 ) is a Romanian épée fencer , bronze medallist at the 2015 European Championships , team silver medallist in the 2015 World Fencing Championships and team European champion in 2014 and 2015 .
Bob Pejman ( born 1963 ) is a contemporary artist / painter who currently resides in the United States .
Jeen van den Berg ( 8 January 1928 -- 8 October 2014 ) was a Dutch long track speed skating primarily known as the winner of the Elfstedentocht of 1954 .
Richer Pérez Cobas ( born 20 February 1986 ) is a Cuban long - distance runner who specialises in the marathon .
Antonio Brufau Niubó ( born 1948 ) is the CEO and Chairman of the multinational oil and gas company Repsol , a role he has been in since 2004 .
Doug Long ( 28 March 1940 - 9 February 2009 ) was an Australian rules footballer who played for Geelong in the Victorian Football League ( VFL ) and Glenelg in the South Australian National Football League ( SANFL ) .
Harsh Mahajan(ex- Animal Husbandry minister of Himachal Pradesh ) , son of a former Vidhan Sabha Speaker and Cabinet Minister , Des Raj Mahajan was born at Chamba on 12 December 1955 .
Makoto Kitayama ( born 1952 ) is a Japanese musician , active since the late ' 60s , most notably as vocalist and songwriter for the progressive rock band Shingetsu .
Daniel DeShaime , born Jean - Marie Deschênes on 2 August 1946 in Saint - Octave - de - l'Avenir , Quebec is a francophone Canadian singer .
Adalberto Román Benítez ( born 11 April 1987 ) , is a Paraguayan footballer currently playing for Libertad .
Mool Chand Chowhan ( 1927 , Ajmer , Rajputana , Indian Empire - September 11 , 2009 ) was an Indian sports official .
George Herndon Pegram ( 1855 - 1937 ) , most commonly known as George H. Pegram , was an engineer who patented the Pegram truss .
Kieran Tscherniawsky ( born 18 January 1992 ) is a Paralympian athlete from England competing mainly in category F33 discus .
Guy Cribb ( born 1970 ) is a windsurfer and windsurfing trainer .
Emri Zaid ( Hebrew : אימרי זייד‎ ; born 10 March 1993 ) is an Israeli footballer who plays as a Defender .
Jerzy Mniszech ( c. 1548 -- 1613 ) was a Polish nobleman and diplomat in the Polish - Lithuanian Commonwealth .
Dejan Zavec ( born 13 March 1976 ) , commonly known as Jan Zaveck , is a Slovenian former professional boxer who held the IBF welterweight title .
Laurent Buson ( born 10 November 1978 ) , also known as Lohan , is a French actor , martial artist , action choreographer and film producer .
Dr Gary Aaron ( born 3 July 1965 ) is a South African - born Australian general practitioner in private practice .
Walter Claude Flight ( born London 16 February 1881 - died 1955 ) also known as Claude Flight or W. Claude Flight was a British artist who pioneered and popularised the linoleum cut technique .
Nicolae Păun ( born 9 November 1964 ) is a Romani - Romanian politician .
Marko Lopušina ( Марко Лопушина ) ( born 1951 ) is a Serbian journalist and publicist , known for writing a number of books on Serbian diaspora and secret services and their role in contemporary Serbian politics .
Valentino Baldi ( 1774 -- October 22 , 1816 ) was an Italian painter , mainly of quadratura and ornamentation in fresco and tempera .
Nakamura Dōseki ( 中村 道碩 , 1582 -- 1630 ) was a Japanese professional go player .
Jim Waley ( born 1948 ) is a veteran Australian television presenter best known for his work on the Nine Network .
Camille Mendoza ( born 29 November 1994 in Toulouse ) is a French pair skater who competed with partner Christopher Boyadji .
Ibnu Sutowo ( 23 September 1914 Yogyakarta -- 12 January 2001 Jakarta ) was an Indonesian army officer , Cabinet Minister and former head of the Indonesian oil and gas producer Pertamina .
Kaspar Ulenberg ( 24 December 1549 -- 16 February 1617 ) was a Catholic convert , theological writer and translator of the Bible .
Richard Donat ( born 1 June 1941 ) is a Canadian actor known for his roles in Canadian and American television .
Anton Reinthaller ( 14 April 1895 -- 6 March 1959 ) was an Austrian right wing politician active before and after the Second World War .
Barbara Doll ( born 7 May 1972 ) is the stage name of a French former pornographic actress .
Ivan Goranov ( Bulgarian : Иван Горанов ; born on 10 June 1992 ) is a Bulgarian footballer currently playing as a winger for Litex Lovech .
Khalid Albudoor is an Arabic poet born in Dubai in the United Arab Emirates on April 7 , 1961 .
Christopher Kenworthy ( born 1968 ) is an Australian writer and former film director .
Mudit Nayar ( Hindi : मुदित नायर ; born 3 May 1987 ) is an Indian television actor .
V. Srinivas Goud ( Telugu:వి.శ్రీనివాస్ గౌడ్ born 16 March 1969 ) is an Indian politician , of the telangana state . He is the activist and former state government official and Telangana Gazetted Officers '' ( TGO ) president .
Mike James Kirkland ( born 1949 , Yazoo City , Mississippi ) is an American R&B singer .
José Aragón Escacena ( born 1891 in Astorga , ( León Province ) , Spain ; died 1945 in Spain ) was a Leonese language writer .
Ibrahim Khaleel ( born 9 October 1982 ) is an Indian first - class cricketer who plays as a wicket - keeper for Hyderabad .
Bisi Alimi ( born Ademola Iyandade Ojo Kazeem Alimi , 17 January 1975 ) is a Nigerian gay rights activist , public speaker , blog writer and HIV / LGBT advocate who gained international attention when he became the first Nigerian to come out of the closet on television .
Naim Ulmasov ( Tajik : Наим Ӯлмасов , Persian : نعیم اولمسف‎‎ ; born 26 April 1992 ) is a Tajikistani football player .
Margaret Fell or Margaret Fox ( 1614 -- 23 April 1702 ) was a founder of the Religious Society of Friends .
Meike Hoffmann ( born 1962 ) is a German art historian and provenance researcher .
Fraser Stott ( born 13 August 1969 in Cambuslang , Scotland ) is a former Scottish rugby union player and coach who played for Glasgow Warriors at the Scrum - half position .
Thomas Ong ( Chinese : 王沺裁 ; pinyin : Wáng Tiáncái , born 1 February 1969 ) is a Singaporean actor and television host .
Dale Bader ( born 1978 ) is a degreed meteorologist for WAAY - TV in Huntsville , Alabama .
Maredudd ap Bleddyn ( 1047 -- 9 February 1132 ) was a prince and later King of Powys in eastern Wales .
Nicolaes Geelvinck ( 11 October 1706 , Amsterdam -- 15 June 1764 , Amsterdam ) was lord of Castricum , Bakkum , Santpoort , Velsen , Stabroek , schepen , and owner of the country estate Akerendam - by - Beverwijk .
Paula Chaves ( born 6 September 1984 ) is an Argentine model , actress and TV host .
Le Pustra or Mr Pustra ( 1 July 1977 ) is a multidisciplinary performance artist , singer , musical saw player , model and was originally part of the comedy Cabaret duo , Pustra / Vile - een 's Vaudeville that performed from 2006 to mid 2009 .
Chris Huffins ( born 15 April 1970 ) is an athlete from the United States who competed in the field of Decathlon .
Vasil Dragolov ( Bulgarian : Васил Драголов ) ( born 17 March 1962 ) is a former Bulgarian footballer , who played as a forward .
Maria Blanca de Lizaur Guerra ( born 1966 ) , commonly known as Blanca de Lizaur , is a writer and researcher specialized in cultural studies , communications and literature .
Siri Bjerke ( 19 June 1958 -- 11 February 2012 ) was a Norwegian politician ( Labour Party ) .
Jack Milne ( 14 June 1907 in Buffalo , New York , USA -- 15 December 1995 in Pasadena , California , USA ) was an international Speedway rider .
Royston Ellis , ( born Christopher Royston George Ellis , 10 February 1941 in Pinner ) is an English novelist , travel writer and erstwhile beat poet .
Milton Reynolds ( 1892 - -1976 ) , an American entrepreneur , was born Milton Reinsberg in Albert Lea , Minnesota .
Lil ' Dave Thompson ( May 21 , 1969 -- February 14 , 2010 ) was an American electric blues guitarist , singer and songwriter .
Sir Henry Peter Francis Swinnerton - Dyer , 16th Baronet KBE FRS ( born 2 August 1927 ) , commonly known as Peter Swinnerton - Dyer , is an English mathematician specialising in number theory at University of Cambridge .
R. Parthasarathy ( born 1934 ) is an Indian poet , translator , critic , and editor .
Cameron Chalmers ( born 6 February 1997 ) is a Guernsey born British athlete , educated at Elizabeth College , Guernsey .
Ali Afshari ( Persian : علی افشاری‎ ; born 1973 in Qazvin ) is an Iranian activist .
Charlton Wong Chi Tang ( traditional Chinese : 黃志騰 ; simplified Chinese : 黄志腾 ; Jyutping : wong4 zi3 tang4 ; born 1979 ) is a football referee in Hong Kong First Division League .
Neil Merritt ( born 3 March 1939 ) was the last President of Portsmouth Polytechnic ( 1991 - 2 ) and the first Vice - Chancellor of the University of Portsmouth ( 1992 - 4 ) .
Krishan Kumar ( born 1942 ) is an Indian sociologist who is currently Chair of the Department of Sociology at the University of Virginia , where he holds the titles University Professor and William R. Kenan , Jr. , Professor of Sociology .
Bushra Elfadil ( Arabic : بشرى الفاضل‎ , born 1952 ) is a Sudanese writer and poet .
Anja Steinbauer ( born 1966 ) is a London - based Sinologist and philosopher .
John Kenneth Hilliard ( October 1901 -- March 21 , 1989 ) was an American acoustical and electrical engineer who pioneered a number of important loudspeaker concepts and designs .
Admiral George Carnegie , 6th Earl of Northesk ( 1716 - -1792 ) was born the son of David Carnegie , 4th Earl of Northesk and Lady Margaret Wemyss on 2 August 1716 .
Marcus Graham ( born 11 October 1963 ) is an Australian television and stage actor who has also starred in several films , including Mulholland Drive and Josh Jarman .
Stefan Sarnowski ( born in 1939 ) is a Polish philosopher working as professor at Kazimierz Wielki University in Bydgoszcz .
Wang Qinruo ( 王欽若 ) ( 962 - 1025 ) was an official in China 's Northern Song Dynasty .
Pieter de Graeff ( 15 August 1638 -- 3 June 1707 ) , was a member of the De Graeff - family from the Dutch Golden Age .
Liam Fairhurst ( 26 February 1995 -- 30 June 2009 ) was a British charity fundraiser who had been diagnosed with synovial sarcoma .
Charles Lane Poole ( 16 August 1885 -- 22 November 1970 ) was an English Australian forester who , introduced systematic , science - based forestry to Western Australia .
Ulrich Kons ( born 3 February 1955 ) is a retired German rower who had his best achievements in the eights .
Guglielmo Capodoro ( born Modena , 1670 ) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period .
Per Hellmyrs ( born 18 March 1983 ) is a Swedish Bandy player who is a creative midfielder .
Francis Gibson ( 16 January 1753 ( baptised ) -- 24 July 1805 ) was an English writer and occasional painter .
Marco Armani , stage name of Marco Antonio Armenise ( born 14 June 1961 ) , is an Italian singer - songwriter and composer .
Karl - Erling Trogen ( born 1946 ) is a Swedish company operator .
Nicky Hirst ( b. 27 February 1963 , Nottingham ) is an English sculptor and installation artist .
Colin Tilney ( born 31 October 1933 ) is a harpsichordist , fortepianist and teacher .
Charlene Rajendran ( born 1964 in Malacca ) is a Malaysian writer based in Singapore .
Thorvald Ellegaard ( 7 March 1877 - 27 April 1954 ) was a leading Danish track racing cyclist in the 1900s and 1910s .
Muzaffer Atac ( 24 August 1933 - 7 December 2010 ) was a Turkish - American physicist who was one of the founding scientists of Fermilab and performed important work with visible light photon counters and other detectors for particle physics .
Sabiha Al Khemir or Sabiha Khemir ( born 1959 ) is a Tunisian writer , illustrator , and expert in Islamic art whose work is concerned with cultural bridging and cultural dialogues .
Alessandro Lambruschini ( born 7 January 1965 ) is an Italian former long - distance runner who specialized in the 3000 metres steeplechase Lambruschini participated at three editions of the Summer Olympics ( 1988 , 1992 , 1996 ) , he has 40 caps in national team from 1985 to 1998 .
Lee Yoo - jin ( born 8 January 1977 ) is a South Korean actress and TV host .
Sarah McIntyre ( born 1975 ) is a British - American illustrator and writer of children 's books and comics .
Václav Kotal ( born 2 October 1952 ) is a Czech former football player and current manager , in charge of FC Zbrojovka Brno .
Nicholas Bawlf ( 15 July 1849 -- 26 December 1914 ) was an important figure in the development of Winnipeg as the centre of the Canadian grain trade .
Clare Hollingworth ( born 10 October 1911 ) is a British journalist and author who is noted as the first war correspondent to report the outbreak of World War II .
Francesco Nappi ( 1565 -- 1630s ) was an Italian painter , mainly recalled for his decorative frescoes in a Mannerist style .
Tsewang Dolkar Khangkar ( born 1959 in Kyirong , Tibet ) is exiled in India , is a doctor of Traditional Tibetan medicine .
Tim Samuels ( born 3 October 1975 ) is a documentary filmmaker and broadcaster .
Jake Webster ( born 29 October 1983 in Melbourne , Australia ) is a professional rugby league footballer for the Castleford Tigers of Super League .
Matt Kindt ( born 1973 ) is an American comic book writer , artist and graphic designer .
Stephen Brookfield ( born 1949 in Liverpool , England ) is a scholar in adult education who holds the John Ireland Endowed Chair at the University of St. Thomas in Minneapolis - St . Paul , Minnesota .
Terry Dunn ( born May 6 , 1953 ) was the head men 's basketball coach at Dartmouth College from 2004 through January 9 , 2010 , when he resigned his position .
Sylvain Guillot ( born 1972 ) is a French jockey .
Nils Johannes Sejersted ( 17 October 1865 -- 19 September 1921 ) was a Norwegian military officer and director .
Faouzi Ghoulam ( Arabic : فوزي غلام ; born 1 February 1991 ) is an Algerian footballer who plays for S.S.C. Napoli in Serie A and the Algerian national team .
Filippo Neviani ( born 6 January 1972 ) , known by his stage name Nek , is an Italian musician and singer - songwriter .
Michael Papadjanian , or Mikayel ( 1868 in Yerevan , Armenia -- 1929 in Tiflis , Soviet Union ) was a member of Armenian national liberation movement who studied law at Rostov , Odessa and St Petersburg , and had a practice as a barrister at Baku .
Rosie Rowell ( born 29 April 1965 ) is a British actress , probably best known for her roles as Eileen Callan in Family Affairs ( a role she played from 2003 until the series ended in 2005 ) and Donna Tucker in Soldier Soldier .
Naresh Chander Chaturvedi ( born 30 April 1928 , Farrukhabad , Uttar Pradesh ) is a writer and poet , predominantly writing in Hindi language .
Herbert Spencer Gasser ( 5 July 1888 -- 11 May 1963 ) was an American physiologist , and recipient of the Nobel Prize for Physiology or Medicine in 1944 for his work with action potentials in nerve fibers while on the faculty of Washington University in St. Louis , awarded jointly with Joseph Erlanger .
Bruce Paige ( born 10 November 1948 ) is a newsreader in Brisbane , Australia .
Adrian Dale ( born 24 October 1968 ) is a former South African cricketer , right - handed batsman , and right - arm medium - pace bowler who scored over 12,500 first - class runs and took over 200 first - class wickets .
Eric Chasalow ( born 1955 ) is an American composer of acoustic and electronic music .
Domingo Lejona ( born 2 February 1938 ) is an Argentine former footballer .
Peter Cowie ( born 24 December 1939 ) is a film historian and author of more than thirty books on film .
Carl Freedman ( born 1965 ) is the founder of Carl Freedman Gallery ( formerly Counter Gallery ) .
Haimanti Sukla ( Bengali : হৈমন্তী শুক্লা ) ( born 2 February 1949 ) is a Bengali singer .
Charles Berkeley , 2nd Earl of Berkeley PC KB FRS ( 8 April 1649 -- 24 September 1710 ) , was a British nobleman and diplomat , known as Sir Charles Berkeley from 1661 to 1679 and styled Viscount Dursley from 1679 to 1698 .
Gary Lewin ( born 16 May 1964 ) is the current permanent first - team physiotherapist for the England national football team .
Simon Garlick ( born 10 April 1975 ) is a former Australian rules footballer who played between 1994 and 2004 .
Vasil Lobzhanidze ( Georgian : ვასილ ლობჟანიძე ; born 14 October 1996 ) is a Georgian Rugby Union player .
Lukyamuzi Bashir ( or Badi)(born 7 December 1986 ) is a Ugandan music director , film director and producer .
Jaason Simmons ( born 12 July 1970 ) is an Australian actor best known for the role of Logan Fowler on the TV series Baywatch .
Ibrahim Camejo Sayas ( also Ibrain Camejo Zayas , born 28 June 1982 ) is a Cuban long jumper .
Edmond Beales was the son of Samuel Pickering Beales , a merchant of Newnham , Cambridgeshire and was born 3 July 1803 .
Rowan Sawers ( born 19 October 1954 ) is a former Australian rules football umpire and current Australian Football League Umpires ' Coach .
Amiya Kumar Bagchi ( born 1936 ) is a distinguished Indian political economist .
Natascha Janakieva Petrova ( alternate listings : Natasha Petrova , Natasha Yanakieva , born 19 March 1951 ) is a Bulgarian sprint canoer who competed from the early 1970s to the early 1980s .
Stephen Marcus ( born Stephen Mark Scott ; 18 June 1962 ) is a British actor , best known for his role as Nick the Greek in the film Lock , Stock and Two Smoking Barrels .
Bálint Virág ( born 1973 ) is a Hungarian mathematician working in Canada , known for his work in probability theory , particularly determinantal processes , random matrix theory , and random walks and other probabilistic questions on groups .
Perry Millward ( born 24 October 1992 ) is an English actor primarily known for his work on stage ( especially in London 's West End ) , and with a number of film and television credits .
Daryn Smit ( born 28 January 1984 ) is a South African cricketer and captain for the Dolphins .
Dana Telsey ( born 1962 ( age 52 - -53 ) in New York City , New York ) is the CEO and Chief Research Officer of Telsey Advisory Group .
Flossie M Byrd ( born 1927 ) was an economist , and the first African American woman to be elected president of one of Texas 's `` first class '' public institutions of higher education , Prairie View A&M University .
Butterford Wong ( Chinese : 黃黃油福特 ; born 2 December 1987 ) is a Canto - Pop singer from Hong Kong .
Jean Hubeau ( 22 June 1917 -- 19 August 1992 ) was a French pianist , composer and pedagogue known especially for his recordings of Gabriel Fauré , Robert Schumann and Paul Dukas , which are recognized as benchmark versions .
Pierre Henry ( born 9 December 1927 ) is a French composer , considered a pioneer of the musique concrète genre of electronic music .
Stephen Greif ( born 26 August 1944 ) is an English actor known for his roles as Travis in Blake 's 7 , Harry Fenning in three series of Citizen Smith , Signor Donato in Casanova and Commander John Shepherd in Shoot On Sight .
Nikola Kalinić ( born 5 January 1988 ) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays as a striker for Italian club Fiorentina and for the Croatian national team .
Arne Nyberg ( 20 June 1913 - -12 August 1970 ) was a Swedish football striker born in Säffle .
Richard Anthony Jefferson ( born 1956 ) is an American - born molecular biologist and social entrepreneur who developed the widely used reporter gene system GUS , conducted the world 's first biotech crop release , proposed the Hologenome theory of evolution , pioneered Biological Open Source and founded The Lens .
Deborah Abela ( born 13 October 1966 in Sydney ) is an Australian author of children 's books , most notably the Max Remy , Super Spy series .
Dan Hunt ( born 8 September 1986 in Sydney , New South Wales ) is an Australian retired rugby league player who played for the St. George Illawarra Dragons in the National Rugby League competition .
Josimar Higino Pereira ( born 19 September 1961 ) , more commonly known as Josimar , is a Brazilian former footballer .
Carmen Lebbos ( Arabic : كارمن لبّس‎ , born 1963 ) is a Lebanese actress who has been working in film , television and the theater since 1981 .
Joanne Meschery ( born 1941 in Gorman , Texas ) is an American fiction writer .
Hristo Silyanov ( 1880 in Istanbul , Ottoman Empire -- 1939 in Sofia , Bulgaria ) ( Bulgarian : Христо Силянов ) was a Bulgarian revolutionary , historian and memoirist .
Besart Veseli ( born 24 September 1992 in Mitrovicë ) is a Kosovar - Albanian footballer who plays for KF Kosova Vushtrri Style of Play also known as a new Cristiano Ronaldo who has an amazing technique and dribling skills ``
Richard Fung ( born 1954 ) is a video artist , writer , public intellectual and theorist who currently lives and works in Toronto , Ontario .
Owen Sheers ( born 20 September 1974 ) is a Welsh poet , author , playwright and TV presenter .
Yang Naimei ( Chinese : 楊耐梅 ; 1904 -- December 27 , 1960 ) was an actress of China 's silent film era .
Shahla Lahiji ( born 1942 ) ( Persian : شهلا لاهیجی‎ ) is an Iranian writer , publisher , translator , and director of Roshangaran , a prominent publishing house on women 's issues .
Ivan Pravilov ( Ukrainian : Іван Правілов ; January 1963 -- February 10 , 2012 ) was a Ukrainian ice hockey coach .
Alec Cobbe ( born 1945 ) is an Irish designer , artist , musical instrument collector and decorator .
Sammy Stopford ( born April 1956 ) is a professional ballroom dancer and teacher , and winner of the Professional International Latin American Dance Championship .
Frederik Lauesen ( born 10 November 1972 ) is a Danish TV presenter , who has been head of sport for the Danish channel TV 2 since September 2008 .
Fritz Wintersteller ( born 21 October 1927 ) is an Austrian mountaineer who made the first ascent of Broad Peak together with Hermann Buhl , Kurt Diemberger , and Marcus Schmuck in 1957 .
Cameron Meyer ( born 11 January 1988 ) is an Australian professional racing cyclist , riding for UCI ProTeam Team Dimension - Data
Dániel Gyurta ( Hungarian pronunciation : ( ˈdaːniɛl ˈɟurtɒ ) ; born 4 May 1989 ) is a Hungarian competitive swimmer who mainly competes in the 200-metre breaststroke .
Kofi Ansah ( 1951 - 3 May 2014 ) was an award - winning Ghanaian fashion designer , who was a pioneer in promoting modern African styles and design on the international stage .
Catherine Shirriff is a Canadian actress , born sometime in 1941 .
Simon Franglen ( born 1963 , Westminster , London , England ) is an English composer , record producer , arranger and musician .
Alois Seyfried was born in Brunn am Gebirge ( Austria ) on 27 May 1856 to father Franz and mother Caroline née Herger .
Zenón Rolón ( 25 June 1856 -- 13 May 1902 ) was an Afro Argentine musician and composer .
The Duke of Iron ( born Cecil Anderson , 1906 -- 1968 ) was a calypsonian , nightclub and concert entertainer , and recording artist from the 1930s through the 1960s .
Davide Bagnacani ( born 8 January 1980 ) is a former Italian football .
Vinayak Sasikumar ( born 13 June 1994 ) is an Indian lyricist , best known for his compositions in Malayalam cinema , with films such as Neelakasham Pachakadal Chuvanna Bhoomi , North 24 Kaatham , 7th Day ( film ) , and Sapthamashree Thaskaraha : .
Thomas Garner ( 1839 - -1906 ) was one of the leading English Gothic revival architects of the Victorian era .
Alan Rothwell ( born 9 February 1937 ) is an English actor and television presenter .
Madalena Barbosa ( 1942 -- February 21 , 2008 ) was the founder of the Movement for the Liberation of Women ( Movimento de Libertação das Mulheres ) , in April 1974 , created to `` fight for the right to equality of opportunity without discrimination of gender '' .
Giacinto Macripodari ( Greek : Υάκινθος Μακρυποδάρης , Hungarian : Jácint Ferenc Makripodári , Latin : Hyacinthus Macripodarius , Moldovan : Giacinto Ischiota c. 1610 -- 1672 ) , O.P. was a 17th - century Greek scholar and Dominican friar .
Kalifa Cissé ( born 9 January 1984 ) is a Malian professional footballer who plays for Bangkok United as a defensive midfielder or centre - half .
Zvi Segal ( Hebrew : צבי סגל‎ , 1901 - -1965 ) was a Revisionist Zionist activist and a signatory of the Israeli declaration of independence .
Sir Francis Freeling , 1st Baronet FSA ( 25 August 1764 -- 10 July 1836 ) , was Secretary of HM General Post Office .
Plamen Dimov ( Bulgarian : Пламен Димов ; born 29 October 1990 ) is a Bulgarian football defender who currently plays for FC Shakhter Karagandy in the Kazakhstan Premier League .
Louise de Bourbon ( 2 February 1603 -- 9 September 1637 ) called Mademoiselle de Soissons was the wife of Henri d'Orléans , Duke of Longueville .
Jason Garrity ( born 9 November 1993 ) is an English motorcycle speedway rider who won the British Under-19 Championship and the National League Riders Championship in 2011 .
Johan Fridtjuv Berg ( 20 March 1851 - 29 February 1916 ) was a Swedish libertarian , school teacher and book author .
Cyrus Tang ( Chinese : 唐仲英 ; born 1930 in Suzhou , China ) is a Chinese - born American businessman and philanthropist who has holdings in steel , pharmaceutical and furniture .
Beverly Page Yates ( 1811 - -1883 ) was an American - Liberian politician who served as the Vice President of Liberia from 1856 to 1860 under President Stephen Allen Benson .
Jüri Luik ( born 17 August 1966 in Tallinn ) is an Estonian diplomat and former politician .
Chinedu Okoli ( born 23 November 1983 ) , better known by his stage name Flavour N'abania or simply Flavour , is a Nigerian singer , songwriter , multi - instrumentalist and performer .
Ed Di Lello ( born 1952 ) is a former American composer , choreographer , director , dancer , and actor who worked in the United States during the 1970s and 1980s .
Kenneth Barry Mealand ( 24 January 1943 -- 2 April 2013 ) was an English professional footballer who played as a right back .
James Lasdun ( born 1958 ) is a British writer who has lived in the United States since 1986 .
Peter Snow , CBE ( born 20 April 1938 ) is a British radio and television presenter and historian .
Mário Vieira de Carvalho ( Coimbra , 7 October 1943 ) is a Portuguese musicologist and author .
Friedrich Wilhelm Eduard Kasimir Dietrich von Saucken ( 16 May 1892 -- 27 September 1980 ) was a general in the German army during World War II . Wounded in the Battle of Moscow , he commanded the 4th Panzer Division at Kursk , before becoming acting commander of the III . Panzer Corps in June 1944 .
Eugene Botkin , also Yevgeny Sergeyevich Botkin ( Russian : Евге́ний Серге́евич Бо́ткин ; 27 March 1865 -- 17 July 1918 ) was the court physician for Tsar Nicholas II and Tsarina Alexandra and , while in exile with the family , sometimes treated the hemophilia - related complications of the Tsarevich Alexei Nikolaevich of Russia .
David Paisley ( born 2 February 1979 ) is a Scottish actor , especially well known for roles as midwife Ben Saunders in Holby City , Ryan Taylor in Tinsel Town and most recently Rory Murdoch in River City .
Andrea Berg ( born 28 January 1966 ) is a German singer in the schlager genre .
Milo Sperber ( 20 March 1911 -- 22 December 1992 ) was a Polish - born English actor , director , and writer .
Günther Stranner ( born 26 April 1967 ) is an Austrian former ski jumper who competed from 1984 to 1991 .
Robert Peter Aguilar ( born 1931 ) is a former United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of California and is currently a California attorney in private practice .
Junior Roqica pronounced Rong - itha ( born 13 February 1991 ) is an Fijian Australian professional rugby league footballer for the Cronulla - Sutherland Sharks of the National Rugby League .
Reed Seifer ( born 1973 ) is an artist working in New York , NY .
Allan Trautman ( born 1955 ) is an actor and puppeteer .
Maria Giovanna Elmi ( born 25 August 1940 ) is an Italian former television announcer , presenter , journalist , actress and singer .
Katharine Waldo Douglas , CBE , ( 1870 -- April 7 , 1939 ) was an American novelist and translator .
Carl Heldmann ( born 1942 ) is an American author , home builder , and construction loan consultant .
Rudolf Stussi ( born 1947 ) is a Swiss - born painter , animator and illustrator based in Toronto , Canada .
Vijay Kumar Chopra ( Hindi : विजय कुमार चोपड़ा ) ( born 31 January 1932 , Lahore ) is the chief executive officer and editor in chief of the Punjab Kesari print news organisation .
Walther Wenck ( 18 September 1900 -- 1 May 1982 ) was the youngest general in the German Army and a highly experienced staff officer during World War II . At the end of the war , he commanded the German Twelfth Army .
J. Benibengor Blay ( born 1915 ) was a Ghanaian journalist , writer , publisher and politician , who has been called `` the father of popular writing in Ghana '' .
Sergei Konstantinovich Gershelman ( Russian : Серге́й Константинович Гершельман , Sergey Konstantinovich Gershelman ; 26 June 1854 -- 17 October 1910 ) , last name also spelled Hershelman , was a Imperial Russian Army general , who fought in the Russo - Japanese War and served as the Governor - General of Moscow .
Maurice Fenelon ( 1834 -- January 31 , 1897 ) was an Irish - born educator , merchant and political figure in Newfoundland .
Atossa Leoni ( 1977- ) is an actress who has been working internationally in film , television and theater since childhood .
Joyce Nakamura Okazaki ( born 1935 ) is an American citizen of Japanese heritage who was forcibly removed with her family from their Los Angeles home and placed in the Manzanar War Relocation camp in 1942 .
Nina van Koeckhoven ( born 6 October 1983 ) is a Belgian freestyle swimmer and triathlete .
Shaun Greenhalgh ( born 1961 ) is a British art forger .
Kex Gorin ( born Kevin Gorin , 1 January 1949 , in Birmingham - 21 December 2007 ) , was a British drummer .
Diane Stein ( born 1948 ) is a feminist , Wiccan , a Reiki practitioner , and an author .
Jeffrey Jeturian ( born 1959 ) is a Filipino director and production designer for both television and film .
Fulvio Rocchi ( born 7 August 1909 ) was an Argentine sports shooter .
Kang Soo - il ( Hangul : 강수일 ; born 15 July 1987 ) is a Korean footballer who currently plays for Jeju United in the K League Classic .
Silvia Hollmann - Schieck ( born 13 May 1955 in Menden ( Sauerland ) , North Rhine - Westphalia ) is a retired West German hurdler .
Raghunath Vithal Khedkar ( born 1873 , Bombay ) was an Indian surgeon .
Arthur Agatston ( born 1947 ) is an American cardiologist best known as the developer of the South Beach Diet , but also the author of many published scholarly papers in the field of noninvasive cardiac diagnostics .
Lazım Esmaeili ( also `` Lazem '' ) ( 1945 - -28 January 1995 ) was a Kurdish Iranian spy operating in Turkey , who was found tortured and shot dead by unknown persons in Istanbul .
Georgie Glen ( born 20 April 1956 ) is a Scottish actress , best known for her stage and television work .
Frank Murud ( born 23 December 1955 ) is a former chief of real estate in the city administration of Oslo , who became notorious for the embezzlement of ca .
Maharaja Shri Chamaraja Wodeyar VII Bahadur ( 1704 - 1734 ) or Chamaraja Wodeyar VII , was Raja of Mysore ( r.1732 - 1734 ) .
Manila Flamini ( 18 September 1987 ) is an Italian synchronized swimmer .
Laura Owens ( born 1970 , Euclid , Ohio ) is an American painter who emerged in the late 1990s .
Armin Aberle ( born 13 December 1960 ) is an Australian - German semiconductor scientist and full professor at the National University of Singapore in the field of photovoltaics and solar energy , particularly thin film solar cells .
Sébastien Corchia ( born 1 November 1990 ) is a French footballer who plays for French club Lille in Ligue 1.He is a French youth international having represented his nation at under-17 , under-18 , and under-19 and plays on the under-21 team .
Ioannis Kokkodis ( Greek : Ιωάννης Κοκκώδης ; born 8 January 1981 ) is a retired Greek swimmer who won a bronze medal in the 4×200 m freestyle relay at the 2002 European Aquatics Championships .
Ned Goodwin ( born 15 April 1969 ) is an English - born Australian - raised Master of Wine .
