13 Tzameti is a 2005 suspense thriller film written and directed by Georgian filmmaker Géla Babluani .
Her Big Chance is a dramatic monologue written by Alan Bennett in 1987 for television , as part of his Talking Heads series for the BBC .
Beware of the Car ( Russian : Береги́сь автомоби́ля , translit . Beregis Avtomobilya , US titles Uncommon Thief , or Watch out for the Automobile ) is a Soviet 1966 crime comedy - drama film directed by Eldar Ryazanov , based on a screenplay by Emil Braginsky and produced by the Mosfilm .
The Passion of the Christ ( sometimes referred to as The Passion ) is a 2004 American epic biblical drama film directed by Mel Gibson and starring Jim Caviezel as Jesus Christ .
It Follows is a 2014 American supernatural horror film written and directed by David Robert Mitchell , and starring Maika Monroe .
From Corleone to Brooklyn ( original title : Da Corleone a Brooklyn ) is an Italian crime thriller directed by Umberto Lenzi .
Natural Born Killers is a 1994 American satirical black comedy crime film directed by Oliver Stone and starring Woody Harrelson , Juliette Lewis , Robert Downey , Jr. , Tom Sizemore , and Tommy Lee Jones .
To Save Her Soul is a 1909 American short silent drama film directed by D. W. Griffith and starring Mary Pickford .
The Miracle in Valby ( Swedish : Miraklet i Valby ) is a 1989 Danish - Swedish drama film written and directed by Åke Sandgren , and starring Jakob Katz , Troels Asmussen , Lina Englund , and Amalie Ihle Alstrup ( da ) .
Sotto il segno dello scorpione ( internationally released as Under the Sign of Scorpio ) is a 1969 Italian drama film directed by Paolo and Vittorio Taviani .
Napoleon at Saint Helena ( German : Napoleon auf Sankt Helena ) is a 1929 German silent historical film directed by Lupu Pick and starring Werner Krauss , Hanna Ralph and Albert Bassermann .
Dance Hall Racket is a 1953 American film directed by Phil Tucker starring Lenny Bruce ( who also wrote the script ) and his wife Honey Harlow .
Peggio per me ... meglio per te ( Italian for Worse for me ... better for you ) is a 1967 Italian musicarello film directed by Bruno Corbucci .
Invisible Waves ( Thai : คำพิพากษาของมหาสมุทร ) is a 2006 crime film by Thai director Pen - Ek Ratanaruang , with screenplay by Prabda Yoon , cinematography by Christopher Doyle , and starring Tadanobu Asano -- all people that Pen - Ek had worked with on his previous film , Last Life in the Universe .
Monster Maker is 45-minute television special , adapted by Matthew Jacobs from the novel of the same name by Nicholas Fisk .
Le motorizzate ( `` The motorized women '' ) is a 1963 Italian anthology comedy film written and directed by Marino Girolami .
Hercules Against the Sons of the Sun ( Italian : Ercole contro i figli del sole , Spanish : Hércules contra los hijos del Sol , also known as Hercules Vs . the Sons of the Sun ) is a 1964 Italian - Spanish peplum film written and directed by Osvaldo Civirani .
Workingman 's Death is a 2005 Austrian - German documentary film written and directed by Michael Glawogger .
Nell'anno del Signore ( English title : The Conspirators ) is a 1969 Italian film written and directed by Luigi Magni .
Med dej i mina armar ( English : With You in My Arms ) is a 1945 Swedish comedy film directed by Hasse Ekman .
French Roast is a 2008 French computer - animated short created by Fabrice O. Joubert .
Medea Miracle ( French : Médée Miracle ) is a 2007 French - Italian drama film directed by Tonino De Bernardi and starring Isabelle Huppert .
Go West , Young Man is a 1936 American comedy film directed by Henry Hathaway and starring Mae West , Warren William , and Randolph Scott .
The Miracle of St. Anne was a short film , now lost , made by Orson Welles .
My Sex Life ... or How I Got into an Argument ( French : Comment je me suis disputé ... ( ma vie sexuelle ) ) is a 1996 French drama film directed by Arnaud Desplechin .
Cradle Will Rock is a 1999 American historical drama film written , produced and directed by Tim Robbins .
Bonnie Scotland is a 1935 American film starring Laurel and Hardy , produced by Hal Roach for Hal Roach Studios and directed by James W. Horne .
Jackie Brown is a 1997 American crime thriller film written , produced and directed by Quentin Tarantino , and his third feature film .
Crimes and Misdemeanors is a 1989 American existential comedy - drama film written , directed by and co - starring Woody Allen , alongside Martin Landau , Mia Farrow , Anjelica Huston , Jerry Orbach , Alan Alda , Sam Waterston and Joanna Gleason .
Mabel at the Wheel is a 1914 American motion picture starring Charles Chaplin and Mabel Normand , and directed by Mabel Normand and Mack Sennett .
Mince alors ! is a 2012 French comedy film , directed by Charlotte de Turckheim and starring Lola Dewaere , Victoria Abril and Catherine Hosmalin .
Les Anarchistes ( English : The Anarchists ) is a 2015 French drama film directed by Elie Wajeman and co - written with Gaëlle Macé .
Reality Horror Night is a 2009 horror comedy film created by Sean Pomper and directed by Douglas Elford Argent who wrote it with Nicholas Mark Harding .
Noi the Albino ( Icelandic : Nói albinói ( pronunciation ) ) is an Icelandic film by director Dagur Kári released in 2003 .
A Thousand Clowns is a 1965 film adaptation from a 1962 play by Herb Gardner , and directed by Fred Coe .
Gypsy Melody is a 1936 British musical comedy film directed by Edmond T. Gréville and starring Lupe Velez , Alfred Rode and Jerry Verno .
Una gita scolastica ( internationally released as A School Outing ) is a 1983 Italian comedy - drama film written and directed by Pupi Avati .
Oedipus Orca is a 1977 Italian sexploitation - thriller directed by Eriprando Visconti .
Clouds of Sils Maria ( known simply as Sils Maria in some territories ) is a 2014 drama film written and directed by Olivier Assayas , and starring Juliette Binoche , Kristen Stewart , and Chloë Grace Moretz .
The Murder Trial of Doctor Jordan ( German : Mordprozeß Dr. Jordan ) is a 1949 West German crime film directed by Erich Engels and starring Rudolf Fernau , Maria Holst and Margarete Haagen .
In Prison My Whole Life is a 2007 documentary film about Mumia Abu - Jamal , directed by Marc Evans , and written by Evans and William Francome .
Immortal Love ( Japanese : 永遠の人 / Eien no hito ) is a 1961 Japanese drama film directed by Keisuke Kinoshita .
The Psychopath is a 1966 film directed by Freddie Francis and written by Robert Bloch .
Pierino contro tutti ( also known as Desirable Teacher ) is a 1981 comedy film directed by Marino Girolami .
Written by Casey Robinson , and based on the novel Saratoga Trunk by Edna Ferber , the film is about a Texas gambler and a Creole daughter of an aristocratic family who work together to seek justice from a society that has rejected them .
Klassfesten ( `` The Class Reunion '' ) is a 2002 Swedish comedy / drama film written and directed by Måns Herngren and Hannes Holm .
Who 's That Knocking at My Door , originally titled I Call First , is a 1967 drama film , written and directed by Martin Scorsese , in his feature film directorial debut .
`` Day of the Jackanapes '' was written by Al Jean and directed by Michael Marcantel and features recurring guest star Kelsey Grammer as Sideshow Bob , as well as Gary Coleman as himself .
Boogie Nights is a 1997 American drama film written , produced and directed by Paul Thomas Anderson .
Stuck in Love is a 2012 American independent romantic comedy - drama film written and directed by Josh Boone .
My Soul to Take ( originally called 25/8 ) is a 2010 American supernatural horror film written and directed by Wes Craven .
Damsels in Distress ( original title : Violet Wister 's Damsels in Distress and Whit Stillman 's Damsels in Distress ) is an American comedy film written and directed by Whit Stillman and starring Greta Gerwig , Adam Brody , and Analeigh Tipton .
The Last Circus ( Spanish : Balada Triste de Trompeta ; `` Sad Trumpet Ballad '' ) is a 2010 Spanish dark comedy drama film written and directed by Álex de la Iglesia .
Mon Oncle ( French pronunciation : ​(mɔ̃ nɔ̃kl ) ; My Uncle ) is a 1958 comedy film by French filmmaker Jacques Tati .
O Noviço Rebelde is a 1997 Brazilian comedy film written , produced and starring by Renato Aragão .
The Star Packer is a 1934 Western film directed by Robert N. Bradbury and starring John Wayne , George `` Gabby '' Hayes , Yakima Canutt , and Verna Hillie .
The Saga of Gosta Berling ( Swedish : Gösta Berlings saga ) is a 1924 Swedish romantic drama film directed by Mauritz Stiller and released by AB Svensk Filmindustri , starring Lars Hanson , Gerda Lundequist and Greta Garbo in her native break - out role on film .
Wedding Daze ( also known as The Pleasure of Your Company and The Next Girl I See ) is a 2006 romantic comedy movie , written and directed by Michael Ian Black .
Serious as Pleasure ( French : Sérieux comme le plaisir ) is a 1975 French drama film directed by Robert Benayoun .
Law Breakers ( French : Les Assassins de l'ordre ) is a 1971 French drama film directed by Marcel Carné .
Session 9 is a 2001 American independent psychological horror film directed by Brad Anderson and written by Anderson and Stephen Gevedon .
Peppino , le modelle e chella là is a 1957 Italian comedy film directed by Mario Mattoli and starring Gino Bramieri .
Forbidden Paths is a 1917 American drama silent film directed by Robert Thornby and written by Beatrice DeMille , Leighton Osmun and Eve Unsell .
Thalaivaa ( English : Leader ) is a 2013 Indian Tamil action film written and directed by A. L. Vijay .
Blind Mountain ( Chinese : 盲山 ; pinyin : Máng shān ) is a 2007 Chinese film directed by Li Yang and is Li 's first feature film since his 2003 debut Blind Shaft .
Being at Home with Claude is a 1992 Canadian drama film directed by Jean Beaudin and based on the play by René - Daniel Dubois .
Last Days in the Desert is an American drama film about the temptation of Christ , directed and written by Rodrigo García .
Presos is a 2015 Costa Rican drama film directed by Esteban Ramírez .
Benvenuti al Nord ( English : Welcome to the North ) is a 2012 Italian comedy film directed by Luca Miniero .
Krrish ( ( ˈkrɪʃ ) ) is a 2006 Indian science fiction superhero film directed , produced , and written by Rakesh Roshan , and starring Hrithik Roshan , Priyanka Chopra , Rekha and Naseeruddin Shah .
The Vesuvians ( Italian : I vesuviani ) is a 1997 Italian anthology film directed by Antonio Capuano , Pappi Corsicato , Antonietta de Lillo , Stefano Incerti and Mario Martone .
Sapore di mare 2 - Un anno dopo is a 1983 Italian teen romantic comedy film directed by Bruno Cortini .
La corsa dell'innocente ( internationally released as Flight of the Innocent ) is a 1992 Italian drama film directed by Carlo Carlei .
Summer Interlude ( Swedish : Sommarlek ) is a 1951 Swedish drama film co - written and directed by Ingmar Bergman .
The Rose of Granada ( Italian : La rosa di Granata ) is a 1916 Italian silent film directed by Emilio Ghione and starring Ida Carloni Talli , Lina Cavalieri and Diomira Jacobini .
Sunday 's Children ( Swedish : Söndagsbarn ) is a 1992 Swedish drama film directed by Daniel Bergman and written by Ingmar Bergman .
Thenali is a 2000 Indian Tamil comedy - drama film directed by K. S. Ravikumar and written by Crazy Mohan .
Alambrista ! is a 1977 film directed by Robert M. Young .
Chiedimi se sono felice is a 2000 Italian comedy film directed by Aldo , Giovanni & Giacomo .
The Five - Year Engagement is a 2012 American romantic comedy - drama co - written , directed , and produced by Nicholas Stoller .
As I Open My Eyes ( French : À peine j'ouvre les yeux ) is a 2015 French - Tunisian drama film directed by Leyla Bouzid .
Eisenstein in Guanajuato is a 2015 internationally co - produced drama film written and directed by Peter Greenaway .
A Secret ( French : Un secret ) is a 2007 French film directed and written by Claude Miller .
Blame It on the Bellboy is a 1992 British - American film comedy written and directed by Mark Herman , revolving around a case of mistaken identity of three individuals with similar sounding surnames staying at the same hotel .
Al bar dello sport ( At the Bar Sport ) is a 1983 Italian comedy film directed by Francesco Massaro .
La stella che non c'è ( English title : The Missing Star ) is an Italian 2006 drama film written and directed by Gianni Amelio .
Chasing Eagle Rock is a film directed by Erick Avari and starring Michael Welch , Erick Avari , Rafael Morais , Edgar Morais , and Robert Cicchini .
Perdita Durango , released as Dance with the Devil in the United States , is a 1997 Spanish crime - drama film directed by Álex de la Iglesia , based on Barry Gifford 's novel 59 ° and Raining :
A Crime ( French title : Un crime ) is a 2006 thriller film directed by Manuel Pradal , written by Pradal and Tonino Benacquista , and starring Emmanuelle Béart .
Edward Scissorhands is a 1990 American romantic dark fantasy film directed by Tim Burton and starring Johnny Depp .
Mon cœur t'appelle ( aka : My Heart Is Calling You or Mein Herz ruft nach dir ) is a 1934 French musical film directed by Carmine Gallone and Serge Véber , written by Ernst Marischka , produced by Arnold Pressburger .
Return of Sabata ( Italian : È tornato Sabata ... hai chiuso un'altra volta , roughly translated as Sabata is back ... to end another time ) is a 1971 Spaghetti Western film directed by Gianfranco Parolini .
The House on Garibaldi Street is a 1979 American television movie based on the non - fiction book of the same name , written by Isser Harel .
Artists and Models marked the first time Lewis worked with former Looney Tunes director Frank Tashlin , whom he admired greatly .
Secrets of Women ( Swedish : Kvinnors väntan ; also known as Waiting Women ) is a 1952 Swedish film directed by Ingmar Bergman .
House of Pleasure for Women ( Italian : Bordella ) is a 1976 satirical comedy film written and directed by Pupi Avati and starring Gigi Proietti , Christian De Sica , Al Lettieri , Gianni Cavina and Vincent Gardenia .
My Grandfather 's People ( Turkish : Dedemin İnsanları ) is a 2011 Turkish drama film directed by Çağan Irmak .
The Black Bomber ( Serbian : Црни бомбардер , Crni Bombarder ) is a 1992 Yugoslavian drama film by Serbian director Darko Bajić .
The Baron of Arizona is a 1950 film by Samuel Fuller and starring Vincent Price .
Stories of Lost Souls is a compilation of eight cinematic stories of lonely souls in unexpected situations starring many of cinema 's biggest names including Josh Hartnett , Hugh Jackman , Keira Knightley , Cate Blanchett , James Gandolfini , Paul Bettany , Illeana Douglas and directed by eight different directors including Deborra - Lee Furness and Mark Palansky .
Tirza is a 2010 Dutch drama film directed by Rudolf van den Berg and based on the Dutch bestseller of the same name by Arnon Grunberg .
Iris and the Lieutenant ( Swedish : Iris och löjtnantshjärta ) is a 1946 Swedish drama film directed by Alf Sjöberg and starring Mai Zetterling , Alf Kjellin and Åke Claesson .
Far och flyg is a 1955 Swedish film directed by Gösta Bernhard and starring Dirch Passer .
Time of the Gypsies ( Serbian : Дом за вешање , Dom za vešanje , literally `` Home for Hanging '' ) is a 1988 Yugoslav film by Yugoslav director Emir Kusturica .
Shoot on Sight is a 2007 film directed by Jag Mundhra and produced by Aron Govil .
The film , adapted by Kevin Elyot from Isherwood 's autobiography Christopher and His Kind , was produced by Mammoth Screen and directed by Geoffrey Sax .
She Creature ( originally billed as Mermaid Chronicles Part 1 : She Creature ) is a 2001 television film starring Rufus Sewell , Carla Gugino and Rya Kihlstedt and directed by Sebastian Gutierrez .
Chicken with Vinegar ( French : Poulet au vinaigre ) is a 1985 French crime film directed by Claude Chabrol .
Swinging with the Finkels is a 2011 British comedy film directed by Jonathan Newman , starring Mandy Moore , Martin Freeman and Melissa George .
The Cannibal Man ( Spanish La Semana del asesino , literally `` Week of the Killer '' ) is a 1972 horror film , directed by Eloy de la Iglesia and written by de la Iglesia and Antonio Fos .
Only a Mother ( Swedish : Bara en mor ) is a 1949 Swedish drama film directed by Alf Sjöberg .
Les Rendez - vous d'Anna ( English : `` The Meetings of Anna '' ) is a 1979 French - Belgian - West German film by the Belgian film director Chantal Akerman .
The Actress is an 1953 American comedy - drama film based on Ruth Gordon 's autobiographical play Years Ago .
Las Abandonadas ( `` The Abandoned '' ) is a Mexican film of 1945 , directed by Emilio Fernández , starring Dolores del Río and Pedro Armendáriz .
Smiles of a Summer Night ( Swedish : Sommarnattens leende ) is a 1955 Swedish comedy film directed by Ingmar Bergman .
The Five Obstructions is a 2003 Danish documentary film directed by Lars von Trier and Jørgen Leth .
Viva Villa ! is a 1934 American Pre - Code film starring Wallace Beery as Pancho Villa and was written by Ben Hecht , adapted from the book Viva Villa!.
Thunder Warrior ( Italian : Thunder , also known as Drug Traffikers ) is a 1983 Italian action film written and directed by Fabrizio De Angelis ( credited as Larry Ludman ) .
Arme , syndige menneske ( English : Poor , sinful man ) is a 1980 Norwegian drama film directed by Egil Kolstø , starring Svein Scharffenberg and Anne Marie Ottersen .
Ozhimuri ( Malayalam : ഒഴിമുറി , English : A Document of Separation ) is a 2012 Malayalam - language Indian film written by Jeyamohan and directed by Madhupal , starring Lal , Mallika , Asif Ali , Bhavana and Shweta Menon in lead roles .
Only Lovers Left Alive is a 2013 vampire film written and directed by Jim Jarmusch , and starring Tom Hiddleston , Tilda Swinton , Mia Wasikowska , Anton Yelchin , Jeffrey Wright , Slimane Dazi , and John Hurt .
A Real Young Girl ( French : Une vraie jeune fille ) is a 1976 French drama about a 14-year - old girl 's sexual awakening , written and directed by Catherine Breillat .
A Summer Dress ( French : Une robe d'été ) is a 1996 short film directed by François Ozon about a lagging gay relationship that is refueled in an unexpected way .
The Ice Harvest is a 2005 thriller comedy film directed by Harold Ramis and written by Richard Russo and Robert Benton , based on the novel of the same name by Scott Phillips .
Ruang Talok 69 ( Thai : เรื่องตลก 69 , English : 6ixtynin9 or A Funny Story About 6 and 9 ) , is a 1999 Thai crime film written and directed by Pen - Ek Ratanaruang .
Time Piece is a 1965 experimental short film directed , written , produced by and starring Jim Henson .
Adam & Steve is a 2005 gay romantic comedy film directed by and starring Craig Chester , who also wrote the screenplay .
So This Is College is a 1929 American comedy film directed by Sam Wood and written by Al Boasberg , Delmer Daves and Joseph Farnham .
The Golden Claw is a 1915 American dramatic film produced by Thomas H. Ince , written by C. Gardner Sullivan , and directed by Reginald Barker .
Billy 's Hollywood Screen Kiss is a 1998 American independent , gay - themed romantic comedy film written and directed by Tommy O'Haver and starring Sean P. Hayes , Brad Rowe , and Meredith Scott Lynn .
L'amore nasce a Roma ( i.e. `` Love was born in Rome '' ) is a 1958 Italian comedy film written and directed by Mario Amendola and starring Claudio Villa , Antonio Cifariello , Rossella Como and Valeria Moriconi .
Telling Lies in America is a 1997 drama film directed by Guy Ferland and written by Joe Eszterhas .
The Sons of Eilaboun ( Arabic : أبناء عيلبون ) is a 2007 documentary film by Palestinian artist and film maker Hisham Zreiq ( Zrake ) , that tells the story of the Nakba in Eilaboun and Eilabun massacre , which was committed by the Israeli army during Operation Hiram in October 1948 .
According to Guy - Manuel de Homem - Christo , Daft Punk 's Electroma had been an unplanned extension of filming videos for the Human After All album .
The script was written by Milton Subotsky , from a short story by Robert Bloch , `` The Skull of the Marquis de Sade '' .
The Dust of Time ( Greek : Η Σκόνη του Χρόνου ) is a 2008 Greek drama film written and directed by Theodoros Angelopoulos , starring Willem Dafoe , Irène Jacob , Bruno Ganz , Michel Piccoli , and Christiane Paul .
Il ratto delle sabine ( English : Romulus and the Sabines ) is an Italian adventure comedy film from 1961 , directed by Richard Pottier , written by Edoardo Anton , starring Roger Moore and Jean Marais .
Rencontre avec le dragon ( also known as `` The Red Knight '' ) is a French film directed by Hélène Angel .
Dreszcze ( Polish pronunciation : ( ˈdrɛʂt͡ʂɛ ) , Shivers ) is a 1981 Polish drama film directed by Wojciech Marczewski .
Palermo Shooting is a 2008 film written and directed by German director Wim Wenders , and starring Campino , Dennis Hopper , Giovanna Mezzogiorno , Lou Reed as himself , and an uncredited Milla Jovovich , also playing herself .
L'armata Brancaleone ( known in English - speaking countries as For Love and Gold or The Incredible Army of Brancaleone ) is an Italian comedy movie released in 1966 , written by the famous duo Age & Scarpelli and directed by Mario Monicelli .
Susan 's Plan ( also released as Dying to Get Rich on video ) is a 1998 black comedy film directed by John Landis and starring Nastassja Kinski , Dan Aykroyd , Billy Zane , Rob Schneider , Lara Flynn Boyle and Michael Biehn .
Iron Earth , Copper Sky ( Turkish : Yer Demir Gök Bakır ) is a 1987 German - Turkish drama film , written , produced and directed by Zülfü Livaneli based on the novel of the same name by Yaşar Kemal , featuring Rutkay Aziz as a simple villager elevated to sainthood status while still alive .
Things You Can Tell Just by Looking at Her is a film written and directed by Rodrigo García starring an ensemble cast .
The Art of Negative Thinking ( Norwegian : Kunsten å tenke negativt ) is a 2006 Norwegian black comedy film directed and written by Bård Breien .
The Young Caruso is an 1951 Italian biographical film about Enrico Caruso , directed by Giacomo Gentilomo .
The Man from London ( Hungarian : A londoni férfi ) is a 2007 film by Hungarian director Béla Tarr .
Away We Go is a 2009 comedy - drama directed by Academy Award - winning director Sam Mendes and written by the husband - and - wife team of Dave Eggers and Vendela Vida .
Supercondriaque ( also known as Superchondriac ) is a 2014 French comedy film written and directed by Dany Boon .
The Canberra Royals Rugby Football Club is an Australian rugby union club , based in Canberra .
Paavo Nuotio ( 1901 - -1968 ) was a Finnish ski jumper and Nordic combined skier .
The Glasgow Rocks is a basketball team which competes in the British Basketball League ( BBL ) .
Devon van Oostrum ( born 24 January 1993 ) is a British - Dutch professional basketball player who is currently a member of Arkadikos of the Greek Basket League , on loan from Laboral Kutxa Baskonia .
Tawa AFC is an association football club in Tawa , Wellington , New Zealand .
The Tri - City Americans are a major junior ice hockey team of the Western Hockey League , based in Kennewick , Washington .
Thierry Dusautoir ( ( tjɛ.ʁi dy.so.twaʁ ) ; born 18 November 1981 ) is a French rugby union player who currently plays for France at international level and Toulouse in the French Top 14 club competition .
Stefan Hierländer ( born February 3 , 1991 in Villach , Carinthia ) is an Austrian professional association football player .
Ian Vermaak ( born 28 March 1933 ) is a former tennis player competing for South Africa .
The first game in National League history was played on April 22 , 1876 , at Philadelphia 's Jefferson Street Grounds , 25th & Jefferson , between the Philadelphia Athletics and the Boston baseball club .
Carlo Recalcati ( born September 11 , 1945 in Milan , Italy ) is an Italian professional basketball coach and a former player .
The Grand Rapids Hoops was a basketball team that played in the Continental Basketball Association , based in Grand Rapids , Michigan .
The Hamburg Crocodiles are an ice hockey team in Hamburg , Germany .
The Cyclo - cross Superprestige is a season - long cyclo - cross competition , consisting of around 8 rounds throughout the season in Belgium and the Netherlands .
The Uniroyal International Championship , named for rubber corporation Uniroyal , was a golf tournament on the European Tour .
Jan Muršak ( born January 20 , 1988 ) is a professional Slovenian ice hockey forward currently playing for CSKA Moscow of the Kontinental Hockey League ( KHL ) .
Georgios Apostolidis ( alternate spelling : Giorgos ) ( Greek : Γιώργος Αποστολίδης ; born June 22 , 1984 ) is a Greek professional basketball player .
The PDC World Darts Championship , organised by the Professional Darts Corporation ( PDC ) , is one of the two World Professional Darts Championships held annually in the sport of darts .
The Adidas Tango 12 was the official match association football of the UEFA Euro 2012 , with variants being used for the 2012 Summer Olympics .
The Old Course at St Andrews is one of the oldest golf courses in the world , a public course over common land in St Andrews , Fife , Scotland .
Courtney Sims ( born October 21 , 1983 ) is an American professional basketball player with the Busan KT Sonicboom .
Nikola Dragović ( born December 20 , 1987 ) is a Serbian professional basketball player who currently plays for Vanoli Cremona of the Italian Serie A. He played college basketball at UCLA .
Matthew Carraro ( born 4 August 1984 in Gosford , Australia ) is a rugby union player for the Waratahs in Super Rugby .
Ryan Rau ( born July 30 , 1990 ) is an American football linebacker currently a Free Agent of the National Football League .
The 1964 NCAA Men 's Division I Basketball Tournament involved 25 schools playing in single - elimination play to determine the national champion of men 's NCAA Division I college basketball in the United States .
Nicolás Pereira ( born September 29 , 1970 in Salto , Uruguay ) is a former tennis player from Venezuela , who became International Tennis Federation Junior World Champion in 1988 after winning the French Open , Wimbledon and the US Open .
Helena Suková ( Czech pronunciation : ( ˈɦɛlɛna ˈsukovaː ) ) ( born 23 February 1965 , in Prague , Czechoslovakia ) is a former professional tennis player from the Czech Republic .
Alfred Powlesland ( 7 August 1875 -- 25 February 1941 ) was an English cricket player .
Rokometni Klub Celje ( English : Celje Handball Club ) , currently named Celje Pivovarna Laško due to sponsorship reasons , and commonly referred to as RK Celje or simply Celje , is a handball club from Celje , Slovenia .
Carmine Nigro ( /ˈnaɪɡroʊ/ NY - groh ; January 2 , 1910 -- August 16 , 2001 ) was former World Champion Bobby Fischer 's first chess teacher , from 1951 - 1956 .
Rabah Soudani ( born 8 April 1985 ) is an Algerian handball player currently playing for Cherbourg and the Algerian National Team .
The Auckland Lions were a rugby league club that had teams in both the New Zealand Bartercard Cup and the NSWRL Premier League .
Jiří Dudáček ( born April 4 , 1962 ) is a former professional ice hockey right wing .
Milena Bajić ( Serbian : Милена Бајић ; born November 13 , 1996 ) is Montenegrin basketball player .
Goiás Esporte Clube , also known as Goiás , is a Brazilian sports club , best known for its association football team , located in Goiânia , Goiás state .
Nguyễn Thị Thanh An ( born June 17 , 1976 ) is a Vietnamese chess player , and a woman grandmaster .
Neil Fingleton ( born 18 December 1980 ) is an English actor and former basketball player .
Nell Fortner ( born March 3 , 1959 ) is the former women 's college basketball coach at Auburn .
Mactabene Amachree ( born 30 January 1978 in Port Harcourt ) is a former Nigerian professional basketball player .
Woodville - West Torrens Football Club is an Australian rules football club playing in the South Australian National Football League ( SANFL ) .
The 2009 French Figure Skating Championships were the French Figure Skating Championships of the 2008 - 2009 figure skating season .
The Toledo Blue Stockings formed as a minor league baseball team in Toledo , Ohio in 1883 .
Andreas Glyniadakis ( alternate spelling : Gliniadakis ) ( Greek : Ανδρέας Γλυνιαδάκης ; born August 26 , 1981 ) is a Greek professional basketball player who plays for Nea Kifissia of the Greek Basket League .
The Tasman Rugby Union is the governing body for rugby union at the top of the South Island in New Zealand .
The 2005 Africa Cup ( Official name `` Top 9 '' ) was the 6th edition of the continental rugby union tournament arranged by Confederation of African Rugby ( CAR ) .
MBK Ružomberok is a women 's basketball club in Ružomberok .
De Wet Barry ( born 24 June 1978 in Ceres , Western Cape ) is a former South African rugby union footballer who played 38 test matches for the South African national rugby union team the Springboks .
The Colac Imperials Football Netball Club are an Australian rules football club which compete in the Colac DFL since its founding in 1937 .
FK Dukla Prague ( Czech : FK Dukla Praha ) is a Czech association football club located in the Dejvice area of Prague .
Cornelia Nycke Groot ( born 4 May 1988 ) is a Dutch handball player , who performs under the name Nycke Groot .
Chris Maragos ( born January 6 , 1987 ) is an American football special teamer for the Philadelphia Eagles of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Mario Ghella ( born 23 June 1929 ) is a former Italian racing cyclist and Olympic champion in track cycling .
ŽŠD Celje , also known as ŽNK Celje or NK Železničar Celje , was an association football club based in the city of Celje , Slovenia .
The 2015 ITF Men 's Circuit is the 2015 edition of the entry level tour for men 's professional tennis , and is the third tier tennis tour below the Association of Tennis Professionals , World Tour and Challenger Tour .
The 1998 FIFA World Cup was the 16th FIFA World Cup , the world championship for men 's national association football teams .
Aaron Lewicki ( born July 30 , 1987 ) is an American professional ice hockey player who is currently a Free Agent .
FC Kempten is German association football club based in Kempten , Bavaria .
Stu Wilson ( born 22 July 1954 , in Gore ) is a former New Zealand rugby union player .
The Delhi Open ( formerly known as ONGC -- GAIL Delhi Open ) is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts .
Eoin Reddan ( born Limerick , Ireland , 20 November 1980 ) is an Irish rugby union player who plays at scrum half .
Philippe Chatrier ( French pronunciation : ​(filip ʃatʁije ) ; 2 February 1926 -- 22 June 2000 ) was a French tennis player .
Kevin Swiryn ( born December 16 , 1984 in San Jose , California ) is an American rugby union player , who played for Agen in the French Top 14 .
Antonis Fotsis ( alternate spelling : Antonios , Greek : Αντώνης Φώτσης ; born April 2 , 1981 ) is a Greek professional basketball player who plays for Panathinaikos of the Greek League .
The 2011 ATP World Tour Finals ( also known as the 2011 Barclays ATP World Tour Finals for sponsorship reasons ) was a tennis tournament that was played at the O2 Arena in London , United Kingdom between 20 and 27 November 2011 .
Morné Morkel ( born 6 October 1984 ) is a cricketer who plays Test and limited overs cricket for South Africa and represents Kolkata Knight Riders in the Indian Premier League .
Ivonne Teichmann ( born 11 April 1977 in Zeulenroda ) is a retired German athlete who specialised in the 800 metres .
Laurie Daley AM ( born 20 October 1969 in Junee , New South Wales ) is a professional Australian rugby league football coach currently in charge of the New South Wales State of Origin team .
The 2008 BWF Super Series Masters Finals is the season ending tournament for 2008 BWF Super Series in badminton .
Sajjan Singh Cheema is a former basketball player from India .
Karl Humenberger ( 25 October 1906 -- 28 December 1989 ) was an Austrian association football player and manager , the brother of fellow player Ferdinand Humenberger .
The Dow Jones Open Invitational was a golf tournament on the PGA Tour that was played for one year at the Upper Montclair Country Club in Clifton , New Jersey , an 18-hole , par-72 championship course .
Beverly Baker Fleitz ( March 13 , 1930 -- April 29 , 2014 ) , was a women 's tennis player from the United States who was active in the late 1940s and during the 1950s .
The HSBC Women 's World Match Play Championship was an LPGA Tour golf tournament that was played from 2005 through 2007 .
Loïc Akono ( born January 6 , 1987 ) is a Congolese professional basketball player who currently plays for SOM Boulonnais of the LNB Pro B. Akono has been a member of the Congo national basketball team .
Queensland Premier Rugby is a club rugby union competition in Queensland , Australia .
Garfield Smith ( born November 18 , 1945 ) is a retired American professional basketball player who played in the NBA and ABA .
The Internationaler Fernschachbund ( IFSB ) was an international correspondence chess organisation , founded in 1928 .
Adel Gholami ( Persian : عادل غلامی‎‎ , born 9 February 1986 in Amol ) is a volleyball player from Iran , who plays as a Middle Blocker for the Men 's National Team .
The WWA Middleweight Championship ( Campeonato de peso Medio WWA in Spanish ) is a secondary professional wrestling championship promoted by the Mexican Lucha Libre wrestling - based promotion World Wrestling Association ( WWA ) since 1987 .
Aidyn Guseinov ( Azerbaijani : Aydın Hüseynov ) , ( 30 November 1955 or 31 August 1957 -- 30 October 2003 ) was a chess player from Azerbaijan .
The IPWA Tag Team Championship was a professional wrestling tag team championship in the Independent Professional Wrestling Alliance ( IPWA ) .
Michelle van der Pols ( born 6 January 1989 ) is a Dutch field hockey player , who plays as a midfielder for Dutch club SV Kampong .
The Badminton Pan Am ( BPA ) organisation is the governing body for the sport of badminton in the Americas and is recognized as such by the Badminton World Federation .
Eliza McCartney ( born 11 December 1996 ) is a New Zealand track and field athlete who competes in the pole vault .
CS Meaux is a French association football ( soccer ) club , based in the town of Meaux .
Joseph Emelien Patrick Poulin ( born April 23 , 1973 in Vanier , Quebec ) is a retired former professional ice hockey player who played 634 games in the National Hockey League between 1991 and 2002 .
Julius Mendheim ( ca . 1788 -- 25 August 1836 ) was a German chess master and problemist .
Scott Fenton ( 5 November 1964 -- 21 August 1989 ) was an Australian professional basketball player who played 140 games in the National Basketball League of Australia from 1982 until his death in 1989 .
The 1997 Women 's Home Nations Championship was the second women 's rugby union Home Championship .
The 2014 Davis Cup ( also known as the 2014 Davis Cup by BNP Paribas for sponsorship purposes ) is the 103rd edition of the tournament between national teams in men 's tennis .
Russian Tennis Federation ( Russian : Федерация тенниса России ) is a national governing body of tennis in Russia .
Alesiya Charnyovskaya ( born January 23 , 1978 ) is a Belarusian taekwondo practitioner .
Gianni Clerici ( born July 24 , 1930 in Como ) is an Italian tennis commentator and journalist , and a former tennis player .
Wiel Coerver ( Dutch pronunciation : ( ˈʋil ˈkur.vər ) ; 3 December 1924 -- 22 April 2011 ) was an association football manager from the Netherlands and the developer of the Coerver Method , a football coaching technique .
Ladislav Prokeš ( 7 June 1884 -- 9 January 1966 ) was one of the most prolific composers of endgame studies in chess .
Zamal Nixon ( born January 7 , 1987 ) is an American professional basketball player who plays for Lavrio of the Greek Basketball League . After a successful four years at Houston College , Nixon entered the 2011 NBA draft but was not selected in the draft 's two rounds .
Halkbank Ankara is a professional men 's volleyball team based in Ankara , Turkey and sponsored by the state - owned Halkbank .
The 2013 Barcelona Open Banco Sabadell ( also known as the Torneo Godó ) was a men 's tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts .
Asia League Ice Hockey ( ALIH ) is an association which operates a professional ice hockey league based in East Asia , with nine teams from Japan , China , South Korea and Russia .
Vitalis Chikoko ( born February 11 , 1991 ) is a Zimbabwean professional basketball player who currently plays for Scaligera Basket Verona of the Serie A2 Basket in Italy .
Calvin Prasad ( born March 11 , 1980 ) is an Indo - Fijian chess player .
The 2007 Grand Prix Hassan II was a tennis event on the 2007 ATP Tour played in Casablanca , Morocco on clay sourts .
Toni Dahlman ( born September 3 , 1979 ) is a Finnish professional ice hockey player currently playing for Ciarko PBS Bank STS Sanok in the Polska Hokej Liga , the top - tier level in Poland .
The Midea China Classic is a professional golf tournament held in China .
Marcus Lee ( born September 14 , 1994 ) is an American college basketball player who plays at the University of Kentucky .
Ostap Steckiw ( Ukrainian : Остап Стецьків ) ( born in Lviv , Poland in 1924 ; died in Toronto , Canada in August 2003 ) was a Canadian association football player who earned 1 cap for the Canadian national side against the USA in 1957 , scoring one goal .
Anders Hedberg ( born 25 February 1951 ) is a retired former professional ice hockey player who was one of the first European - born players to make an impact in North America .
The 2014 ATP World Tour Finals ( also known as the 2014 Barclays ATP World Tour Finals for sponsorship reasons ) was a men 's tennis tournament played at the O2 Arena in London , United Kingdom , between 9 and 16 November 2014 .
Warstones Wanderers F.C. are an association football club based in Wolverhampton .
Blake Kessel ( born April 13 , 1989 ) is an American professional ice hockey defenseman who currently plays for the Tampereen Ilves in Finland .
The Tunisian Basketball Cup is an annual professional men 's basketball cup competition that takes place between clubs from Tunisia .
Frederick Commodore ( born 17 August 1975 ) is a former Ghanaian association football defender who played professionally in the USL A - League and the German 2 .
Summerfield Johnston , Jr. ( born August 28 , 1932 ) , aka Skey Johnston , is an American businessman and polo player .
Vladimir Afromeev is a businessman and chess player who was born in 1954 in the city of Tula , a city located about 120 km from Moscow .
The 2012 ATP World Tour Finals ( also known as the 2012 Barclays ATP World Tour Finals for sponsorship reasons ) was a tennis tournament that was played at the O2 Arena in London , United Kingdom between 5 and 12 November 2012 .
The 2007 European Junior Baseball Championship was an international baseball competition held at Sportpark De Groote Wielen in Rosmalen , The Netherlands from July 30 to August 5 , 2007 .
The Lucha Underground Trios Championship is a professional wrestling championship promoted by Lucha Underground and is exclusively for six - man tag teams , also known as Trios in Lucha libre .
Brian Dabul ( born 24 February 1984 ) is an Argentinian retired tennis player .
Roberto Bergersen ( born January 6 , 1976 ) is an American former professional basketball player who played the majority of his career for the Idaho Stampede in the Continental Basketball Association and the NBA Development League .
Mohamed Mokrani ( born 31 January 1981 ) is an Algerian handball player for Dunkerque .
Guy Laporte ( born Beaufort , 15 December 1952 ) is a former French rugby union player and a sports executive .
Miyuki Akiyama ( 秋山美幸 Akiyama Miyuki , born August 27 , 1984 ) is a Japanese volleyball player who plays for NEC Red Rockets .
A One Day International ( ODI ) is a form of limited overs cricket , played between two teams with international status , in which each team faces a fixed number of overs , usually 50 .
Anders Myrvold ( born 12 August 1975 ) is a Norwegian former professional ice hockey player , who last played for Norwegian GET - ligaen club Frisk Tigers .
Simone Fontecchio ( born December 9 , 1995 ) is an Italian professional basketball player for Virtus Bologna of the Serie A , playing as a Small forward .
The Eastern Canada Amateur Hockey Association ( ECAHA ) was a men 's amateur -- later professional -- ice hockey league in Canada that played four seasons .
Artis Ābols ( born January 3 , 1973 ) is a retired Latvian ice hockey forward who is currently the head coach of Lada Togliatti in the Kontinental Hockey League .
The 1994 ATP Tour World Championships ( also known for the singles event as the IBM - ATP Tour World Championship for sponsorship reasons ) were tennis tournaments played on indoor carpet courts .
The 2006 UEFA Champions League Final was an association football match between Barcelona of Spain and Arsenal of England at the Stade de France in Saint - Denis , Paris , France , on Wednesday , 17 May 2006 .
Pietro Travagli ( born 28 April 1981 ) is an Italian rugby union player .
Petrarca Rugby is a rugby union club from Padua , Italy , currently competing in the top tier of the Italian rugby union , the National Championship of Excellence .
The Ukrainian Open is a senior international figure skating competition .
Gerónimo Peña Martínez ( born March 29 , 1967 in Distrito Nacional , Dominican Republic ) , is a retired professional baseball player who played second base in the major leagues from 1990 - 1996 .
Natasha Watley ( born November 27 , 1981 ) is an African - American , former collegiate 4-time First Team All - American , left - handed hitting softball player for the UCLA Bruins , USA Softball Women 's National Team and USSSA Pride , originally from Irvine , California .
The Immortal Draw was a chess game played in 1872 in Vienna by Carl Hamppe and Philipp Meitner .
The Coral Springs Open Invitational was a golf tournament on the PGA Tour that was played at the Coral Springs Country Club ( now formally known as the Country Club of Coral Springs ) in Coral Springs , Florida .
SKA - Neftyanik ( Russian : СКА-Нефтяник ) is a professional bandy club from Khabarovsk , Russia , established in 1947 .
The Québec Carnavals were a minor league baseball team in the Eastern League .
The Chicago Sky is a professional basketball team based in Rosemont , Illinois , playing in the Eastern Conference in the Women 's National Basketball Association ( WNBA ) .
The Russian Basketball Cup is the primary professional national domestic basketball cup competition of Russia .
Gérard Cholley ( born June 6 , 1945 in Fontaine - les - Luxeuil , France ) is a retired French international rugby union player .
Mohammad Hassanzadeh Saberi Akhlaghi ( Persian : محمد حسن‌زاده صابری اخلاقی‎‎ , born October 6 , 1990 in Shiraz ) is an Iranian professional basketball player .
Fatih Keleş began boxing with ten years of age .
Wiggle High5 Pro Cycling ( UCI team code : WHT ) is a British professional cycling team based in Belgium , which competes in elite road bicycle racing and track cycling events , such as the UCI Women 's Road World Cup .
Skutskärs IF is a bandy club in Skutskär , Sweden .
The 2007 Spanish Figure Skating Championships ( Spanish : Campeonato De España De Patinaje Sobre Hielo 2006 - 07 ) were the Spanish Figure Skating Championships of the 2006 - 2007 figure skating season .
Ibrahim Amin is a retired squash player from Egypt .
Alex Henery ( born August 17 , 1987 ) is an American football kicker who is currently a free agent .
Dillianne van den Boogaard ( born August 9 , 1974 in Veghel ) is a former Dutch field hockey defender , who played 174 international matches for the Netherlands , in which she scored 68 goals .
The 2012 Girls ' Youth South American Volleyball Championship was the 18th edition of the South American Volleyball Championship , organised by South America 's governing volleyball body , the Confederación Sudamericana de Voleibol ( CSV ) .
The Birmingham Bullets were a basketball team from Birmingham , who competed in the British Basketball League ( BBL ) .
Andrea Marcato ( born 17 April 1983 in Padua , Italy ) is an Italian international rugby union player who is a utility back for Calvisano .
The Associazione Sportiva Dilettantistica San Gregorio Catania Rugby , also known as San Gregorio Catania , is an ex Italian professional rugby union team disbanded in 2012 for economic difficulties .
Da'Love Woods ( born September 7 , 1982 ) is an American professional basketball player , in Europe .
Sinop Futebol Clube is a Brazilian association football club based in the city of Sinop in the state of Mato Grosso .
The IBU Cup in biathlon has been held since the winter seasons of 1982/83 and 1988/89 , for women and men , respectively .
Petar Vorkapić ( Serbian Cyrillic : Петар Воркапић , born 15 March 1995 ) is a Serbian professional basketball player who currently plays for FMP .
Mehmet Azmi Turgut ( born February 25 , 1988 ) is a Turkish professional basketball player , who plays for Olin Edirne .
Duncan Hodge ( born 18 August 1974 ) is a Scottish former internationalist rugby union player .
Mark Gerrard ( born 4 September 1982 ) is an Australian professional rugby union footballer .
The Ronchetti Cup ( called till 1996 European Cup Liliana Ronchetti ) was an annual women 's basketball European club competition held by FIBA between the years 1972 and 2002 .
Daniel Catenacci ( born March 9 , 1993 ) is a Canadian professional ice hockey centre , currently with the Buffalo Sabres of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Luca Ansoldi ( born January 5 , 1982 in Merano , Italy ) is an Italian professional ice hockey player who participated at the 2010 IIHF World Championship as a member of the Italian National men 's ice hockey team .
The Modern Defense ( also known as the Robatsch Defence after Karl Robatsch ) is a hypermodern chess opening in which Black allows White to occupy the center with pawns on d4 and e4 , then proceeds to attack and undermine this `` ideal '' center without attempting to occupy it themselves .
The Boleyn Ground , often referred to as Upton Park , is an association football stadium located in Upton Park , east London .
The 2007 UCI Track Cycling World Championships is the World Championship for track cycling .
The IHF Women 's Youth World Championship is the official competition for women 's national handball teams under-18 , has been organized by the International Handball Federation since 2006 .
The 1988 PBA Reinforced Conference Finals was the best - of-7 series basketball championship of the 1988 PBA Reinforced Conference , and the conclusion of the conference 's playoffs .
Noëlle van Lottum ( born 12 July 1972 , Hoogland ) is a Dutch former professional tennis player who in the 1990s played for France .
The Rio Grande Valley Open was a golf tournament on the PGA Tour that played in the Rio Grande Valley of south Texas in 1949 and 1950 .
Lea Pericoli ( born 22 March 1935 ) is an Italian former tennis player and later television presenter and journalist from Milan .
The 2014 FFA Cup preliminary rounds were a series of state - based knockout competitions , providing a qualification pathway for the 2014 FFA Cup , the Australian association football knockout cup competition .
The 2010 Women 's Baseball World Cup was an international baseball competition that was held in Venezuela from August 12 to August 22 , 2010 .
Ronald McKinnon ( born September 20 , 1973 ) is a former American football linebacker in the National Football League .
Alliance Sportive de Casablanca or Rabita de Casablanca ( Arabic : الرابطة الرياضية البيضاوية ) , is a Moroccan handball team based in Casablanca , that plays in Moroccan Handball League .
Jarle Pedersen ( born 15 June 1955 ) is a retired Norwegian speed skater and the current coach of the Norwegian speed skating team .
Bellyboarding is the oldest form of surfing from ancient Hawaii & the Polynesian islands .
The NWA United National Heavyweight Championship ( often shortened to UN Championship ) is a professional wrestling title in the Japanese promotion Pro Wrestling Zero1 .
The 2010 Friends Provident t20 tournament was the inaugural Friends Provident t20 Twenty20 cricket competition for the England and Wales first - class counties .
The 2013 Scottish Challenge Cup Final , also known as the Ramsdens Cup Final for sponsorship reasons , was an association football match between Queen of the South and Partick Thistle on 7 April 2013 at Almondvale Stadium in Livingston .
The 2006 Merano Cup was the Merano Cup competition for the 2006 - -07 figure skating season .
Fribourg Olympic is a Swiss professional basketball club based in Fribourg , and a 14-time Swiss champion ( 1966 , 1971 , 1973 , 1974 , 1978 , 1979 , 1981 , 1982 , 1985 , 1992 , 1997 , 1998 , 1999 , 2007 ) .
Albert Teruel ( born 3 April , 1987 ) is a Spanish professional basketball player , who plays in CB Girona .
The Nelson Mandela Championship was a golf tournament , played for the first time in December 2012 .
The Kuwait national under-17 football team is the youth association football team representing Kuwait in youth competitions and it is controlled by Kuwait Football Association .
Gediminas Budnikas ( February 11 , 1944 in Paąžuoliai ) is a retired Lithuanian basketball player , most notable for his career in Žalgiris from 1964 to 1973 .
The Rockford Peaches were a women 's professional baseball team who played from 1943 through 1954 in the All - American Girls Professional Baseball League .
Joe Don Duncan ( born September 17 , 1990 ) is an American football tight end and fullback for the Brooklyn Bolts of the Fall Experimental Football League ( FXFL ) He played college football at Dixie State University .
Neil Harlock ( born 29 May 1975 ) is an association football player who represented New Zealand at international level .
The 1988 Eckerd Open was a tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts in Tampa , Florida in the United States and was part of Tier IV of the 1988 WTA Tour .
The Nova Scotia Open was a golf tournament on the Web.com Tour .
Philippe Washer ( French pronunciation : ​(filip waʃe ) ; 6 August 1924 -- 27 November 2015 ) was a Belgian tennis player .
Luke Sellars ( born May 21 , 1981 ) is a professional ice hockey player who plays for the Jokipojat of the Mestis in Finland .
Joy Fahrenkrog ( born November 6 , 1979 ) is best known for her archery .
The Lausanne Football and Cricket Club was a Swiss association football and cricket club .
The 2014 FINA Women 's Water Polo World League is played between November 2013 and June 2014 and open to all women 's water polo national teams .
The BCCI Corporate Trophy is an Indian cricket competition .
Raimo Pajusalu ( born 1 February 1981 in Pärnu ) is a retired Estonian volleyball player .
The 1983 Bridgestone Doubles Championships was a tennis tournament played on indoor carpet courts in Tokyo in Japan that was part of the 1983 Virginia Slims World Championship Series .
Roger Grimau Gragera ( born July 14 , 1978 ) is a Spanish retired professional basketball player who last played for La Bruixa d'Or Manresa .
Alianza Universidad is a Peruvian association football club , playing in the city of Huánuco .
Duško Čelica ( Serbian Cyrillic : Душко Челица , born 18 August 1986 ) is a Bosnian handball player .
Martin Ručinský ( Czech pronunciation : ( ˈmarcɪn ˈrutʃiːnskiː ) ; born March 11 , 1971 ) is a Czech former professional ice hockey player who played 16 seasons in the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
The Yugoslav Handball Championship was the highest level competition in men 's team handball in the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia , played regularly for almost four decades between 1953 and 1991 , before being abandoned due to the breakup of Yugoslavia .
The IWRG Intercontinental Super Welterweight Championship ( Campeonato Intercontinental de Peso Super Welter IWRG in Spanish ) is an inactive professional wrestling championship promoted by the Mexican professional wrestling promotion International Wrestling Revolution Group ( IWRG ) .
The WWC Universal Heavyweight Championship is a professional wrestling world heavyweight championship and the top title contested for in the Puerto Rican professional wrestling promotion , the World Wrestling Council .
Yuniesky Quezada Pérez ( Villa Clara Province , July 31 1984 ) is a Cuban chess grandmaster .
Jodie Bowering ( born July 1982 in Queensland ) is an Australian softball player .
Odell Hodge ( born March 26 , 1973 ) is an American former basketball player for Old Dominion University and , later , professional teams in Belgium .
The 2008 Canada Masters ( also known as the 2008 Rogers Masters and 2008 Rogers Cup for sponsorship reasons ) was a tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts .
The 1949 Claxton Shield ( at the time known as the 1949 Australian Championship Series ) was the tenth annual Claxton Shield , an Australian national baseball tournament .
Felicity Willis ( born October 31 , 1978 ) is a Puerto Rican women 's basketball player .
Jonathan Peter Wilkinson , CBE ( born 25 May 1979 ) , known as Jonny Wilkinson , is a former rugby union player who represented England and the British and Irish Lions .
The Mendoza Line is an expression in baseball in the United States , deriving from the name of shortstop Mario Mendoza , whose mediocre batting average is taken to define the threshold of incompetent hitting .
The Pakistan Hockey Federation ( PHF ) is the national governing body for field hockey in Pakistan .
Okan Çevik ( born 8 June 1966 in Edirne , Turkey ) is a Turkish professional basketball coach , who is now coaching Denizli Basket .
Junior Poluleuligaga ( born 5 February 1981 ) is a Samoan rugby union international player .
Tomasz Rosiński ( born February 24 , 1984 in Ostrów Wielkopolski ) is a Polish handball player ( playmaker ) and a member of the Poland national handball team .
The Melbourne Stars is an Australian Twenty20 cricket team based in Melbourne , Victoria that competes in Australia 's Twenty20 competition , the Big Bash League .
Christophe Juillet ( born Villeneuve - sur - Lot , France , 20 March 1969 ) is a French former international rugby union footballer who also played for France national team .
Mantas Kalnietis ( born 6 September 1986 ) is a Lithuanian professional basketball player who plays for EA7 Emporio Armani Milano of the Italian Serie A. He is also a member of the Lithuanian national basketball team .
The Mashonaland Eagles is one of five cricket Zimbabwean cricket franchises .
Fabrice Metz ( born 23 January 1991 in Strasbourg , France ) is a French professional rugby union player .

Mandiaye Ndiaye ( born 12 November 1952 ) is a former Senegalese basketball player with AS Forces Armées .
The North Fremantle Football Club was an Australian rules football club which competed in the West Australian Football League from 1901 to 1915 .

The 1988 Southern Cross Classic was a tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts in Adelaide in Australia and was part of Tier V of the 1989 WTA Tour .

The 1973 Virginia Slims Championships were the second season - ending WTA Tour Championships , the annual tennis tournament for the best female tennis players in singles on the 1973 Virginia Slims circuit .
The Modbury Football Club ( nicknamed The Hawks ) is an Australian rules football club based in Modbury , a suburb of Adelaide in South Australia .

Charles Davis Tull ( born November 12 , 1991 ) is an American football player for the New Orleans Saints of the National Football League .

The 2012 FIBA 3x3 World Championships , hosted by Greece , was the first edition of the FIBA 3x3 World Championships , an international 3x3 basketball event that featured separate competitions for men 's , women 's and mixed national teams .

The 2014 Tour de Langkawi was the 19th edition of an annual professional road bicycle racing stage race held in Malaysia since 1996 .
Exeter Chiefs ( officially Exeter Rugby Club ) are an English rugby union club based in Exeter , Devon that currently play in the Aviva Premiership , the top level of domestic rugby union in England .
Daryl Millard ( born 20 February 1985 ) is an Australian rugby league player of Fijian descent who currently plays for the South Sydney Rabbitohs of the National Rugby League .
The NHL Winter Classic is an annual event held by the National Hockey League ( NHL ) on or around New Year 's Day in which a regular - season ice hockey game is played outdoors , generally in a football or baseball stadium , in an area with a resident NHL team .
Tyler Gron ( born September 7 , 1989 ) is a Canadian ice hockey player .

The European Cyclo - cross Championships are the European championships in cyclo - cross .

Ricky Hatton vs. Kostya Tszyu was a boxing Light Welterweight fight on June 4 , 2005 between Ricky Hatton and Kostya Tszyu at the Manchester Evening News Arena in Manchester , England .

The 1984 Virginia Slims of Utah was a tennis tournament played on outdoor carpet courts in Salt Lake City , Utah in the United States that was part of the 1984 Virginia Slims World Championship Series .

Bernie Johnston ( born September 15 , 1956 ) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey player .
The FIBA Asia Under-20 Championship 2004 is the 4th edition of the FIBA Asia 's young men championship for basketball .

Nanne Dahlman ( born 7 September 1970 ) is a retired Finnish professional tennis player , active in the 1990s .

Andrés Guibert ( born October 28 , 1968 in Havana ) is a retired Cuban basketball player .
The Los Maniceros massacre was the 2009 kidnapping in Venezuela of twelve members of a Colombian amateur association football team Los Maniceros ( The Peanut Men ) , eleven of whom were later murdered .
Saudia Roundtree ( born October 4 , 1976 in Anderson , South Carolina ) is an American women 's basketball coach , and also a former star player .
Maret Balkestein - Grothues , née Maret Grothues ( born 16 September 1988 in Almelo ) is a Dutch volleyball player who plays as an wing spiker .

The `` Curse of LaBonte '' is quite possibly one of the most famous curses in curling history .
The Bob Jones Award is the highest honor given by the United States Golf Association in recognition of distinguished sportsmanship in golf .
The Road to Brazil is the name of a series of international association football exhibition games that took place from May 29 to June 7 , 2014 in the run up to the 2014 FIFA World Cup .

Rashid Sidek ( born 8 July 1968 in Banting , Selangor ) is a former Malay professional badminton player from Malaysia .
The 2011 WTA Tour Championships ( also known for sponsorship reasons as the 2011 TEB BNP Paribas WTA Championships ) was a tennis tournament played at Istanbul , Turkey from October 25 to October 30 , 2011 .
The Sydney Bears are a semi - professional ice hockey team based in Penrith , New South Wales , who are members of the Australian Ice Hockey League ( AIHL ) .
The Ocean Grove Football Club is an Australian rules football club that plays in the Bellarine Football League ( BFL ) and situated in the town of Ocean Grove , Victoria , Australia .

The International 20:20 Club Championship was an international Twenty20 competition for club cricket teams .

The 2000 Qatar Open , known as the 2000 Qatar Mobil Open for sponsorship reasons , was a men 's tennis tournament held in Doha , Qatar and played on outdoor hard courts .

The Marlow Wolves are a British American football team based in Marlow , Buckinghamshire .

Ismaila Lassissi , sometimes also spelled Isimaila Lassissi ( born 11 September 1969 ) , is a former Ivorian rugby union footballer .

Marisa Galvany ( born 19 June 1936 ) is an American soprano who had an active international career performing in operas and concerts up into the early 2000s .
Maria Frances Parke ( 26 August 1772 -- 31 July 1822 ) was an English soprano , pianist and composer of keyboard works .
Maria Malibran ( 24 March 1808 -- 23 September 1836 ) was a Spanish mezzo - soprano who commonly sang both contralto and soprano parts , and was one of the most famous opera singers of the 19th century .

William Heddle Nash ( 14 June 1894 -- 14 August 1961 ) was an English lyric tenor who appeared in opera and oratorio in the middle decades of the twentieth century .
